tika-vin04t:1243_22: Animittā nāma sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1243_23: Bahisīme ṭhitasammatā nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahiṭhitena sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1243_24: Nadiyā samudde jātassare sammatā nāma etesu nadiādīsu sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1243_29: sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti.
tika-vin04t:1243_30: Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1243_31: Sace hi porāṇakassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya ambo ceva jambū cāti dve rukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā honti,
tika-vin04t:1243_33: vihārasīmā ca jambuṃ anto katvā ambaṃ kittetvā baddhā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1243_34: atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya vihāre kate sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū taṃ ambaṃ anto katvā jambuṃ kittetvā bandhanti,
tika-vin04t:1243_36: Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1243_37: Sace hi paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā tassā padesaṃ vā anto katvā attano sīmaṃ sammannati,
tika-vin04t:1243_39: Iti imā ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1244_0: Tividhasampattiyuttāti nimittasampattiyā parisāsampattiyā kammavācāsampattiyā ca yuttā.
tika-vin04t:1244_8: udakanimittanti evaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittāni “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ, pabbato, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1244_9: eso pabbato nimitta”ntiādinā nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1244_11: suddhapaṃsusuddhapāsāṇaubhayamissakavasena hi tividhopi pabbato hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ nimittupago,
tika-vin04t:1244_14: tasmā yo koci pāsāṇo ukkaṃsavasena hatthippamāṇato omakataraṃ ādiṃ katvā heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍaparimāṇo nimittupago,
tika-vin04t:1244_17: Vananimitte antosārehi vā antosāramissakehi vā rukkhehi catupañcarukkhamattampi vanaṃ nimittupagaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1244_23: Maggo jaṅghamaggo vā hotu sakaṭamaggo vā,
tika-vin04t:1244_24: yo vinivijjhitvā dve tīṇi gāmakhettāni gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1244_27: Vammiko pana heṭṭhimaparicchedena taṃdivasaṃjāto aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho govisāṇamattopi vammiko nimittupago,
tika-vin04t:1244_33: taṃ ādiṃ katvā antamaso taṅkhaṇeyeva pathaviyaṃ khaṇite āvāṭake ghaṭehi āharitvā pūritampi yāva kammavācāpariyosānā saṇṭhamānakaṃ nimittupagaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1244_34: itaraṃ sandamānaṃ vā vuttaparicchedakālaṃ atiṭṭhantaṃ vā bhājanagataṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin04t:1245_0: Parisāsampattiyā yuttā nāma sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi sannipatitvā yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette
tika-vin04t:1245_1: baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvā ṭhitā bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:1245_2: te sabbe hatthapāse vā katvā chandaṃ vā āharitvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1246_0: Kammavācāsampattiyā yuttā nāma “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1246_1: yāvatā samantā nimittā kittitā”tiādinā nayena vuttāya parisuddhāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1246_2: Evaṃ ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā sammatā sīmā “baddhasīmā”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1247_5: Agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā sattabbhantarasīmā nāma.
tika-vin04t:1247_6: Tattha agāmakaṃ nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭaviādīsu vā samuddamajjhe vā macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathesu dīpakesu labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1247_7: Samantā sattabbhantarāti majjhe ṭhitānaṃ sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarā vinibbedhena cuddasa honti.
tika-vin04t:1247_10: tasmā samantā parisāpariyantato paṭṭhāya abbhantaraparicchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1247_11: Sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃ uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin04t:1247_12: dvinnaṃ sattabbhantarānaṃ antare aññamekaṃ sattabbhantaraṃ upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1247_15: nadī asīmā”tiādinā nayena nadiādīnaṃ sīmabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā puna “nadiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:1247_17: samudde vā jātassare vā yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepā,
tika-vin04t:1247_18: ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti vuttā ayaṃ udakukkhepasīmā nāma.
tika-vin04t:1247_19: Tattha yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ anupañcāhaṃ anatikkamitvā deve vassante valāhakesu vigatamattesu sotaṃ pacchijjati,
tika-vin04t:1247_21: Yassā pana īdise suvuṭṭhikāle vassānassa catumāse sotaṃ na pacchijjati,
tika-vin04t:1247_22: yattha titthena vā atitthena vā sikkhākaraṇīye āgatalakkhaṇena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1247_23: anukkhipitvā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi antaravāsako temiyati,
tika-vin04t:1247_24: ayaṃ samuddaṃ vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1247_27: Yo pana kenaci khaṇitvā akato sayaṃjāto sobbho samantato āgatena udakena pūrito tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1247_28: yattha nadiyaṃ vuttappakāre vassakāle udakaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1247_30: Yopi nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ vā bhinditvā nikkhantaudakena khato sobbho etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1248_0: Yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ thāmamajjhimassa purisassa samantato udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1248_2: evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālukaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā majjhimena purisena sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1248_3: tattha yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālukaṃ vā patati,
tika-vin04t:1249_0: Ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathāti ayaṃ tesu nadiādīsu udakukkhepaparicchinnā sīmā samānasaṃvāsā ceva ekūposathā ca,
tika-vin04t:1249_1: ayaṃ pana etesaṃ nadiādīnaṃ antoyeva labbhati, na bahi.
tika-vin04t:1249_2: Tasmā nadiyā vā jātassare vā yattakaṃ padesaṃ pakativassakāle catūsu māsesu udakaṃ ottharati,
tika-vin04t:1249_3: samudde yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti,
tika-vin04t:1249_6: Dubbuṭṭhikāle vā gimhe vā nadijātassaresu sukkhesupi sā eva kappiyabhūmi,
tika-vin04t:1249_7: sace pana sukkhe jātassare vāpiṃ vā khaṇanti,
tika-vin04t:1249_13: tasmā tesaṃ anto parisāpariyantato paṭṭhāya samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1249_14: Sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃ visuṃ uposathādikammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin04t:1249_15: dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo.
tika-vin04t:1249_16: Ayañhi sattabbhantarasīmā ca udakukkhepasīmā ca bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitokāsato paṭṭhāya labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1249_17: Paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi paricchedato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti,
tika-vin04t:1249_20: Iti imaṃ baddhasīmābaddhasīmāvasena duvidhaṃ sīmaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā”ti.
tika-vin04t:1249_21: Tesu hi catūsu bhikkhūsu ekasīmāyaṃ hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitesvevetaṃ saṅghassa uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1250_0: Sabhāgāpattiyo ca na vijjantīti ettha yaṃ sabbo saṅgho vikālabhojanādinā sabhāgavatthunā lahukāpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin04t:1250_2: vikālabhojanapaccayā āpannaṃ pana āpattisabhāgaṃ anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpannassa santike desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1250_3: Sabhāgāpattiyā pana sati tehi bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo “gacchāvuso,
tika-vin04t:1250_9: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1250_10: ayaṃ sabbo saṅgho sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin04t:1250_11: yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissati,
tika-vin04t:1250_12: tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī”ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1250_15: ayaṃ sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāya āpattiyā vematiko,
tika-vin04t:1250_17: tadā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī”ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1250_18: Sace panettha koci taṃ sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatīti maññamāno ekassa santike deseti,
tika-vin04t:1250_21: paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhako cāti ubhopi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanti,
tika-vin04t:1250_25: tesaṃ santike sesehi sabhāgāpattiyo desetabbā vā ārocetabbā vā.
tika-vin04t:1250_26: Sace te evaṃ akatvā uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin04t:1250_27: “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”tiādinā nayena sāpattikassa uposathakaraṇe paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanti.
tika-vin04t:1250_28: Sace sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiyā sati vuttavidhiṃ akatvā uposathaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1250_30: tasmā sabhāgāpattiyā sati saṅghassa pattakallaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1250_32: Etāsu hi sabhāgāpattīsu avijjamānāsu visabhāgāpattīsu vijjamānāsupi pattakallaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1251_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na hontīti “na,
tika-vin04t:1251_3: yo uddiseyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato gahaṭṭho, “na,
tika-vin04t:1251_5: bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādinā nayena vuttā bhikkhunī,
tika-vin04t:1251_20: ubhatobyañjanakoti ime vīsati cāti ekavīsati puggalā vajjanīyā nāma,
tika-vin04t:1251_22: Etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposathaṃ karonto saṅgho pācittiyaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin04t:1251_24: Ettha ca tiracchānagatoti yassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin04t:1251_27: Evaṃ pattakallaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1252_0: Saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyātiiminā ye te aparepi tayo uposathā saṅghe uposatho,
tika-vin04t:1252_4: tesu itare dve paṭikkhipitvā saṅghe uposathameva dīpeti.
tika-vin04t:1252_5: Pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyātiiminā ye te aparepi tayo uposathā suttuddeso,
tika-vin04t:1252_9: tesu itare dve paṭikkhipitvā suttuddesameva dīpeti.
tika-vin04t:1252_11: so duvidho ovādapātimokkhuddeso ca āṇāpātimokkhuddeso ca. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1256_0: Ādinā nayena vuttā tisso gāthāyo ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma,
tika-vin04t:1257_4: sopi pavāritānañca appavāritānañca santike karaṇavasena duvidho.
tika-vin04t:1257_5: Tattha mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritānaṃ santike pacchimikāya upagatena vā anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā cātumāsiniyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1257_6: pana pavāritānaṃ santike purimikāya upagatena vā anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā kāyasāmaggiṃ datvā “parisuddho ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1257_8: ṭhapetvā ca pana pavāraṇādivasaṃ aññasmiṃ kāle āvāsikehi uddiṭṭhamatte pātimokkhe avuṭṭhitāya vā ekaccāya
tika-vin04t:1257_9: vuṭṭhitāya vā sabbāya vā vuṭṭhitāya parisāya ye aññe samasamā vā thokatarā vā āgacchanti,
tika-vin04t:1257_10: tehi tesaṃ santike vuttanayeneva pārisuddhi ārocetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1257_12: so ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā ca aṭṭhapetvā ca karaṇavasena duvidho.
tika-vin04t:1257_13: Tattha yasmiṃ āvāse tayo bhikkhū viharanti,
tika-vin04t:1257_14: tesu uposathadivase sannipatitesu ekena bhikkhunā “suṇantu me āyasmantā ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti vā “pannaraso”ti
tika-vin04t:1257_15: vā vatvā “yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyyāmā”ti ñattiyā ṭhapitāya
tika-vin04t:1257_16: therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “parisuddho ahaṃ,  āvuso,
tika-vin04t:1257_21: tatra ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva pārisuddhi ārocetabbāti ayaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho.
tika-vin04t:1258_1: sabbaṃ pubbakaraṇīyaṃ katvā aññesaṃ anāgamanaṃ ñatvā “ajja me uposatho cātuddaso”ti vā “pannaraso”ti vā vatvā “adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1258_2: Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhānuposathoti evaṃ kattabbākāravasena tayo uposathāti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1258_6: kattabbākāravasena suttuddesoti evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampanno uposatho idha niddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1258_7: Tasmiṃ pavattamāne uposathaṃ akatvā tadahuposathe aññaṃ abhikkhukaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakehi vā sabhikkhukaṃ āvāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1258_8: vā anāvāsaṃ vā vāsatthāya aññatra saṅghena,
tika-vin04t:1259_0: Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccanti “saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakaraṇasambandheneva vuttassa saṅghassa uposathe kattabbe yaṃ taṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin04t:1264_0: Evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1264_2: Na hi taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1264_3: tasmā therena āṇattena agilānena bhikkhunā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1265_0: Chandapārisuddhīti ettha uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatena sannipatitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1265_2: Yopi gilāno vā hoti kiccappasuto vā,
tika-vin04t:1265_7: chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti ayaṃ attho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo,
tika-vin04t:1265_9: Akatūposathena pana gilānena vā kiccappasutena vā pārisuddhi dātabbā.
tika-vin04t:1265_13: pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī”ti ayaṃ attho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo,
tika-vin04t:1265_20: Tattha pārisuddhidānaṃ saṅghassapi attanopi uposathakaraṇaṃ sampādeti,
tika-vin04t:1265_25: Pubbe vuttaṃ pana suddhikacchandaṃ vā imaṃ vā chandapārisuddhiṃ ekena bahūnampi āharituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1265_26: Sace pana so antarāmagge aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā yesaṃ tena chando vā pārisuddhi vā gahitā,
tika-vin04t:1265_29: itarā pana biḷālasaṅkhalikā chandapārisuddhi nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1265_34: Chandapārisuddhi pana tasmiṃ hatthapāsaṃ upagatamatteyeva āgatā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1266_2: Bhikkhugaṇanāti “ettakā bhikkhū uposathagge sannipatitā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ gaṇanā.
tika-vin04t:1266_3: Idampi hi ubhayaṃ katvāva uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1266_5: Na hi bhikkhunīhi yācitaṃ ovādaṃ anārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1266_6: Bhikkhuniyo hi “sve uposatho”ti āgantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso pannaraso”ti pucchitvā puna uposathadivase āgantvā “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya,
tika-vin04t:1266_11: Taṃ ṭhapetvā bālagilānagamiye añño sacepi āraññiko hoti,
tika-vin04t:1266_14: tena bhikkhunā uposathagge pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu evaṃ vattabbo “bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1266_19: Pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ “atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato”ti.
tika-vin04t:1266_20: Sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-vin04t:1266_21: tato tena so vattabbo “itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-vin04t:1266_24: tato tena pucchitabbaṃ “ko āyasmā ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”nti.
tika-vin04t:1266_27: taṃ tattheva sammannitvā ovādapaṭiggāhako vattabbo “itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-vin04t:1266_30: pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ “natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-vin04t:1266_32: Ettāvatā hi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ ārocitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1266_33: Tena bhikkhunā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipadadivase bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1267_5: ayye”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ “kiṃ, ayya,
tika-vin04t:1267_7: Tena vattabbaṃ “natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-vin04t:1267_10: Idañca ekato āgatānaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1267_11: Tāsu pana ekāya bhikkhuniyā vattabbañceva sampaṭicchitabbañca,
tika-vin04t:1267_13: Sace pana bhikkhusaṅgho vā bhikkhunisaṅgho vā na pūrati,
tika-vin04t:1267_14: ubhayatopi vā gaṇamattameva puggalamattaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1268_38: Tenāpi bhikkhunā uposathakāle evaṃ vattabbaṃ “bhikkhuniyo, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1268_50: bhikkhunī bhante āyasmantānaṃ pāde vandati, vandanti, vandati,
tika-vin04t:1268_58: Uposathaggepi pātimokkhuddesakena vā ñattiṭṭhapakena vā itarena vā bhikkhunā sace sammato bhikkhu atthi,
tika-vin04t:1268_70: Ovādappaṭiggāhakena pāṭipade taṃ paccāharitvā tatheva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1268_72: Evaṃ bhikkhunīhi yācitaṃ ovādaṃ ārocetvāva uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1271_0: Pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethāti attano parisuddhabhāvaṃ ārocetha,
tika-vin04t:1271_4: yo suṇeyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi vacanato aparisuddhehi pātimokkhaṃ sotuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1271_9: pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”ti vuttattā idhāpi “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissatī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1271_15: puggalassa uddesā saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhanti idañhettha lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1272_0: Taṃ sabbeva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karomāti nti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1272_1: Sabbeva santāti yāvatikā tassā parisāya therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca.
tika-vin04t:1272_2: Sādhukaṃ suṇomāti aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sotadvāravasena sabbacetasā samannāharāma.
tika-vin04t:1272_3: Manasi karomāti ekaggacittā hutvā citte ṭhapeyyāma.
tika-vin04t:1272_4: Ettha ca kiñcāpi “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti vuttattā “suṇotha manasi karothā”ti vattuṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin04t:1272_8: iccassa saṅghapariyāpannattā “suṇoma manasi karomā”ti idameva vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1273_4: Tattha yassa siyāti yassa channaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarena āpannāpatti bhaveyya.
tika-vin04t:1274_0: Kathaṃ alajjitāya āpajjati? Akappiyabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva madditvā vītikkamaṃ karoti.
tika-vin04t:1278_1: Aññāṇapuggalo hi mando momūho kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto akattabbaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1279_1: Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā kappiyaṃ ce,
tika-vin04t:1282_2: iti imesaṃ channaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarena ākārena āpannā yassa siyā sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ aññatarā
tika-vin04t:1282_3: āpatti therassa vā navassa vā majjhimassa vāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1283_0: So āvikareyyāti so taṃ āpattiṃ desetu vā pakāsetu vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1283_1: Asantiyā āpattiyāti yassa pana evaṃ anāpannā vā āpattiṃ āpajjitvā ca pana vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā vā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:1283_2: tassa sā āpatti asantī nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1283_4: Tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante “parisuddhā”ti vedissāmīti tuṇhībhāvenāpi hi kāraṇena ahaṃ āyasmante “parisuddhā”icceva jānissāmīti.
tika-vin04t:1283_5: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hotīti yathā ekeneko puṭṭho byākareyya,
tika-vin04t:1283_6: yathā ekeneko paccekapuṭṭho “maṃ esa pucchatī”ti ñatvā byākareyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1284_0: Evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotīti ettha ekacce tāva ācariyā evaṃ vadanti “evamevaṃ
tika-vin04t:1284_4: tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante parisuddhāti vedissāmī’ti tikkhattuṃ anusāvitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1284_5: taṃ ekamekena ‘maṃ esa pucchatī’ti evaṃ jānitabbaṃ hotīti attho”ti.
tika-vin04t:1284_8: Anussāvanañhi nāma atthato ca byañjanato ca abhinnaṃ hoti “dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmī”tiādīsu viya,
tika-vin04t:1284_13: Na ca yuttaṃ anāpattikkhette āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ.
tika-vin04t:1285_0: Apare “anusāvita”ntipadassa anusāvetabbanti atthaṃ vikappetvā “yāvatatiya”ntiidaṃ upari uddesāvasāne “kaccittha parisuddhā…pe…
tika-vin04t:1285_1: tatiyampi pucchāmī”ti etaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āhu.
tika-vin04t:1285_11: Yadi cetaṃ uddesāvasāne vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin04t:1285_12: “na āvikarissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādentassa nidāne samattepi vuttamusāvādo na siyā, kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1285_13: “Yāvatatiyaṃ anussāviyamāne”tivacanato “yāvatatiya”nti idaṃ vacanameva niratthakaṃ siyā, kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1285_14: Nidānuddese yāvatatiyānussāvanassa abhāvatoti evaṃ yuttiabhāvato tampi na yujjati.
tika-vin04t:1285_18: tasmiṃ yāvatatiyaṃ anussāviyamāne yo saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikaroti,
tika-vin04t:1286_0: Tadetaṃ yathā anusāvitaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1286_5: atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1286_9: Imameva ca atthaṃ sandhāya uposathakkhandhake vuttaṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotīti sakimpi anusāvitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1287_3: sā ca kho pana na musāvādalakkhaṇena,
tika-vin04t:1287_5: dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti iminā pana bhagavato vacanena vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānāpatti hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1293_0: Antarāyikoti vippaṭisāravatthutāya pāmojjādisambhavaṃ nivāretvā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya antarāyaṃ karoti.
tika-vin04t:1293_1: Tasmāti yasmā ayaṃ anāvikaraṇasaṅkhāto sampajānamusāvādo antarāyiko hoti, tasmā.
tika-vin04t:1293_5: Āvikātabbāti saṅghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vā pakāsetabbā,
tika-vin04t:1293_8: ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1293_13: Āvikatā hissa phāsu hotītiettha āvikatāti āvikatāya,
tika-vin04t:1293_15: Alajjitātiādīsu viya hi idampi karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1293_18: Phāsu hotīti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya phāsu hoti,
tika-vin04t:1293_19: avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ vasena sukhappaṭipadā sampajjatīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1297_0: Idāni yadetaṃ nidānānantaraṃ tatrime cattārotiādi pārājikakaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1297_1: tattha tatrāti tasmiṃ “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti evaṃ vutte pātimokkhe.
tika-vin04t:1297_7: na nidāne viya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti sādhāraṇavacanamattena.
tika-vin04t:1299_0: Yo panāti rassadīghādinā liṅgādibhedena yo koci.
tika-vin04t:1299_8: ñatticatutthakammūpasampadāti imāsu aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu ñatticatutthena upasampadākammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampanno.
tika-vin04t:1299_9: Tassa pana kammassa vatthuñattianussāvana sīmā parisāsampattivasena akuppatā veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1300_3: Tattha ūnavīsativasso nāma paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya aparipuṇṇavīsativasso.
tika-vin04t:1300_4: Antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbo nāma catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ aññataraṃ ajjhāpannapubbo.
tika-vin04t:1300_6: Tesu āsittapaṇḍakañca usūyapaṇḍakañca ṭhapetvā opakkamikapaṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍako paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ṭhito pakkhapaṇḍako ca idha adhippeto.
tika-vin04t:1301_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako pana tividho liṅgatthenako saṃvāsatthenako ubhayatthenakoti.
tika-vin04t:1301_1: Tattha yo sayaṃ pabbajitvā na bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti,
tika-vin04t:1301_2: na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:1301_5: ayaṃ asuddhacittatāya liṅgamattasseva thenitattā liṅgatthenako nāma.
tika-vin04t:1301_6: Yo pana bhikkhūhi pabbajito sāmaṇero samāno kāsāyāni apanetvā tesu saussāhova methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā puna nivāsetvā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-vin04t:1301_7: ayaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā na liṅgatthenako,
tika-vin04t:1301_8: na liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsatthenako.
tika-vin04t:1301_10: Yo ca kho sāmaṇero samāno videsaṃ gantvā bhikkhuvassāni gaṇeti,
tika-vin04t:1301_15: Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko hi sabbopi kiriyabhedo imasmiṃ atthe “saṃvāso”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1301_16: Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya “na maṃ koci jānātī”ti puna evaṃ paṭipajjantepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1301_17: Yo pana sayaṃ pabbajitvā vihāraṃ gantvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:1301_21: ayaṃ liṅgassa ceva saṃvāsassa ca thenitattā ubhayatthenako nāma.
tika-vin04t:1301_22: Dhuranikkhepavasena kāsāyāni apanetvā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpajjitvā puna tāni acchādetvā evaṃ paṭipajjantepi eseva nayo,
tika-vin04t:1305_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccatī”ti. ;
tika-vin04t:1306_0: Yo pana upasampanno titthiyabhāvaṃ patthayamāno sayaṃ vā kusacīrādikaṃ titthiyaliṅgaṃ ādiyati,
tika-vin04t:1306_2: naggo vā hutvā ājīvakānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tesaṃ vatāni ādiyati,
tika-vin04t:1306_4: Ṭhapetvā pana manussajātikaṃ avaseso sabbopi tiracchānagato nāma.
tika-vin04t:1306_5: Yena manussajātikā janetti sayampi manussabhūteneva sañcicca jīvitā voropitā,
tika-vin04t:1306_8: Yena antamaso gihiliṅge ṭhitopi manussajātiko khīṇāsavo sañcicca jīvitā voropito,
tika-vin04t:1306_10: Yo pana pakatattaṃ bhikkhuniṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ magge dūseti,
tika-vin04t:1306_12: Yo devadatto viya sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā catunnaṃ kammānaṃ aññataravasena saṅghaṃ bhindati,
tika-vin04t:1306_14: Yo devadatto viya duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin04t:1306_16: Yassa itthinimittuppādanakammato ca purisanimittuppādanakammato ca ubhato duvidhampi byañjanaṃ atthi,
tika-vin04t:1306_18: Iti ime terasa puggalā upasampadāya avatthū,
tika-vin04t:1306_19: ime pana ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ upasampadāpekkhe sati upasampadākammaṃ vatthusampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1307_2: pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā.
tika-vin04t:1307_3: Tattha “ayaṃ itthannāmo”ti upasampadāpekkhassa akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1307_8: Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ñattiaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1307_9: Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā “esā ñattī”ti vatvā “khamati saṅghassā”ti evaṃ ñattikittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1307_10: Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ ñattisampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1308_4: Tīsu pana anussāvanāsu yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva.
tika-vin04t:1308_5: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva,
tika-vin04t:1308_6: atha vā pana kammavācābbhantare akkharassa vā padassa vā anuccāraṇaṃ vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1308_7: Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anussāvanakaraṇaṃ akāle sāvanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1308_8: Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anussāvanāya sampannaṃ anussāvanasampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1309_0: Pubbe vuttaṃ vipattisīmālakkhaṇaṃ samatikkantāya pana sīmāya kataṃ sīmāsampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1309_4: sammukhībhūtānaṃ paṭikkosananti ime pana tayo parisādosā,
tika-vin04t:1309_5: tehi vimuttāya parisāya kataṃ parisāsampattivasena akuppaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1309_6: Kāraṇārahattā pana satthu sāsanārahattā ṭhānārahaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin04t:1309_7: Iti yo iminā evaṃ akuppena ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena upasampadākammena upasampanno,
tika-vin04t:1310_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca,
tika-vin04t:1310_5: Samāpannoti sikkhañca paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.
tika-vin04t:1310_6: Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno,
tika-vin04t:1310_10: Tattha cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānanavasena sikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvena apaccakkhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin04t:1310_12: na davā vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin04t:1310_24: sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1310_25: “gihīti maṃ dhārehi, upāsako, ārāmiko, sāmaṇero, titthiyo,
tika-vin04t:1310_27: ‘asakyaputtiyo’ti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1310_28: yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu yaṃkiñci vattukāmassa yaṃkiñci vadato sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1310_29: na rukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā paccācikkhantassa.
tika-vin04t:1311_5: sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādinā nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni “alaṃ me”tiādīni cattāri padāni,
tika-vin04t:1311_6: tesaṃyeva ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1311_7: na “paccakkhāsi”nti vā “paccakkhissa”nti vā “maṃ dhāresī”ti vā “maṃ dhāressatī”ti vā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ paccakkheyya”nti
tika-vin04t:1311_9: Evaṃ vattamāna kālavasena ceva anāmaṭṭhakālavasena ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1312_0: Payogo pana duvidho kāyiko ca vācasiko ca.
tika-vin04t:1312_1: Tattha “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā nayena yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikappayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1312_2: na akkharalikhanaṃ vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyappayogaṃ karontassa.
tika-vin04t:1313_4: so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti.
tika-vin04t:1313_9: Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati.
tika-vin04t:1314_3: sace te yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye jānanti,
tika-vin04t:1314_4: evaṃ tassa vacanānantarameva tassa “ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānanti,
tika-vin04t:1314_6: Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti cintetvā jānanti,
tika-vin04t:1314_9: Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1314_15: Iti imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ vā vasena,
tika-vin04t:1314_16: sabbaso vā pana apaccakkhānena sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya sikkhāpaccakkhānasseva ca atthabhūtaṃ ekaccaṃ dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā.
tika-vin04t:1315_0: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti ettha methunaṃ dhammanti rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisānaṃ ubhinnaṃ dhammaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1315_7: Asaṃvāsoti pakatattā bhikkhū saha vasanti etthāti ekakammādikova tividhopi vidhi saṃvāso nāma,
tika-vin04t:1315_9: Saṅghakammesu hi esa gaṇapūrakopi na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1316_2: tāsaṃ vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhamaggavasena tayo tayo katvā nava maggā,
tika-vin04t:1316_4: Purisānaṃ pana vaccamaggamukhamaggavasena dve dve katvā cha maggā,
tika-vin04t:1316_6: Tesu attano vā paresaṃ vā yassa kassaci maggassa santhatassa vā asanthatassa vā,
tika-vin04t:1316_7: paresaṃ pana matānampi akkhāyitassa vā yebhuyyena akkhāyitassa vā pakativātena asaṃphuṭṭhe allokāse yo
tika-vin04t:1316_8: bhikkhu ekatilabījamattampi attano aṅgajātaṃ santhataṃ vā asanthataṃ vā sevanacittena paveseti,
tika-vin04t:1316_9: parena vā pavesiyamāne pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu yaṃkiñci sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:1322_0: Ñatvā yojeyya medhāvī, tattha tattha yathārahanti.
tika-vin04t:1323_0: Tattha nidānaṃ nāma vesāli- rājagaha- sāvatthi- āḷavi- kosambi- sagga-
tika-vin04t:1323_3: Puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ ārabbha taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1323_4: Vatthu nāma tassa tassa puggalassa ajjhācāro vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1323_7: Tattha anuppannapaññatti nāma anuppanne dose paññattā,
tika-vin04t:1323_11: gaṇaṅgaṇūpāhanā dhuvanhānaṃ cammattharaṇanti etesaṃ vasena catubbidhā padesapaññatti nāma.
tika-vin04t:1323_17: tasmā anuppannapaññattiñca sabbatthapaññattidukañca ekatopaññattidukañca ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ catassannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1323_23: Iti imāsaṃ āṇattādīnampi vasena sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1324_0: Samuṭṭhānavidhinti sabbāpattīnaṃ kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni ekaṅgikadvaṅgikativaṅgikāni.
tika-vin04t:1324_4: Tesu ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā chahi vā samuṭṭhānehi āpattiyo samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin04t:1324_6: Tattha ekasamuṭṭhānā nāma catutthena ca pañcamena ca chaṭṭhena ca samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1324_8: Dvisamuṭṭhānā nāma paṭhamacatutthehi ca dutiyapañcamehi ca tatiyachaṭṭhehi ca catutthachaṭṭhehi ca pañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi,
tika-vin04t:1324_14: Catusamuṭṭhānā nāma paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi ca dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1328_1: tā paṭhamapaññattisikkhāpadavasena samuṭṭhānato terasa nāmāni labhanti paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānā,
tika-vin04t:1328_37: Iti imassa samuṭṭhānavidhinopi vasena sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1329_0: Kiriyāsaññācittehi nānattanti etehi kiriyādīhi sabbāpattīnaṃ nānābhāvaṃ ñatvā sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1329_8: Tattha yā kāyena vā vācāya vā pathavikhaṇanādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ karontassa hoti,
tika-vin04t:1329_10: Yā kāyavācāhi kattabbaṃ akarontassa hoti paṭhamakathināpatti viya,
tika-vin04t:1329_12: Yā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya,
tika-vin04t:1329_15: siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya,
tika-vin04t:1329_16: ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
tika-vin04t:1329_17: Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontākarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti viya,
tika-vin04t:1329_18: ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
tika-vin04t:1330_0: Sabbāpattiyo ca saññāvasena duvidhā honti saññāvimokkhā nosaññāvimokkhāti.
tika-vin04t:1330_4: Puna ca sabbāpi cittavasena duvidhā honti sacittakā acittakā cāti.
tika-vin04t:1330_5: Tattha yā sacittakasamuṭṭhānavaseneva samuṭṭhāti ayaṃ sacittakā.
tika-vin04t:1330_6: Yā acittakena vā sacittakamissakena vā samuṭṭhāti ayaṃ acittakā.
tika-vin04t:1331_0: Vajjakammappabhedanti ettha sabbāpattiyo vajjavasena duvidhā honti lokavajjā paṇṇattivajjā cāti.
tika-vin04t:1331_1: Tattha yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin04t:1331_9: Iti iminā vajjakammappabhedenāpi sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1332_1: Āpattiṃ āpajjamāno hi akusalacitto vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacitto vā,
tika-vin04t:1332_3: Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu akusalacittavasena ekaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1333_2: ñatvāti idaṃ nidānādivedanāttikapariyosānaṃ sattarasappakāraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ jānitvā yojeyya medhāvī.
tika-vin04t:1333_3: Tattha tattha yathārahanti paṇḍito bhikkhu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yathānurūpaṃ yojeyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1333_5: tasmā naṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayapariyosāne imaṃ mātikaṃ anuddharitvāva yojetvā dassayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1334_1: idaṃ vesāliyaṃ sudinnattheraṃ ārabbha methunavītikkamavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1334_3: “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti ca “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti ca dve anupaññattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1334_4: Anupaññatti ca nāmesā āpattikarā ca hoti aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu viya,
tika-vin04t:1334_8: Ito paraṃ pana yattha anupaññatti atthi,
tika-vin04t:1334_10: Ṭhapetvā pana anupaññattiṃ avasesā paññattiyevāti sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1334_11: Bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppannavatthusmiṃyeva “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti evaṃ bhikkhunīnampi paññattito sādhāraṇapaññatti.
tika-vin04t:1334_13: Bhikkhuṃ pana āṇāpento akappiyasamādānāpattito na muccati,
tika-vin04t:1334_15: jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā sabbaso chinne nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin04t:1334_16: tattha antamaso aṅgajāte uṭṭhitaṃ anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ pīḷakaṃ vā cammakhilaṃ vā pavesentassāpi sevanacitte sati pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1334_17: naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ vā lomaṃ vā pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1334_18: sace nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi anavasesetvā sabbaso maggo uppāṭito,
tika-vin04t:1334_20: tathā manussānaṃ akkhināsākaṇṇacchiddavatthikosesu satthakena katavaṇe vā,
tika-vin04t:1334_22: Tiracchānānaṃ pana akkhikaṇṇanāsāvaṇesu ahimacchādīnaṃ pavesanappamāṇavirahite aṇunimitte sabbesañca upakacchakādīsu sesasarīresu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1334_23: Matasarīre nimitte upaḍḍhakkhāyitato paṭṭhāya yāva na kuthitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1334_26: tathā vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1334_27: Oṭṭhato bahi nikkhantajivhāya vā dantesu vā thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1334_28: Nimittato bahi patitamaṃsapesiyaṃ dukkaṭanti ayamettha āpattibhedo.
tika-vin04t:1335_0: Ajānantassa asādiyantassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikānañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1335_1: Ettha pana yo niddaṃ okkantattā parena katampi upakkamaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1335_8: Dvinnampi ca etesaṃ aggisuvaṇṇagūthacandanādīsu samappavattibhāvena ajānanabhāvova pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1335_9: Yo adhimattavedanāya āturattā kiñci na jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1335_15: Tassā dve aṅgāni sevanacittañca maggena maggapaṭipādanañcāti.
tika-vin04t:1335_23: imāni ca samuṭṭhānādīni nāma āpattiyā honti,
tika-vin04t:1335_25: Vohārasukhatthaṃ pana sabbaṭṭhakathāsu sikkhāpadasīsena desanā āgatā,
tika-vin04t:1335_26: tasmā aññesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā adhippetameva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1342_0: Dutiye gāmā vā araññāvāti ettha sabbopi ekakuṭikādibhedo parikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā samanusso vā
tika-vin04t:1342_1: amanusso vā antamaso atirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho yo koci satthopi “gāmo”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1342_2: Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1342_3: Tattha asammohatthaṃ gharaṃ gharūpacāro gāmo gāmūpacāroti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1342_5: Yaṃ pana dvāre ṭhito mātugāmo bhājanadhovanaudakaṃ chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin04t:1342_6: tassa patanaṭṭhānañca mātugāmeneva antogehe ṭhitena pakatiyā bahi khittassa suppassa vā saṃmuñjaniyā
tika-vin04t:1342_7: vā patanaṭṭhānañca gharassa purato dvīsu koṇesu sambandhitvā majjhe rukkhasūcidvāraṃ ṭhapetvā gorūpānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1342_8: pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ kataparikkhepo ca ayaṃ sabbopi gharūpacāro nāma.
tika-vin04t:1342_10: tassa gharassa tādise gharūpacāre ṭhitassa thāmamajjhimassa purisassa yathā taruṇamanussā attano balaṃ dassento bāhuṃ pasāretvā leḍḍuṃ khipanti,
tika-vin04t:1342_11: evaṃ khittassa leḍḍussa patanaṭṭhānabbhantaraṃ gāmo nāma.
tika-vin04t:1342_12: Tato aññassa leḍḍupātassa abbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro nāma.
tika-vin04t:1342_13: Patitassa pana leḍḍuno pavattitvā gataṭṭhānaṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1342_14: Parikkhittassa pana gāmassa parikkhepoyeva gāmassa paricchedo,
tika-vin04t:1342_15: tassa sace dve indakhilā honti abbhantarime indakhile ṭhitassa leḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro nāma.
tika-vin04t:1342_16: Padabhājanepi hi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1342_17: Tattha yvāyaṃ aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro dassito,
tika-vin04t:1342_18: tassa vasena vikāle gāmappavesanādīsu āpatti paricchinditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1342_19: Iti imaṃ ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ imasmiṃ sikkhāpade araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1342_21: Ye pana imesaṃ paricchedadassanatthaṃ gharagharūpacāragāmūpacārā vuttā,
tika-vin04t:1343_12: tasmā byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthameva dassetuṃ “theyyacitto avaharaṇacitto”ti evamassa padabhājanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1344_1: Te pana avahārā pañca pañcakāni samodhānetvā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1344_2: Pañca pañcakāni nāma nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ ekabhaṇḍapañcakaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakanti.
tika-vin04t:1344_3: Tattha purimāni dve pañcakāni etasseva padassa padabhājane vuttānaṃ “ādiyeyya hareyya avahareyya iriyāpathaṃ
tika-vin04t:1344_4: vikopeyya ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ vasena labbhanti.
tika-vin04t:1344_13: Hareyyāti aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto sīse bhāraṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1344_18: Avahareyyāti upanikkhittaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ “dehi me bhaṇḍa”nti vuccamāno “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti bhaṇati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1344_23: Iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyyāti “saha bhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin04t:1344_27: Ṭhānā cāveyyāti thalaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1344_33: Sasāmikassa pana dāsassa vā tiracchānagatassa vā yathāvuttena abhiyogādinā nayena ādiyanaharaṇaavaharaṇairiyāpathavikopanaṭhānācāvanavasena
tika-vin04t:1345_2: Tattha sāhatthiko nāma parassa bhaṇḍaṃ sahatthā avaharati.
tika-vin04t:1345_3: Āṇattiko nāma “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti.
tika-vin04t:1345_4: Nissaggiyo nāma suṅkaghātakaparikappitokāsānaṃ anto ṭhatvā bahi pātanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1345_7: Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin04t:1345_9: Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakatelaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1346_4: khilādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1346_5: Saṃvidhāvahāro nāma “asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā saṃmantayitvā avaharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1346_6: Evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gatesu hi ekenāpi tasmiṃ bhaṇḍe ṭhānā cāvite sabbesaṃ avahārā honti.
tika-vin04t:1346_8: Sace hi purebhattādīsu yaṃkiñci kālaṃ paricchinditvā “asukasmiṃ kāle itthannāmaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti vutto saṅketato apacchā apure taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin04t:1346_11: Sace hi evaṃ katanimittato apacchā apure “yaṃ avaharā”ti vutto,
tika-vin04t:1347_2: Tattha yo sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati,
tika-vin04t:1347_5: Yo pana pasayha balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya,
tika-vin04t:1347_6: attano pattabalito vā vuttanayeneva adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya,
tika-vin04t:1347_14: na gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappetvā andhakāre pasibbakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1347_18: Bahi nīharitvā muñcitvā “sutta”nti ñatvā puna āharitvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin04t:1347_30: Sāmikesu nivattesu sayaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya “pagevetaṃ mayā gahitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1348_1: ekacco pana parapariveṇādīni paviṭṭho kiñci lobhaneyyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ disvā gabbhadvārapamukhaheṭṭhāpāsādadvārakoṭṭhakarukkhamūlādivasena
tika-vin04t:1348_6: tassa taṃ ādāya parikappitaparicchedaṃ atikkantamatte avahāro hoti.
tika-vin04t:1348_9: Evamimesaṃ dvinnampi parikappānaṃ vasena parikappetvā gaṇhato avahāro “parikappāvahāro”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1349_2: yo bhikkhu uyyānādīsu paresaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhapitaaṅgulimuddikādīni disvā “pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin04t:1349_3: tassa ettāvatā uddhāro natthīti na tāva avahāro hoti.
tika-vin04t:1349_4: Yadā pana sāmikā vicinantā apassitvā “sve jānissāmā”ti sālayāva gatā honti,
tika-vin04t:1349_6: Paṭicchannakāleyeva “etaṃ mama santaka”nti sakasaññāya vā “gatā dāni te,
tika-vin04t:1349_7: chaṭṭitabhaṇḍaṃ ida”nti paṃsukūlasaññāya vā gaṇhantassa pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1349_8: Tesu dutiyatatiyadivase āgantvā vicinitvā adisvā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gatesupi gahitaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyameva.
tika-vin04t:1349_9: Pacchā ñatvā codiyamānassa adadato sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepe avahāro hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1349_10: Yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1349_11: Yo pana tathārūpaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhitaṃyeva appaṭicchādetvā theyyacitto pādena akkamitvā kaddame vā vālukāya vā paveseti,
tika-vin04t:1350_0: Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ kusāvahāro nāma.
tika-vin04t:1350_2: yo bhikkhu vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃkiñci kusaṃ pātetvā cīvare bhājīyamāne attano
tika-vin04t:1350_3: koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitaṃ appagghataraṃ vā mahagghataraṃ vā samasamaṃ vā agghena parassa koṭṭhāsaṃ haritukāmo
tika-vin04t:1350_4: attano koṭṭhāse patitaṃ kusaṃ parassa koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddharati,
tika-vin04t:1350_7: Yadā pana tasmiṃ patite parassa koṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati,
tika-vin04t:1350_9: Sace paṭhamataraṃ parakoṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati,
tika-vin04t:1350_12: attano koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusaṃ uddharato uddhāreyeva rakkhati,
tika-vin04t:1350_13: taṃ uddharitvā parakoṭṭhāse pātentassa hatthato muttamatte avahāro.
tika-vin04t:1350_15: Iti yaṃ vuttaṃ “ādiyeyyāti pañcavīsatiyā avahārānaṃ aññataravasena hareyyā”ti,
tika-vin04t:1351_3: aññe pana tathā kareyyuṃ vā na kareyyuṃ vāti te nappamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1351_8: Corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosīti imehi vacanehi paribhāseyyuṃ.
tika-vin04t:1351_9: Kīdisassa pana adinnassa ādāne rājāno evaṃ karonti?
tika-vin04t:1351_11: Tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamānoti tādisaṃ bhikkhu porāṇakassa kahāpaṇassa pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1351_12: bhaṇḍaṃ adinnaṃ bhūmiādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ yaṃkiñci sajīvanijjīvaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ avahārānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1351_13: yena kenaci avahārena avaharanto pārājiko hoti,
tika-vin04t:1352_0: Rājagahe dhaniyattheraṃ ārabbha rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1352_7: Ādiyantassa māsake vā ūnamāsake vā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1352_10: Sabbattha gahaṇakālavasena ca gahaṇadesavasena ca paribhogabhājanaparivattanādīhi ca parihīnāparihīnavasena vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1352_23: vuttappakārānaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena avaharaṇañcāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1355_3: Jīvitā voropeyyāti kalalakālepi tāpanamaddanehi vā bhesajjasampadānena vā tato vā uddhampi tadanurūpena upakkamena jīvitā viyojeyya.
tika-vin04t:1355_13: Pāṇātipātassa payogoti pāṇātipātassa cha payogā sāhatthiko nissaggiyo āṇattiko thāvaro vijjāmayo iddhimayoti.
tika-vin04t:1355_14: Tattha sāhatthikoti sayaṃ mārentassa kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1355_15: Nissaggiyoti dūre ṭhitaṃ māretukāmassa kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā ususattiyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1355_19: “Yo koci maratū”ti evaṃ anuddissake pahārappaccayā yassa kassaci maraṇena kammabaddho.
tika-vin04t:1355_23: Āṇattikoti “asukaṃ nāma mārehī”ti aññaṃ āṇāpentassa āṇāpanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1357_0: Vatthu kālo ca okāso, āvudhaṃ iriyāpatho;
tika-vin04t:1359_1: Yañhi puggalaṃ “mārehī”ti āṇatto sace tameva māreti,
tika-vin04t:1359_8: Sace hi “purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto purebhattameva māreti,
tika-vin04t:1359_11: tato pacchā vā pure vā māreti,
tika-vin04t:1359_14: Thāvaroti asaṃhārimena upakaraṇena māretukāmassa opātakkhaṇanaṃ apassenasaṃvidhānaṃ asiādīnaṃ upanikkhipanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1360_0: Satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti ettha haratīti hārakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1360_12: Padabhājane panassa byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā yaṃ ettha thāvarapayogasaṅgahitaṃ satthaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1360_14: Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyāti vācāya vā tālapaṇṇādīsu likhitvā vā “yo evaṃ marati,
tika-vin04t:1360_15: so dhanaṃ vā labhatī”tiādinā nayena maraṇe guṇaṃ pakāseyya.
tika-vin04t:1360_16: Etena yathā “adinnādāne ādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyakathāya muccati, nayidha,
tika-vin04t:1360_17: evaṃ “saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vacanato pana idha pariyāyakathāyapi na muccatīti ayamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1360_18: Maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti “satthaṃ vā āharā”tiādinā nayena maraṇatthāya upāyaṃ gāhāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:1360_22: Iti cittamanoti iti citto iti mano.
tika-vin04t:1360_23: “Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”tiettha vuttamaraṇacitto maraṇamanoti attho.
tika-vin04t:1360_25: Tenevassa padabhājane “yaṃ cittaṃ taṃ mano”ti āha.
tika-vin04t:1360_31: Tañca saṃvidahanaṃ imasmiṃ atthe saññācetanādhippāyehi saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1360_32: tasmā “iti cittasaṅkappo”ti “mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”tiettha vuttamaraṇasaññī maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:1360_35: vīriyamārabhato daḷha”ntiādinā nayena dhammaṃ bhāsantassa saṃvaṇṇanā nāma na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin04t:1360_38: Pārājiko hotīti taṅkhaṇūpapannampi manussaviggahaṃ vuttanayena jīvitā voropento pārājiko hotīti.
tika-vin04t:1361_0: Vesāliyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1361_5: anodissa khate opāte yassa kassaci patanepi dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1361_11: Iminā nayena sabbattha payogabhedavasena āpattibhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1361_12: Asañcicca mārentassa ajānantassa namaraṇādhippāyassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1361_13: Tattha asañciccāti “iminā upakkamena imaṃ māremī”ti acetetvā katena upakkamena musalussāpanavatthusmiṃ viya pare matepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1361_14: Ajānantassāti “iminā ayaṃ marissatī”ti ajānantassa upakkamena visagatapiṇḍapātavatthusmiṃ viya pare matepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1361_15: Namaraṇādhippāyassāti maraṇaṃ anicchantassa upakkamena bhesajjavatthusmiṃ viya pare matepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1364_0: Catutthe anabhijānanti sakasantāne anuppannattā attani atthibhāvaṃ ajānanto.
tika-vin04t:1364_2: Attupanāyikanti attani taṃ upaneti “mayi atthī”ti samudācaranto,
tika-vin04t:1364_3: attānaṃ vā tattha upaneti “ahaṃ ettha sandissāmī”ti samudācarantoti attupanāyiko,
tika-vin04t:1364_7: cakkhunā ca diṭṭhamiva dhammaṃ paccakkhakaraṇato dassanatthena dassananti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1364_9: alaṃ pariyattaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ ariyañāṇadassanamettha jhānādibhede uttarimanussadhamme,
tika-vin04t:1364_12: Samudācareyyāti vuttappakārametaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā tadubhayena vā viññussa manussajātikassa āroceyya.
tika-vin04t:1364_14: attupanāyikañhi katvā vinā aññāpadesena samudācaranto evaṃ samudācarati,
tika-vin04t:1364_18: so sabbo idheva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1364_19: “Iti jānāmi iti passāmī”ti hi vadanto na yidaṃ vacanamattameva vadati,
tika-vin04t:1364_20: atha kho “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena ayaṃ dhammo mayi atthī”ti dīpeti,
tika-vin04t:1364_21: “samāpajji”ntiādīni ca vadantena hi samāpajjanādīhi kāraṇehi atthitā dīpitā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1364_22: tena vuttaṃ “yvāyaṃ padabhājane paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ,
tika-vin04t:1364_26: Tato aparena samayenāti tato ārocitakālato aññatarasmiṃ kāle.
tika-vin04t:1364_29: Āpattiṃ pana āpanno yasmā parena codito vā acodito vā paṭijānāti,
tika-vin04t:1364_32: Visuddhāpekkhoti attano gihibhāvādikaṃ visuddhiṃ apekkhamāno icchamāno.
tika-vin04t:1364_34: tasmā bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā abhabbo jhānādīni adhigantuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1364_35: iccassa bhikkhubhāvo visuddhi nāma na hoti.
tika-vin04t:1364_36: Yasmā pana gihi vā upāsakārāmikasāmaṇerānaṃ vā aññataro hutvā dānādīhi saggamaggaṃ vā jhānādīhi mokkhamaggaṃ vā ārādhetuṃ bhabbo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1364_44: Tucchaṃ musā vilapinti ahaṃ vacanatthavirahato tucchaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1364_45: vañcanādhippāyato musā vilapiṃ abhaṇinti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1364_46: Aññatra adhimānāti yvāyaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddhavipassakassa apatte pattasaññitāsaṅkhāto adhimāno uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:1364_47: taṃ adhimānaṃ ṭhapetvā kevalaṃ pāpicchatāya yo samudācareyya,
tika-vin04t:1365_0: Vesāliyaṃ vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha tesaṃ uttarimanussadhammārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1365_4: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”ntiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ asantaṃ jhānādidhammaṃ ārocentassa sace yassa kassaci āroceti,
tika-vin04t:1365_6: anantarameva “ayaṃ jhānalābhī”ti vā “ariyo”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena tamatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1365_11: so bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjī”tiādinā nayena aññāpadesena ārocentassa jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1367_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammātiidaṃ idha uddiṭṭhapārājikaparidīpanameva.
tika-vin04t:1367_1: Samodhānetvā pana sabbāneva catuvīsati pārājikāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin04t:1367_3: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni tāva bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri bhikkhunīnaṃ asādhāraṇāni cattārīti aṭṭha,
tika-vin04t:1367_4: tāni ekādasannaṃ paṇḍakādīnaṃ abhabbabhāvasaṅkhātehi ekādasahi pārājikehi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati,
tika-vin04t:1367_5: gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānāya bhikkhuniyā vibbhantabhāvapārājikena saddhiṃ vīsati,
tika-vin04t:1367_9: parassa aṅgajāte abhinisīdatīti imesaṃ catunnaṃ vasena “cattāri anulomapārājikānī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin04t:1367_11: purimāni ca vīsatīti samodhānetvā sabbāneva catuvīsati pārājikāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin04t:1367_12: Na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsanti uposathādibhedaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ na labhati.
tika-vin04t:1367_14: tathā pacchāti yathā pubbe gihikāle anupasampannakāle ca,
tika-vin04t:1367_15: pacchā pārājikaṃ āpannopi tatheva asaṃvāso hoti,
tika-vin04t:1367_16: natthi tassa bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ uposathādibhedo saṃvāsoti.
tika-vin04t:1367_17: Tatthāyasmante pucchāmīti tesu catūsu pārājikesu āyasmante “kaccittha parisuddhā”ti pucchāmi.
tika-vin04t:1367_19: etesu catūsu pārājikesu kacci parisuddhāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1367_20: Atha vā kaccittha parisuddhāti kacci parisuddhā attha,
tika-vin04t:1371_0: Ime kho panāti idāni vattabbānaṃ abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1371_6: na nidāne viya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti sādhāraṇavacanamattena.
tika-vin04t:1373_4: rāgūpatthambhādīsu yena kenaci aṅgajāte kammaññataṃ patte ārogyādīsu yaṃkiñci apadisitvā ajjhattarūpādīsu
tika-vin04t:1373_5: yattha katthaci mocanassādacetanāya nimitte upakkamantassa āsayadhātunānattato nīlādivasena dasavidhesu
tika-vin04t:1373_6: sukkesu yassa kassaci sukkassa ṭhānā cāvanāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1373_7: Aññatra supinantāti yā supine sukkavissaṭṭhi hoti,
tika-vin04t:1373_9: Saṅghādisesoti yā aññatra supinantā sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi,
tika-vin04t:1373_11: Vacanattho panettha saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assāti saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:1373_13: imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vuṭṭhātukāmassa yaṃ taṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1373_15: ādito sese majjhe mānattadānatthāya mūlāya paṭikassanena vā saha mānattadānatthāya,
tika-vin04t:1373_17: na hettha ekampi kammaṃ vinā saṅghena sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-vin04t:1373_18: Iti saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assāti saṅghādisesoti.
tika-vin04t:1374_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ seyyasakaṃ ārabbha upakkamitvā asucimocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1374_4: Sace pana parena attano aṅgajāte upakkamaṃ kāretvā mocāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1374_6: Cetetvā antamaso ākāse kaṭikampanenapi nimitte upakkamantassa sace na muccati,
tika-vin04t:1374_8: Sace pana antamaso yaṃ ekā khuddakamakkhikā piveyya,
tika-vin04t:1374_11: Ṭhānato pana cutaṃ avassameva dakasotaṃ otarati,
tika-vin04t:1374_12: tasmā “dakasotaṃ otiṇṇamatte bahi nikkhante vā anikkhante vā saṅghādiseso”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1377_0: Dutiye otiṇṇoti yakkhādīhi viya sattā anto uppajjantena rāgena vā otiṇṇo,
tika-vin04t:1377_1: kūpādīni viya sattā asamapekkhitvā rajjanīye ṭhāne rajjanto sayaṃ vā rāgaṃ otiṇṇo,
tika-vin04t:1377_3: Vipariṇatena cittenāti parisuddhabhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātaṃ pakatiṃ vijahitvā aññathā pavattena,
tika-vin04t:1377_4: virūpaṃ vā pariṇatena yathā parivattamānaṃ virūpaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1377_5: evaṃ vuttarāgavasena parivattetvā ṭhitena cittenāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1377_9: Tattha hattho nāma kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā.
tika-vin04t:1377_10: Veṇī nāma vinandhitvā vā avinandhitvā vā suddhakesehi vā nīlādivaṇṇasuttakusumakahāpaṇamālāsuvaṇṇacīrakamuttāvaḷiādīsu
tika-vin04t:1377_12: Veṇiggahaṇena cettha kesāpi gahitāyeva saddhiṃ lomehi.
tika-vin04t:1377_15: Avasesassa sarīrassa parāmasanaṃ aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1377_16: Yo taṃ hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ samāpajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1378_3: itthiyā itthisaññino antamaso lomena lomaṃ phusantassāpi,
tika-vin04t:1378_4: itthiyā vā phusiyamānassa sevanādhippāyena vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭijānantassa saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:1378_5: Ekena pana hatthena gahetvā dutiyena hatthena divasampi tattha tattha phusantassa ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:1378_6: aggahetvā phusanto pana sace sīsato yāva pādā,
tika-vin04t:1378_10: Sace pana nānitthīnaṃ pañcaṅguliyo ekato gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1378_18: Itthiyā phusiyamānassa sevanādhippāyassāpi kāyena avāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭijānantassa,
tika-vin04t:1381_0: Tatiye otiṇṇatā ca vipariṇatacittatā ca duṭṭhullavācassādarāgavasena veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1381_9: Saṅghādisesoti dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena vaṇṇāvaṇṇehi vā methunayācanādīhi vā “sikharaṇīsi,
tika-vin04t:1381_11: ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imesu tīsu aññatarena akkosavacanena vā mātugāmaṃ obhāsantassa saṅghādiseso nāma āpattinikāyo hotīti.
tika-vin04t:1382_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha duṭṭhullavācāhi obhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1382_3: itthiyā itthisaññino antamaso hatthamuddāyapi vuttanayena obhāsantassa sace sā tamatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1382_8: sambahulā ca itthiyo ekavācāya obhāsantassa vācāgaṇanāya ceva itthigaṇanāya ca āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1382_14: ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ kāyappaṭibaddhañca ādissa vaṇṇādibhaṇane sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1385_0: Catutthe otiṇṇatā ca vipariṇatacittatā ca attakāmapāricariyāvasena veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1385_1: Mātugāmassa santiketi duṭṭhullobhāsane vuttappakārāya itthiyā samīpe.
tika-vin04t:1385_6: attakāmā ca sā pāricariyā cāti attakāmapāricariyā,
tika-vin04t:1385_11: yā mādisaṃ pāṇātipātādīhi virahitattā sīlavantaṃ methunadhammā virahitattā brahmacāriṃ tadubhayenāpi
tika-vin04t:1385_13: tassā evaṃ mādisaṃ paricarantiyā yā ayaṃ pāricariyā nāma,
tika-vin04t:1385_15: Methunupasaṃhitena saṅghādisesoti evaṃ attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto ca “arahasi tvaṃ mayhaṃ methunadhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1386_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇabhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1386_3: itthiyā itthisaññino antamaso hatthamuddāyapi vuttanayeneva attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa sace sā tamatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1386_9: Cīvarādīhi vatthukāmehi pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1389_3: Tattha itthiyā vā purisamatinti purisena vā tassa mātāpitādīhi vā pesito purisassa matiṃ adhippāyaṃ itthiyā āroceyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1389_4: Purisassa vā itthimatinti itthiyā vā tassā mātāpitādīhi vā pesito itthiyā matiṃ adhippāyaṃ purisassa āroceyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1389_5: Jāyattane vā jārattane vāti jāyabhāve vā jārabhāve vā.
tika-vin04t:1389_6: Purisassa hi matiṃ itthiyā ārocento jāyattane āroceti,
tika-vin04t:1389_7: itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocento jārattane āroceti.
tika-vin04t:1389_8: Apica purisasseva matiṃ itthiyā ārocento jāyattane vā āroceti nibaddhabhariyabhāve,
tika-vin04t:1389_12: Eteneva upāyena itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocanepi “pati bhavissasi,
tika-vin04t:1389_14: Antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapīti sabbantimena paricchedena yā ayaṃ taṅkhaṇe muhuttamatte saṃvasitabbato “taṅkhaṇikā”ti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1389_16: Tassāpi “muhuttikā bhavissasī”ti evaṃ purisassa matiṃ ārocentassa saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin04t:1389_17: eteneva upāyena “muhuttiko bhavissasī”ti evaṃ purisassa itthimatiṃ ārocentopi saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1390_6: aññatra nālaṃvacanīyāya yāya kāyaci itthiyā antamaso mātuyāpi purisamatiṃ ārocento “hohi kira bhariyā
tika-vin04t:1390_7: dhanakkītā”ti vattukāmo sacepi chandavāsinīādīsu aññatarākārena ārocetvā tāya “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitepi
tika-vin04t:1390_11: Sā pana tassa bhariyā hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin04t:1390_14: taṃ adisvā aññatarassa avassārocanakassa “ārocehī”ti vatvā paccāharati,
tika-vin04t:1390_16: “Māturakkhitaṃ brūhī”ti pesitassa pana gantvā aññaṃ piturakkhitādīsu aññataraṃ vadantassa visaṅketaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1390_17: purisassa vā itthiyā vā vacanaṃ “sādhū”ti kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā paṭiggaṇhitvā tassā itthiyā
tika-vin04t:1390_18: vā purisassa vā ārocetvā vā ārocāpetvā vā puna yena pesito,
tika-vin04t:1390_19: tassa taṃ pavattiṃ sayaṃ ārocentassa vā aññena ārocāpentassa vā saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:1390_23: ito pana yehi kehici dvīhi aṅgehi,
tika-vin04t:1390_26: Saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā gilānassa vā kiccena gacchantassa,
tika-vin04t:1391_0: Sīlavipatti, yesu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjati, tesaṃ manussajātikatā, na nālaṃvacanīyatā,
tika-vin04t:1392_2: paṇṇattiṃ vā alaṃvacanīyabhāvaṃ vā ajānantassa kāyavikārena sāsanaṃ gahetvā tatheva vīmaṃsitvā tatheva paccāharantassa kāyato samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin04t:1392_4: tassā cittaṃ jāneyyāthā”ti kenaci vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ āgataṃ vatvā puna tasmiṃ purise
tika-vin04t:1392_5: āgate ārocentassa kāyena kiñci akatattā vācato samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin04t:1392_6: Vācāya “sādhū”ti sāsanaṃ gahetvā aññena karaṇīyena tassā gharaṃ gantvā aññattha vā gamanakāle taṃ disvā
tika-vin04t:1392_7: vacībhedena vīmaṃsitvā punapi aññeneva kāraṇena tato apakkamma kadācideva taṃ purisaṃ disvā ārocentassāpi
tika-vin04t:1392_9: Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassa pana khīṇāsavassāpi pituvacanena gantvā alaṃvacanīyaṃ mātarampi “ehi me pitaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1392_12: Tadubhayaṃ pana jānitvā eteheva tīhi nayehi samāpajjantassa tāneva tīṇi tadubhayajānanacittena sacittakāni honti, kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1395_0: Chaṭṭhe saññācikāya panāti ettha saññācikā nāma sayaṃ pavattitayācanā vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1395_1: tasmā saññācikāyāti attano yācanāyāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1395_3: Ettha ca yaṃkiñci parapariggahitakaṃ mūlacchedavasena yācituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1395_7: purisattakaro nāma vaḍḍhakiādinā purisena kātabbaṃ hatthakammaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1395_8: Taṃ “purisattakaraṃ dehī”ti vā “hatthakammaṃ dehī”ti vā vatvā yācituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1395_9: Hatthakammaṃ nāma kiñci vatthu na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1395_11: āgatatthā”ti pucchite vā apucchite vā yācituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1395_15: Tattha ullittā nāma ṭhapetvā thambhatulāpiṭṭhasaṅghāṭavātapānadhūmacchiddādibhedaṃ alepokāsaṃ avasese
tika-vin04t:1395_16: lepokāse kuṭṭehi saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā chadanassa anto sudhāya vā mattikāya vā littā.
tika-vin04t:1395_17: Avalittā nāma tatheva vuttanayeneva chadanassa bahi littā.
tika-vin04t:1395_18: Ullittāvalittā nāma tatheva chadanassa anto ca bahi ca littā.
tika-vin04t:1395_22: Attuddesanti “mayhaṃ vāsāgāraṃ esā”ti evaṃ attā uddeso etissāti attuddesā,
tika-vin04t:1395_25: Tatridaṃ pamāṇanti tassā kuṭiyā idaṃ pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1395_27: Dvādasa vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyātiettha sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo,
tika-vin04t:1395_29: Minantena pana kuṭiyā bahikuṭṭe paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ mahāmattikapariyantaṃ aggahetvā thusapiṇḍapariyantena dvādasa vidatthiyo minetabbā,
tika-vin04t:1395_34: Sattantarāti kuṭṭassa bahiantaṃ aggahetvā abbhantarimena antena satta sugatavidatthiyo pamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1395_35: Ettha ca kesaggamattampi dīghato hāpetvā tiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1395_36: tiriyato vā hāpetvā dīghaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1395_40: yattha pamāṇayutto mañco ito cito ca na parivaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1395_44: Bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāyāti yasmiṃ padese kuṭiṃ kāretukāmo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1395_45: taṃ sodhetvā padabhājane vuttanayena saṅghaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācitvā sabbe vā saṅghapariyāpannā saṅghena vā
tika-vin04t:1395_46: sammatā dve tayo bhikkhū tattha vatthudesanatthāya netabbā.
tika-vin04t:1395_47: Tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamananti tehi bhikkhūhi kipillikādīnaṃ āsayādīhi terasahi,
tika-vin04t:1395_49: dvīhi vā catūhi vā balibaddhehi yuttena sakaṭena ekaṃ cakkaṃ nibbodakapatanaṭṭhāne ekaṃ bahi katvā āvijjhituṃ
tika-vin04t:1395_50: sakkuṇeyyatāya saparikkamananti sallakkhetvā sace saṅghapahonakā honti, tattheva, no ce,
tika-vin04t:1395_51: saṅghamajjhaṃ gantvā tena bhikkhunā yācitehi ñattidutiyena kammena vatthu desetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1396_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha saññācikāya kuṭikaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1396_3: “adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ kuṭiṃ kāressāmī”ti upakaraṇatthaṃ araññaṃ gamanato paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1396_4: “idāni dvīhi piṇḍehi niṭṭhānaṃ gamissatī”ti tesu paṭhamapiṇḍadāne thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1396_5: dutiyadānena lepe ghaṭite sace adesitavatthukā eva vā pamāṇātikkantā eva vā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1396_11: Sace pana dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvāva mattikāya limpati,
tika-vin04t:1396_12: ṭhapite ca tasmiṃ lepo na ghaṭiyati,
tika-vin04t:1396_15: Sace taṃ ṭhapiyamānaṃ paṭhamadinnalepena saddhiṃ nirantarameva hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1396_23: vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā uposathāgārādīsu aññataratthāya kārentassa ca ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1396_31: lepaghaṭanāti imānettha cha vā satta vā aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1396_35: Idañhi vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ vā karoto kiriyato samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1399_0: Sattame mahallakanti sasāmikabhāvena saññācitakuṭito mahantabhāvo etassa atthīti mahallako,
tika-vin04t:1399_1: yasmā vā vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkamenāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1399_4: Yasmā panassa taṃ pamāṇamahantattaṃ sasāmikattāva labbhati,
tika-vin04t:1399_5: tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko vuccatī”ti evamassa padabhājane vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1400_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattabhāvo,
tika-vin04t:1403_0: Aṭṭhame duṭṭho dosoti dūsito ceva dūsako ca.
tika-vin04t:1403_1: Uppanne hi dose puggalo tena dosena dūsito hoti,
tika-vin04t:1403_6: Iti “duṭṭho doso”ti ekassevetaṃ puggalassa ākāranānattena nidassanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1403_10: Amūlakenāti yaṃ codakena cuditakamhi puggale adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1403_11: idaṃ etesaṃ dassanasavanaparisaṅkāsaṅkhātānaṃ mūlānaṃ abhāvato amūlakaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1403_12: Taṃ pana so āpanno vā hotu,
tika-vin04t:1403_15: Ettha ca adiṭṭhaṃ nāma attano pasādacakkhunā vā dibbacakkhunā vā adiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1403_16: assutaṃ nāma tatheva kenaci vuccamānaṃ na sutaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1403_17: aparisaṅkitaṃ nāma attano vā parassa vā diṭṭhasutamutavasena cetasā aparisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1403_20: padabhājane pana pārājikuddese āgatāneva gahetvā “catunnaṃ aññatarenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1403_22: Taṃ pana anuddhaṃsanaṃ yasmā attanā codentopi parena codāpentopi karoti,
tika-vin04t:1403_23: tasmāssa padabhājane “codeti vā codāpeti vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1403_24: Tattha vatthusandassanā āpattisandassanā saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo sāmīcippaṭikkhepoti saṅkhepato catasso codanā.
tika-vin04t:1403_25: Tāsu vatthusandassanā nāma “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”tiādinā nayena pavattā.
tika-vin04t:1403_26: Āpattisandassanā nāma “tvaṃ methunadhammāpattiṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena pavattā.
tika-vin04t:1403_27: Saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo nāma “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavatto.
tika-vin04t:1403_31: taṃ paṭipātiyā vandanādīni karoto ekassa akatvā sesānaṃ karaṇakāle veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1403_34: “Kasmā mama vandanādīni na karosī”ti pucchite pana “assamaṇosī”tiādivacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ eti,
tika-vin04t:1403_35: tasmā yo bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ samīpe ṭhatvā “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti vā “assamaṇosī”ti vā ādīhi
tika-vin04t:1403_36: vacanehi hatthamuddāya eva vā etamatthaṃ dīpento sayaṃ vā codeti,
tika-vin04t:1403_39: Appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti api eva nāma naṃ puggalaṃ imamhā seṭṭhacariyā apaneyyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1403_40: “Sādhu vatassa sacāhaṃ imaṃ puggalaṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti iminā adhippāyena anuddhaṃseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1403_41: Etena ekaṃ cāvanādhippāyaṃ gahetvā avasesā akkosādhippāyo kammādhippāyo vuṭṭhānādhippāyo uposathaṭṭhapanādhippāyo
tika-vin04t:1403_42: pavāraṇaṭṭhapanādhippāyo anuvijjanādhippāyo dhammakathādhippāyoti satta adhippāyā paṭikkhittā honti.
tika-vin04t:1403_43: Tato aparena samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye anuddhaṃsito hoti,
tika-vin04t:1403_45: Samanuggāhīyamāno vāti anuvijjakena kiṃ te diṭṭhantiādinā nayena anuvijjiyamāno upaparikkhiyamāno.
tika-vin04t:1403_46: Asamanuggāhīyamāno vāti diṭṭhādīsu kenaci vatthunāvā anuvijjakādīsu yena kenaci puggalena vā avuccamāno.
tika-vin04t:1403_47: Imesaṃ pana padānaṃ parato “bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhātī”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin04t:1403_49: evaṃ samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti paṭicca tiṭṭhati paṭijānāti,
tika-vin04t:1403_53: Amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotīti ettha pana diṭṭhamūlādīnaṃ abhāvena amūlakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1403_55: Yañhi adhikicca ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya samathā pavattanti,
tika-vin04t:1403_58: Yadi hi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ diṭṭhādīhi mūlehi amūlakañceva hoti,
tika-vin04t:1403_59: ayaṃ codetuṃ āgato bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti paṭicca tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1404_0: Rājagahe mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1404_3: katūpasampadaṃ suddhaṃ vā asuddhaṃ vā puggalaṃ yena pārājikena codeti,
tika-vin04t:1404_4: taṃ “ayaṃ anajjhāpanno”ti ñatvā cāvanādhippāyena “karotu me āyasmā okāsaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1404_5: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ akāretvā codentassa sace so taṅkhaṇeyeva jānāti “maṃ codetī”ti,
tika-vin04t:1404_9: Parammukhā codentassa pana sīsaṃ na eti.
tika-vin04t:1404_10: Attanā samīpe ṭhatvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1404_13: Atha sopi “mayā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ atthī”ti codeti,
tika-vin04t:1404_15: Akkosādhippāyena pana okāsaṃ akāretvā vadantassa vuttanayeneva pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca.
tika-vin04t:1404_17: Kammādhippāyena asammukhā sattavidhampi kammaṃ karontassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1404_20: uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapentassa ca okāsakammaṃ natthi,
tika-vin04t:1404_22: anuvijjakassāpi osaṭe vatthusmiṃ “atthetaṃ tavā”ti anuvijjanādhippāyena vadantassa okāsakammaṃ natthi,
tika-vin04t:1404_24: ayaṃ assamaṇo”tiādinā nayena anodisakaṃ dhammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi.
tika-vin04t:1404_25: Sace pana odissa niyametvā “asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti katheti,
tika-vin04t:1407_4: Yo hi so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto.
tika-vin04t:1407_5: So yvāyaṃ āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkho manussajāti ceva bhikkhubhāvo ca,
tika-vin04t:1407_6: tato aññassa bhāgassa koṭṭhāsassa pakkhassa hoti tiracchānajātiyā ceva chagalakabhāvassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1407_9: Yasmā ca tesaṃ “imaṃ mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ tassa nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhāro vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1407_16: Na hi mettiyabhūmajakā catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kassaci aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ uppādiyiṃsu,
tika-vin04t:1407_17: na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ leso nāma atthi.
tika-vin04t:1407_20: Tañca “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmaṃ tassa aññabhāgiyādhikaraṇabhāve ṭhitassa chagalakassa koci deso hoti
tika-vin04t:1407_22: ettha ca dissati apadissati “assa aya”nti voharīyatīti deso,
tika-vin04t:1407_24: Aññampi vatthuṃ lissati silissati vohāramatteneva īsakaṃ allīyatīti leso,
tika-vin04t:1407_26: Padabhājane pana yassa aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya,
tika-vin04t:1407_28: tasmā taṃ avibhajitvā yāni “adhikaraṇa”nti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni,
tika-vin04t:1407_29: tesaṃ aññabhāgiyatā ca tabbhāgiyatā ca yasmā apākaṭā,
tika-vin04t:1407_31: tasmā tañca avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyena codanañca āvikātuṃ “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1407_35: idaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1407_37: Aṅgesu ca aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanatā adhikāti.
tika-vin04t:1410_1: cittena ca sarīrena ca aviyuttassāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1410_2: Tenevassa padabhājane “samaggo nāma saṅgho samānasaṃvāsako samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1410_3: Samānasaṃvāsako hi samacittatāya cittena aviyutto hoti,
tika-vin04t:1410_5: Bhedāya parakkameyyāti “kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ bhijjeyyā”ti bhedanatthāya vāyāmeyya.
tika-vin04t:1410_6: Bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇanti bhedanassa saṅghabhedassa atthāya saṃvattanikaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1410_7: Imasmiñhi okāse “kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇa”nti ādīsu viya kāraṇaṃ “adhikaraṇa”nti adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1410_10: Paggayha tiṭṭheyyāti taṃ saṅghabhedassa atthāya saṃvattanikaṃ saṅghabhedanibbattisamatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ gahetvā dīpeyya ceva nappaṭinissajjeyya ca.
tika-vin04t:1410_11: Bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyoti ye taṃ paggayha tiṭṭhantaṃ sammukhā passanti,
tika-vin04t:1410_13: tehi sabbantimena paricchedena aḍḍhayojanamattaṃ gantvāpi yvāyaṃ anantare “māyasmā”tiādivacanakkamo vutto,
tika-vin04t:1410_15: Disvā vā sutvā vā avadantānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1410_16: Ettha ca māiti padaṃ “parakkamī”tipadena “aṭṭhāsī”tipadena ca saddhiṃ “mā parakkami,
tika-vin04t:1410_18: Sametāyasmā saṅghenāti āyasmā saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu,
tika-vin04t:1410_29: Evaṃ visumpi saṅghamajjhepi tikkhattuṃ vuccamānassa appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1410_31: Iccetaṃ kusalanti iti etaṃ paṭinissajjanaṃ kusalaṃ khemaṃ sotthibhāvo tassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin04t:1411_0: Rājagahe devadattaṃ ārabbha saṅghabhedāya parakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1411_7: kārapattāya tatiyakammavācāya tañca dukkaṭaṃ te ca thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti,
tika-vin04t:1411_9: Asamanubhāsiyamānassa ca paṭinissajjantassa ca ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1414_0: Ekādasame tasseva kho panāti yo saṅghabhedāya parakkamati, tasseva.
tika-vin04t:1414_1: Anuvattakāti tassa diṭṭhiṃ khantiṃ ruciṃ gahaṇena anupaṭipajjanakā.
tika-vin04t:1414_3: Yasmā pana tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ kammārahā na honti.
tika-vin04t:1414_4: Na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1414_5: tasmā “eko vā dve vā tayo vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1414_10: Sametāyasmantānaṃ saṅghenāti āyasmantānaṃ cittaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu,
tika-vin04t:1415_1: idaṃ rājagahe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha devadattassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1418_4: so āvikareyyā”ti evaṃ saṅgahitattā anto pātimokkhassa vattamānesūti attho.
tika-vin04t:1418_8: tesaṃ vā santakattā “sahadhammika”nti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena vuccamānoti attho.
tika-vin04t:1418_9: Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyāti yena vacanena maṃ vadatha,
tika-vin04t:1418_11: mā maṃ taṃ vacanaṃ vadathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1418_13: sahadhammena vā aññenapi pāsādikabhāvasaṃvattanikena vacanena vadetu.
tika-vin04t:1418_18: Evaṃ saṃvaddhāhi tassa bhagavato parisāti evaṃ parisāya vuddhikāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1419_1: idaṃ kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha attānaṃ avacanīyakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1422_0: Terasame gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃvāti ettha nagarampi gāme antogadhameva.
tika-vin04t:1422_1: Upanissāya viharatītitattha paṭibaddhacīvarādipaccayatāya taṃ nissāya vasati.
tika-vin04t:1422_2: Pupphadānādīhi manussānaṃ saddhaṃ vināsento kulāni dūsetīti kuladūsako.
tika-vin04t:1422_6: alaṃ te idha vāsenāti imināssa pabbājanīyakammārahataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin04t:1422_7: Pabbājanīyakammakato panesa yasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1422_9: neva tasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā carituṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:1422_11: Evañca so bhikkhūtiettha soti pabbājanīyakammakato adhippeto.
tika-vin04t:1422_17: Kuladūsanakammena hi so āpajjitabbā āpattiyo pubbeva āpanno,
tika-vin04t:1422_18: evaṃ panassa visumpi saṅghamajjhepi vuccamānassa appaṭinissajjato aparaṃ dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1422_19: Evañca sotiādi ito pubbe vuttañca avuttañca sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-vin04t:1423_1: idaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha chandagāmitādīhi pāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1426_1: evametaṃ dhārayāmītiettha paṭhamaṃ āpatti etesanti paṭhamāpattikā,
tika-vin04t:1426_3: Itare pana yathā tatiye ca catutthe ca divase hotīti ettha “tatiyako,
tika-vin04t:1426_5: evaṃ yāvatatiye samanubhāsanakamme hontīti yāvatatiyakāti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1426_22: sopi ca tattha vatthuvasena vā “idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti nāmamattavasena vā “ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattī”ti
tika-vin04t:1426_23: āpattisaññīyeva hutvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti evaṃ chādetukāmova dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā aruṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1426_31: So ce pakatattasaññī hutvā vuttanayeneva chādeti,
tika-vin04t:1426_36: Pahūti yo sakkoti bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantuñceva ārocetuñca,
tika-vin04t:1426_41: Sacepi hi so sabhāgaṃ disvā “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti lajjāya nāroceti,
tika-vin04t:1427_4: Akāmā parivatthabbanti na kāmena na vasena,
tika-vin04t:1427_5: atha kho akāmena avasena parivāsaṃ samādāya vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1427_6: Tattha paṭicchannaparivāso suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāso cāti tividho parivāso.
tika-vin04t:1427_7: Tattha paṭicchannaparivāso tāva yathāpaṭicchannāya āpattiyā dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1427_11: kassaci dve vā tisso vā taduttari vā.
tika-vin04t:1427_12: Tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamameva vuttanayena paṭicchannabhāvaṃ ñatvā tato paṭicchannadivase
tika-vin04t:1427_13: ca āpattiyo ca sallakkhetvā sace ekā ekāhappaṭicchannā hoti, “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1427_14: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ parivāsaṃ yācāpetvā khandhake
tika-vin04t:1427_18: cuddasāhappaṭicchannantievaṃ yāva cuddasadivasāni divasavasena yojanā kātabbā,
tika-vin04t:1427_22: tato māsappaṭicchannaṃ atirekamāsappaṭicchannaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannaṃ atirekadvemāsappaṭicchannaṃ temāsappaṭicchannaṃ…pe…
tika-vin04t:1427_25: tato paraṃ atirekasaṃvaccharaṃ dvesaṃvaccharaṃ evaṃ yāva saṭṭhisaṃvaccharaatirekasaṭṭhisaṃvaccharappaṭicchannanti,
tika-vin04t:1427_26: tato vā bhiyyopi vatvā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin04t:1428_0: Sace pana dve tisso taduttari vā āpattiyo honti,
tika-vin04t:1428_4: Tato paraṃ pana sataṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin04t:1428_8: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin04t:1428_9: attakāmaṃ ekaṃ sañcarittaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ gaṇanavasena vā, “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1428_10: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ vatthukittanavasena vā, “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1428_11: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ nāmamattavasena vā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin04t:1428_15: tasmā “sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇanāmavasenāpi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1428_16: Idañhi parivāsādivinayakammaṃ vatthuvasena gottavasena nāmavasena āpattivasena ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1428_19: tattha “sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ kāyasaṃsagga”ntiādivacanenāpi “nānāvatthukāyo”tivacanenāpi vatthu ceva gottañca gahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1428_21: tasmā etesu yassa kassaci vasena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin04t:1429_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca sace appabhikkhuko āvāso hoti,
tika-vin04t:1429_4: samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetvā puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentena vattabhedañca ratticchedañca akatvā parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1429_5: Sace na sakkā hoti parivāsaṃ sodhetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1429_14: athānena paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin04t:1429_15: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā
tika-vin04t:1429_16: vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditvā antoaruṇeyeva vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1429_19: Aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vihāraṃ gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1429_20: Sace so pure aruṇeyeva kenaci karaṇīyena gato,
tika-vin04t:1429_21: vihāraṃ gantvā yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
tika-vin04t:1429_26: vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1430_1: rattipariyantaṃ na jānātī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ khandhake anuññāto suddhantaparivāso nāma,
tika-vin04t:1430_3: duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca assarantassa ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1430_4: Āpattipariyantaṃ pana “ettikā ahaṃ āpattiyo āpanno”ti jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin04t:1430_9: so tividho hoti odhānasamodhāno agghasamodhāno missakasamodhānoti.
tika-vin04t:1430_10: Tattha odhānasamodhāno nāma antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa parivutthadivase odhunitvā makkhetvā
tika-vin04t:1430_11: purimāya āpattiyā mūladivasaparicchede pacchā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ samodahitvā dātabbaparivāso vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1430_12: Agghasamodhāno nāma sambahulāsu āpattīsu yā ekā vā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin04t:1430_13: tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena avasesānaṃ ūnatarappaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ dātabbaparivāso vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1430_14: Missakasamodhāno nāma nānāvatthukāyo āpattiyo ekato katvā dātabbaparivāso vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1431_0: Uttari chārattanti parivāsato uttari cha rattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1431_9: tassa parivāsapariyosāne dātabbaṃ mānattaṃ paṭicchannamānattanti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1431_11: Ubhinnampi panetesaṃ dānavidhi vinicchayakathā ca samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:1431_13: Sace ayaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye samādātuṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1431_14: sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ parivāse vuttappakāraṃ padesaṃ gantvā “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi,
tika-vin04t:1431_15: vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti samādiyitvā nesaṃ ārocetvā tato tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayena paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1431_16: Yattha siyā vīsatigaṇoti ettha vīsatisaṅgho gaṇo assāti vīsatigaṇo.
tika-vin04t:1431_17: Tatrāti yatra sabbantimena paricchedena vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi, tattha.
tika-vin04t:1431_22: Abbhānakammaṃ pana pāḷivasena khandhake vinicchayavasena samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1431_26: Te ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ye ūnabhāvaṃ ñatvā abbhenti,
tika-vin04t:1431_29: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti ayaṃ tattha anudhammatā lokuttaradhammaṃ anugatā ovādānusāsanī sāmīci dhammatā.
tika-vin04t:1436_2: Eko ekāyāti eko bhikkhu mātugāmasaṅkhātāya ekāya itthiyā saddhiṃ.
tika-vin04t:1436_6: Sacepi hi pihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinno viññū puriso hoti,
tika-vin04t:1436_9: tādise antodvādasahatthepi okāse nisinno sacakkhuko vikkhittacittopi niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1436_18: Yattha ajjhācāraṃ karontā sakkonti taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1436_22: Ettha ca sayanampi nisajjāya eva saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1436_25: Nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamānoti kiñcāpi evarūpā upāsikā disvā vadati,
tika-vin04t:1436_26: atha kho bhikkhu nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo,
tika-vin04t:1436_28: Yena vā sāti nisajjādīsu ākāresu yena vā ākārena saddhiṃ methunādīni āropetvā sā upāsikā vadeyya,
tika-vin04t:1436_30: evarūpāyapi hi upāsikāya vacanamattena ākārena na kāretabboti attho. Kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1436_33: Ayaṃ dhammo aniyatoti tiṇṇaṃ āpattīnaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ vā vatthuṃ vā paṭijānāti,
tika-vin04t:1437_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmena saddhiṃ vuttappakāre āsane nisajjakappanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1437_3: methunadhammasannissitakilesasaṅkhātena rahassādena mātugāmassa santikaṃ gantukāmatāya akkhiañjanādito paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1437_4: Gantvā tasmiṃ vā nisinne itthī nisīdatu,
tika-vin04t:1437_8: Sace pana kāyasaṃsaggaṃ vā methunaṃ vā samāpajjati,
tika-vin04t:1437_11: Vuttappakāre purise nipajjitvā aniddāyante anandhe viññupurise upacāragate sati, ṭhitassa,
tika-vin04t:1440_0: Dutiye itthīpi purisopi yo koci viññū anandho abadhiro antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhito vā nisinno vā vikkhittopi niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karoti.
tika-vin04t:1440_3: Pārājikāpattiñca parihāpetvā duṭṭhullavācāpatti vuttāti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-vin04t:1446_0: Ito paraṃ pana ime kho panātiādi sabbattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1449_0: Nissaggiyesu pana cīvaravaggassa tāva paṭhamasikkhāpade niṭṭhitacīvarasminti sūcikammapariyosānena vā,
tika-vin04t:1449_1: “naṭṭhaṃ vā vinaṭṭhaṃ vā daḍḍhaṃ vā cīvarāsā vā upacchinnā”ti imesu vā yena kenaci ākārena niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ,
tika-vin04t:1449_3: Atthatakathinassa hi bhikkhuno yāva imehākārehi cīvarapalibodho na chijjati,
tika-vin04t:1449_5: Ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti yaṃ saṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1449_7: Tatrevaṃ saṅkhepato kathinatthāro ca ubbhāro ca veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1449_8: Ayañhi kathinatthāro nāma bhagavatā purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ anuññāto,
tika-vin04t:1449_9: so sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1449_10: tasmā yattha cattāro vā tayo vā dve vā eko vā purimavassaṃ upagato,
tika-vin04t:1449_14: tasmā sace purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu yo koci dhammena samena cīvaraṃ deti “iminā kathinaṃ attharathā”ti,
tika-vin04t:1449_15: taṃ khandhake vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinatthārārahassa bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ.
