tika-vin04t:1449_16: Tena tadaheva pañca vā atirekāni vā khaṇḍāni chinditvā saṅghāṭi vā uttarāsaṅgo vā antaravāsako vā kātabbo,
tika-vin04t:1449_21: Tena bhikkhunā sace saṅghāṭiyā attharitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1449_22: porāṇikaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharitvā navaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti attharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1449_24: Tato tena purimavassaṃvuṭṭhe antosīmāgate bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “atthataṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1449_28: therānañca navānañca bahūnañca ekassa ca anurūpaṃ sallakkhetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1449_35: Te tato paṭṭhāya yāva kathinassubbhārā anāmantacāro,
tika-vin04t:1449_40: tasmiṃ āvāse saṅghassa uppannacīvarañcāti ime pañcānisaṃse labhanti,
tika-vin04t:1449_44: mātikā kathinassubbhārāya pakkamanantikā niṭṭhānantikā sanniṭṭhānantikā nāsanantikā savanantikā āsāvacchedikā
tika-vin04t:1449_45: sīmātikkamanantikā sahubbhārā”ti evaṃ vuttāsu aṭṭhasu mātikāsu aññataravasena uddharīyati,
tika-vin04t:1450_0: Dasāhaparamanti dasa ahāni paramo paricchedo assāti dasāhaparamo,
tika-vin04t:1450_3: cīvaraṃ nāma khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅganti etesaṃ vā tadanulomānaṃ vā aññataraṃ ayamassa jāti,
tika-vin04t:1450_4: pamāṇato pana taṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ idha adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1450_7: āyāmato aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulena caturaṅgulavitthataṃ pacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti.
tika-vin04t:1450_12: vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ catumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1450_13: nisīdanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ paccattharaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1450_14: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ yāva ābādhā adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1450_16: parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti iminā nayena adhiṭṭhātabbavikappetabbatā jānitabbā.
tika-vin04t:1450_17: Tattha ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahantena rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā pamāṇayuttameva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1450_18: tassa pamāṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena sugatacīvarato ūnakaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1450_19: lāmakaparicchedena saṅghāṭiyā tāva uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghato muṭṭhipañcakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1450_24: Tattha yasmā “dve cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānāni kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti,
tika-vin04t:1450_26: tasmā purāṇasaṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā navaṃ hatthena gahetvā “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ
tika-vin04t:1450_27: adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ karontena kāyena vā adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin04t:1450_33: ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1450_34: Esa nayo uttarāsaṅge ca antaravāsake ca.
tika-vin04t:1450_36: Tasmā sabbāni saṅghāṭiṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ antaravāsakanti evaṃ attano attano nāmeneva adhiṭṭhātabbāni.
tika-vin04t:1450_38: niṭṭhite rajane ca kappe ca “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbāni.
tika-vin04t:1450_39: Idañca pana ticīvaraṃ sukhaparibhogatthaṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1451_0: Vassikasāṭikā anatirittapamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike māse adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin04t:1451_8: taṃ pana mahantampi ekampi bahūnipi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1451_9: nīlampi pītakampi sadasampi pupphadasampīti sabbappakārampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1451_15: taṃ pana ekampi bahūnipi mahantampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1451_20: bahūnipi ekato katvā “imāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā nayena adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1451_21: Mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bibbohanaṃ pāvāro kojavoti etesu pana senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe ca adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1451_22: Sabbañca panetaṃ vuttappakārena adhiṭṭhitacīvaraṃ aññassa dānena,
tika-vin04t:1451_29: paccuddharaṇenāti imehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin04t:1451_32: Sace hi chiddassa abbhantare ekatantupi acchinno hoti,
tika-vin04t:1451_34: Tattha saṅghāṭiyā ca uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghantato vidatthippamāṇassa tiriyantato aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇassa padesassa orato chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati,
tika-vin04t:1451_38: tasmā chidde jāte ticīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1451_44: Kevalañhi imasmiṃ okāse yaṃ evaṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitañca,
tika-vin04t:1452_0: Taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ yathāvuttajātippamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃdasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ atikkāmayato etthantare yathā atirekacīvaraṃ na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1452_8: Taṃ atikkāmayato saha nissaggiyena nissaggiyavinayakammaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti ayamettha attho.
tika-vin04t:1452_9: Tañca panetaṃ cīvaraṃ yaṃ divasaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1452_12: tasmā cīvaruppādadivasena saddhiṃ ekādase aruṇuggamane dasāhātikkamitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1452_13: taṃ gahetvā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1452_15: saṅghassa tāva evaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ “idaṃ me, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1452_24: Nissajjanepi sace dve vā bahūni vā honti,
tika-vin04t:1452_29: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1452_30: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti,
tika-vin04t:1452_37: Dvīsu pana sambahulāsu vā purimanayeneva vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1452_39: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1452_41: saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_0: Gaṇassa pana nissajjantena “imāha”nti vā “imāni aha”nti vā vatvā “āyasmantānaṃ nissajjāmī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_2: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati…pe… deseti,
tika-vin04t:1453_5: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ āyasmantānaṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_7: āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu”nti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_9: Puggalassa pana nissajjantena “imāha”nti vā “imāni aha”nti vā vatvā “āyasmato nissajjāmī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_16: bhante”ti vā “āma āvuso”ti vā vatvā “passāmī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_17: tato “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti vā “saṃvareyyāthā”ti vā vutte “sādhu suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1453_18: Evaṃ desitāya āpattiyā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_19: dvīsu tīsu vā pubbe vuttānusāreneva nayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1453_22: tato āpattippaṭiggahaṇañca nissaṭṭhacīvaradānañca tesaṃ aññatarena yathā ekena puggalena,
tika-vin04t:1453_25: Cīvaraṃ patto nisīdananti vatthumattameva hi nānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_30: Nissaṭṭhavatthuṃ “dinnamidaṃ iminā mayha”nti saññāya na paṭidentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1453_31: tassa santakabhāvaṃ ñatvā lesena acchindanto sāmikassa dhuranikkhepena bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabboti.
tika-vin04t:1454_0: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha atirekacīvaradhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1454_8: Dasāhaṃ anatikkantepi atikkantasaññino vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1454_11: Antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭhite vikappite vissajjite naṭṭhe vinaṭṭhe daḍḍhe acchinne vissāsena gāhite ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1454_15: ubhatopātimokkhesupi hi pārājikāni ca saṅghādisesā ca sīlavipatti,
tika-vin04t:1454_17: ājīvavipatti vā diṭṭhivipatti vā kāci āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin04t:1454_18: Ājīvavipattipaccayā pana ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ cha āpattikkhandhā paññattā,
tika-vin04t:1457_0: Dutiye niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunātiettha purimasikkhāpade viya atthaṃ aggahetvā niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_1: bhikkhunoti evaṃ sāmivasena karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1457_2: Karaṇavasena hi bhikkhunā idaṃ nāma kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1457_4: sāmivasena pana bhikkhuno cīvarasmiṃ niṭṭhite kathine ca ubbhate evaṃ imehi cīvaraniṭṭhānakathinubbhārehi
tika-vin04t:1457_5: chinnapalibodho ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyyāti evaṃ attho yujjati.
tika-vin04t:1457_6: Tattha ticīvarenāti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena adhiṭṭhitesu saṅghāṭiādīsu yenakenaci.
tika-vin04t:1457_9: pannarasānaṃ nikkhepaṭṭhānānaṃ yatthakatthaci nikkhipitvā tesaṃ gāmādīnaṃ bahi hatthapāsātikkamena aruṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_12: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno ticīvarena avippavāsasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1457_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa bhikkhuno ekarattampi vippavāsato vuttanayeneva nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1457_15: cīvaraṃ rattivippavutthaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiya”ntiādinā nayena vacanabhedo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1458_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1459_4: avippavutthe vippavutthasaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1459_5: Vippavutthe vippavutthasaññinopi avippavutthasaññinopi vematikassāpi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_7: Antoaruṇe paccuddhaṭe pana paṭhamakathine vuttavissajjitādibhede ca anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:1459_11: athāpissa puna so vā añño vā ābādho kuppati,
tika-vin04t:1462_0: Tatiye niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti sāmivaseneva karaṇattho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1462_1: Akālacīvaraṃ nāma yvāyaṃ “anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin04t:1462_5: puggalassa vā “idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”tiādinā nayena dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1462_7: Uppajjeyyāti evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ attano bhāgapaṭilābhavasena saṅghato vā suttantikādigaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā paṃsukūlaṃ vā attano vā dhanena,
tika-vin04t:1462_17: puggalassa detī”ti imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarato uppajjeyya.
tika-vin04t:1462_18: Ettha ca “sīmāya dammī”ti evaṃ sīmaṃ parāmasitvā dento sīmāya deti nāma,
tika-vin04t:1462_20: Ettha ca sīmāti khaṇḍasīmā upacārasīmā samānasaṃvāsasīmā avippavāsasīmā lābhasīmā gāmasīmā nigamasīmā
tika-vin04t:1462_21: nagarasīmā abbhantarasīmā udakukkhepasīmā janapadasīmā raṭṭhasīmā rajjasīmā dīpasīmā cakkavāḷasīmāti
tika-vin04t:1462_23: Tattha upacārasīmā nāma parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepena,
tika-vin04t:1462_25: Api ca bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato vā pariyante ṭhitabhojanasālato vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vā
tika-vin04t:1462_26: thāmamajjhimassa purisassa dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ anto “upacārasīmā”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1462_32: idampi sabbaṃ imissāva sīmāya vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1462_33: Lābhasīmāti yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo vihāraṃ kārāpetvā gāvutaṃ vā addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā samantā
tika-vin04t:1462_36: taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa demā”ti ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:1462_38: Kāsikosalādīnaṃ pana raṭṭhānaṃ anto bahū janapadā honti,
tika-vin04t:1462_42: samuddantena paricchinno mahādīpo vā antaradīpo vā dīpasīmā,
tika-vin04t:1462_47: “Upacārasīmāya demā”ti dinnaṃ pana antoparicchede khaṇḍasīmāsīmantarikāsu ṭhitānampi pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1462_50: gāmasīmādīsu dinnaṃ tāsaṃ sīmānaṃ abbhantare baddhasīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1462_52: janapadasīmādīsu dinnampi tāsaṃ abbhantare baddhasīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1462_53: tasmā yaṃ jambudīpe ṭhatvā “tambapaṇṇidīpe saṅghassa demā”ti dīyati,
tika-vin04t:1462_54: taṃ tambapaṇṇidīpato ekopi gantvā sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1462_55: Sacepi tattheva eko sabhāgo bhikkhu sabhāgānaṃ bhāgaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1462_57: Yo pana vihāraṃ pavisitvā “asukasīmāyā”ti avatvāva kevalaṃ “sīmāya dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin04t:1463_2: ekasmiṃ vihāre sannipatitehi bhikkhūhi yaṃ vihāraṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmā samānalābhaṃ kātuṃ icchanti,
tika-vin04t:1463_3: tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā “asuko nāma vihāro porāṇako appalābho”ti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ vatvā “taṃ vihāraṃ iminā
tika-vin04t:1463_4: vihārena saddhiṃ ekalābhaṃ kātuṃ saṅghassa ruccatī”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1463_5: ettāvatā tasmiṃ vihāre nisinnopi idha nisinnova hoti,
tika-vin04t:1463_7: ettāvatā idha nisinnopi tasmiṃ nisinnova hoti.
tika-vin04t:1463_8: Ekasmiṃ vihāre lābhe bhājiyamāne itarasmiṃ ṭhitassa bhāgaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1464_0: Bhikkhāpaññattiyāti ettha bhikkhāpaññatti nāma dāyakassa pariccāgapaññattiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1464_2: tattha dammī”ti vā “tattha dethā”ti vā vutte yattha tassa pākavattaṃ vā vattati,
tika-vin04t:1464_4: yattha vā tena kiñci senāsanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1464_6: Sace pana ekasmiṃ dhuvakāraṭṭhāne thokatarā bhikkhū honti,
tika-vin04t:1465_0: Saṅghassa detīti ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnaṃ upacārasīmāgatānañca tato bahiddhāpi tehi saddhiṃ ekābaddhānañca pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1465_1: tasmā tesaṃ gāhake sati asampattānampi bhāgo dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1465_2: Yaṃ pana bahi upacārasīmāya bhikkhū disvā “saṅghassā”ti dīyati,
tika-vin04t:1465_4: Ye pana dvādasahi hatthehi parisaṃ asampattā,
tika-vin04t:1466_0: Ubhatosaṅghassāti ettha pana yaṃ ubhatosaṅghassa dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1466_6: “Ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana sace dasa bhikkhū ca dasa bhikkhuniyo ca honti,
tika-vin04t:1466_7: ekavīsati paṭivīse katvā eko puggalassa dātabbo,
tika-vin04t:1466_11: so saṅghatopi attano vassaggena gahetuṃ labhati, kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1466_13: “ubhatosaṅghassa ca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1466_14: Idha pana cetiyassa saṅghato pāpuṇakoṭṭhāso nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:1466_16: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañcā”ti vutte pana na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1466_17: bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1466_18: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vutte puggalo visuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin04t:1466_20: “Cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa eko puggalapaṭivīso labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1466_21: “Bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañcā”ti vuttepi na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1466_24: yathā ca bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādiṃ katvā nayo nīto,
tika-vin04t:1466_26: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vuttepi puggalassa visuṃ na labbhati,
tika-vin04t:1467_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassāti ettha sace vihāraṃ pavisitvā “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin04t:1468_0: Ādissa detīti ādisitvā paricchinditvā deti, kathaṃ?
tika-vin04t:1468_1: Bhikkhū ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā yāguyā nimantetvā te ghare yāguṃ pāyetvā “imāni cīvarāni yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītā,
tika-vin04t:1469_0: Puggalassa detīti “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā,
tika-vin04t:1469_1: pādamūle ṭhapetvā “idaṃ tumhāka”nti evaṃ sammukhā vā detīti ayamettha saṅkhepakathā,
tika-vin04t:1469_3: Iti imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ vasena yaṃ akālacīvaralakkhaṇena paṭiladdhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1470_2: No cassa pāripūrīti no ce pāripūrī bhaveyya,
tika-vin04t:1470_6: Satiyā paccāsāyāti “asukadivasaṃ nāma saṅgho cīvarāni labhissati,
tika-vin04t:1470_7: tato me cīvaraṃ uppajjissatī”tiiminā nayena saṅghagaṇañātimittesu vā aññataraṭṭhānato,
tika-vin04t:1470_9: “iminā vā kappiyabhaṇḍena cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ vijjamānāya cīvarāsāya.
tika-vin04t:1470_10: Tato ce uttarīti māsaparamato ce uttari nikkhipeyya,
tika-vin04t:1470_18: aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvā eva kālabbhantare kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1470_23: mūlacīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā paccāsācīvarameva mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1470_26: tāva aññaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1470_28: akālacīvaraṃ māsātikkantaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1471_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1475_1: mātito vā pitito vā yāva sattamaṃ yugaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1475_3: Bhikkhuniyāti sākiyāniyo viya suddhabhikkhusaṅghe vā ubhatosaṅghe vā upasampannāya.
tika-vin04t:1475_4: Purāṇacīvaranti rajitvā kappaṃ katvā ekavārampi nivatthaṃ vā pārutaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1475_5: yaṃ antamaso paribhogasīsena aṃse vā matthake vā katvā maggaṃ gato hoti,
tika-vin04t:1475_12: antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari vā khipati,
tika-vin04t:1475_17: Sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā upāsikāya vā hatthe dhovanatthāya deti,
tika-vin04t:1475_20: Upāsakassa vā sāmaṇerassa vā hatthe dinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1475_21: so ce liṅge parivatte upasampajjitvā dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1475_26: purāṇacīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā panettha nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1476_3: evaṃ āṇattāya ca bhikkhuniyā uddhanasajjanādīsu sabbappayogesu bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1476_4: Dhovitvā ukkhittamattaṃ pana rattamattaṃ ākoṭitamattañca nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1476_5: dhovanādīni tīṇipi dve vā kārāpentassa ekena vatthunā nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1476_10: taṃ karohī”ti vadato pana ekavācāya pācittiyena saddhiṃ dve dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:1476_12: aññassa vā santakaṃ nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṃ vā dhovāpentassa,
tika-vin04t:1476_16: Ito paraṃ pana evarūpesu ṭhānesu “tikapācittiya”nti vakkhāma,
tika-vin04t:1476_17: sace ñātikāya sahāyā aññātikā “dhovā”ti avuttā vā dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1476_18: aparibhuttaṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1476_23: tassā dhovanādīni cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1479_1: tasmā ito paraṃ katthaci na vicārayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1479_8: dhammakathaṃ kathentassa vatthesu khipiyamānesu upacāraṃ muñcitvāpi upari vā khipatu,
tika-vin04t:1479_11: Yassa kassaci pana anupasampannassa hatthe pesitaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1479_12: “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti saṅkārakūṭādīsu ṭhapitampi paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1479_13: Aññatra pārivattakāti yaṃ “antamaso harīṭakakkhaṇḍampi datvā vā dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā vā pārivattakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1479_14: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso vikappanupagaṃ paṭaparissāvanampi gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1479_16: cīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato paṭiggahitaṃ aññatra pārivattakā nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1480_8: ekatoupasampannāya ñātikāya ca aññātikasaññissa vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1480_16: aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1483_4: Aññatra samayāti yo acchinnacīvaro vā hoti naṭṭhacīvaro vā,
tika-vin04t:1483_5: tassa taṃ samayaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ viññāpanappayoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1483_8: cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ aññatra samayā viññāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1484_13: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1487_0: Sattame tañceti taṃ acchinnacīvaraṃ vā naṭṭhacīvaraṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1487_8: yathā vā “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha disvāti attho,
tika-vin04t:1487_9: evamidhāpi “abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyā”ti upanetvā purato ṭhapento kāyena vā,
tika-vin04t:1487_11: tattakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanto vācāya vā abhiharitvā nimanteyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1487_12: Santaruttaraparamanti saantaraṃ uttaraṃ paramaṃ assa cīvarassāti santaruttaraparamaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1487_13: nivāsanena saddhiṃ pārupanaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1487_14: Tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbanti tato abhihaṭacīvarato ettakaṃ cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1488_3: ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā aññaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhānato pariyesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1488_16: Bhikkhuniyā pana pañcasu naṭṭhesu dve sāditabbāni,
tika-vin04t:1488_19: ko pana vādo dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1488_24: cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ tatuttari viññāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1489_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bahucīvaraviññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1489_5: Dve cīvarāni katvā “sesakaṃ āharissāmī”ti vatvā gaṇhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1489_14: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1492_0: Aṭṭhame bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissāti “itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti evaṃ apadisitvā.
tika-vin04t:1492_7: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmīti ayaṃ panettha attho.
tika-vin04t:1492_8: Tatra ce soti yatra so gahapati vā gahapatānī vā,
tika-vin04t:1492_9: tatra so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya ceti ayamettha padasambandho.
tika-vin04t:1492_17: Evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vāti āyatādīsu aññataraṃ.
tika-vin04t:1492_18: Kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāyāti sundarakāmataṃ visiṭṭhakāmataṃ cittena gahetvā,
tika-vin04t:1492_20: sace pana evarūpaṃ āpajjantassa tassa vacanena yo paṭhamaṃ adhippetato mūlaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sundarataraṃ cetāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1492_24: cīvaraṃ pubbe appavāritaṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1493_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1493_6: eteneva mūlena “aññaṃ evarūpaṃ vā dehī”ti vadantassa,
tika-vin04t:1493_12: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1496_7: evaṃ bahūnaṃ pīḷaṃ katvā gaṇhatopi āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1496_9: cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārite aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena vacanabhedo ñātabboti.
tika-vin04t:1499_0: Dasame rājabhoggoti rājato bhoggaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ assa atthīti rājabhoggo,
tika-vin04t:1499_6: Sace hi “idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti peseyya,
tika-vin04t:1499_7: āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyya.
tika-vin04t:1499_9: Na kho mayantiādi idaṃ kappiyavasena ābhatampi cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1499_11: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ kahāpaṇo māsakoti imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni,
tika-vin04t:1499_12: muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ satta dhaññāni dāsidāsakhettavatthupupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti
tika-vin04t:1499_13: imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1499_14: tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “na kho maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1500_0: Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti idaṃ pana attānaṃ uddissa ābhatattā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1500_6: Niddisitabbotiidaṃ “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1500_7: Sace pana dūto “ko imaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vā “kassa demī”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin04t:1500_9: Ārāmiko vā upāsako vātiidaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1500_10: ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati. Eso kho,
tika-vin04t:1500_14: Saññatto so mayāti āṇatto so mayā,
tika-vin04t:1500_15: yathā tumhākaṃ cīvarena atthe sati cīvaraṃ dassati,
tika-vin04t:1500_17: Dūtena hi evaṃ ārociteyeva taṃ codetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1500_19: Sace pana “ayaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti sammukhā niddiṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin04t:1500_20: dūto ca sammukhā eva tassa hatthe cetāpannaṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1500_21: evaṃ “saññatto so mayā”ti avuttepi codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1500_22: Sace pana dūto gacchantova “ahaṃ tassa hatthe dassāmi,
tika-vin04t:1500_23: tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti bhikkhuno vatvā vā gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1500_28: tasmimpi idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Attho me, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:1500_31: idaṃ vā vacanaṃ yāya kāyaci bhāsāya etassa attho vā vattabbo, “dehi me,
tika-vin04t:1500_32: āhara me”tiādinā nayena pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1500_33: Abhinipphādeyyāti evaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ codayamāno paṭilābhavasena sādheyya.
tika-vin04t:1501_1: Chakkhattuparamañhi tena cīvaraṃ uddissa tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1501_11: Ettha ca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena tissannaṃ codanānaṃ channañca ṭhānānaṃ anuññātattā codanāya diguṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1501_20: Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā chakkhattuṃ codeti,
tika-vin04t:1501_23: tathā ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā dvādasakkhattuṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1501_24: sakiṃyeva vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1501_26: ko pana vādo nānādivasesu evaṃ karontassāti ayamettha vinicchayo.
tika-vin04t:1501_27: Ye pana kappiyakārake dāyako sayameva gantvā nisīdati te satakkhattumpi codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1501_28: Yo pana ubhohi pi aniddiṭṭho mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako ca parammukhakappiyakārako ca,
tika-vin04t:1501_30: evaṃ idha dasapi kappiyakārakā dassitā honti.
tika-vin04t:1502_4: cīvaraṃ atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena abhinipphāditaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1502_5: Yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhatanti yato rājato vā rājabhoggato vā assa bhikkhuno cīvaracetāpannaṃ ānītaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1502_8: Tatthāti tassa rañño vā rājabhoggassa vā santikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1502_10: Na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotīti taṃ cetāpannaṃ tassa bhikkhuno appamattakampi kammaṃ na nipphādeti.
tika-vin04t:1502_11: Yuñjantāyasmanto sakanti āyasmanto attano santakaṃ dhanaṃ pāpuṇantu.
tika-vin04t:1502_12: Mā vo sakaṃ vinassāti tumhākaṃ santakaṃ mā vinassatu.
tika-vin04t:1502_13: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti ayaṃ tattha anudhammatā lokuttaradhammaṃ anugatā,
tika-vin04t:1502_15: tasmā evaṃ akaronto vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1503_6: ūnakesu codanāṭhānesu atirekasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1503_13: tena vāyāmena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1508_0: Eḷakalomavaggassa paṭhame kosiyamissakanti ekenāpi kosiyaṃsunā antamaso tassa karaṇaṭṭhāne vātavegena nipātitenāpi missīkataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1508_1: Santhatanti same bhūmibhāge kosiyaṃsūni uparūpari santharitvā kañjiyādīhi siñcitvā kattabbatālakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1508_5: kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1508_6: imasseva vacanassa anusārena ito paraṃ sabbasanthataṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1508_7: Sakkā hi ettāvatā jānitunti na taṃ ito paraṃ dassayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1509_0: Āḷaviyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1509_4: aññassatthāya karaṇakārāpanesu aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjane ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1512_0: Dutiye suddhakāḷakānanti suddhānaṃ kāḷakānaṃ aññehi amissīkatānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1512_1: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tādisaṃ santhataṃ karaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1515_5: tesu tulayitvā dve koṭṭhāsā kāḷakānaṃ gahetabbā,
tika-vin04t:1516_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tādisaṃ santhataṃ karaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1516_3: Imāni pana tīṇi nissajjitvā paṭiladdhānipi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin04t:1519_0: Catutthe orena ce channaṃ vassānanti channaṃ vassānaṃ orimabhāge,
tika-vin04t:1519_2: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno santhatasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1519_3: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa chabbassabbhantare aññaṃ santhataṃ karontassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1520_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1523_0: Pañcame purāṇasanthataṃ nāma yattha sakimpi nisinno vā hoti nipanno vā.
tika-vin04t:1523_1: Samantāti ekapassato vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā chinditvā gahitaṭṭhānaṃ yathā vidatthimattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1524_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santhatavissajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1527_2: yattha katthaci pana dhammena labhitvā gaṇhato doso natthi.
tika-vin04t:1527_9: Attanā pana antamaso vātābādhappaṭikāratthaṃ suttakena abandhitvā kaṇṇacchidde pakkhittānipi ādāya tiyojanaṃ ekaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1528_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha tiyojanātikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1528_7: acchinnaṃ vā nissaṭṭhaṃ vā paṭilabhitvā haraṇe,
tika-vin04t:1528_13: attanā ādāya vā aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvā vā tiyojanātikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1531_0: Sattame sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha eḷakalomadhovāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1531_1: Tattha purāṇacīvaradhovāpane vuttanayeneva sabbopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1534_1: apica kahāpaṇo lohamāsakadārumāsakajatumāsakādayopi ye vohāraṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin04t:1534_3: Uggaṇheyya vāti attano atthāya diyyamānaṃ vā yatthakatthaci ṭhitaṃ vā nippariggahitaṃ disvā sayaṃ gaṇheyya vā.
tika-vin04t:1534_4: Uggaṇhāpeyya vāti tadeva aññena gāhāpeyya vā.
tika-vin04t:1534_5: Upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyyāti “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā,
tika-vin04t:1534_7: taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ parammukhā ṭhitaṃ vā kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1534_12: kāyena vā vācāya vā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1534_13: kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ kappatī”ti na sādiyati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1534_14: Nissaggiyanti uggahaṇādīsu yaṃkiñci karontassa aghanabaddhesu vatthūsu vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1534_18: imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti evaṃ saṅghamajjheyeva nissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1534_21: “Iminā kiṃ āhariyyatū”ti bhaṇante pana “idaṃ nāmā”ti avatvā “sappiādīni bhikkhūnaṃ kappantī”ti evaṃ kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1534_25: taṃ aññena labhitvā diyyamānampi antamaso tato nibbattarukkhacchāyāpi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1534_26: Sace pana so kiñci āharituṃ na icchati,
tika-vin04t:1534_33: Tena animittaṃ katvāva gūthaṃ viya chaṭṭetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1538_6: Nissaggiyavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ vā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1538_7: dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūhi ca nissaggiyavatthuṃ parivattentassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1539_4: tassa vā dhanassa vā rūpiyabhāvo ceva,
tika-vin04t:1542_0: Dasame nānappakārakanti cīvarādīnaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍānaṃ vasena anekavidhaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1542_5: cetāpehī”ti iminā hi nayena parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-vin04t:1542_7: Tasmā ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike yaṃ evaṃ attano kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ datvā mātu santakampi kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1542_10: “imaṃ bhuñjitvā vā gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma āhara vā karohi vā”ti rajanādiṃ āharāpetvā vā dhamakaraṇādiparikkhāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1542_11: bhūmisodhanādiñca navakammaṃ kāretvā vā santaṃ vatthu nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1543_3: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso tasseva puttabhātukampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā idaṃ nāma gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1543_5: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti evaṃ vatvā attano dhanena laddhaṃ gaṇhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1548_0: Pattavaggassa paṭhame atirekapattoti anadhiṭṭhito ca avikappito ca,
tika-vin04t:1548_1: so ca kho ukkaṭṭhamajjhimomakānaṃ aññataro pamāṇayuttova,
tika-vin04t:1548_2: tassa pamāṇaṃ “aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhātī”tiādinā (pārā 602) nayena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1548_4: anupahatapurāṇasālitaṇḍulānaṃ sukoṭṭitaparisuddhānaṃ dve magadhanāḷiyo gahetvā tehi taṇḍulehi anuttaṇḍulamakilinnamapiṇḍikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1548_5: suvisadaṃ kundamakuḷarāsisadisaṃ avassāvitodanaṃ pacitvā niravasesaṃ patte pakkhipitvā tassa odanassa
tika-vin04t:1548_6: catutthabhāgappamāṇo nātighano nātitanuko hatthahāriyo sabbasambhārasaṅkhato muggasūpo pakkhipitabbo,
tika-vin04t:1548_7: tato ālopassa anurūpaṃ yāvacarimālopappahonakaṃ macchamaṃsādibyañjanaṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1548_12: evametaṃ sabbampi pakkhittaṃ sace pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1548_13: suttena vā hīrena vā chindantassa suttassa vā hīrassa vā heṭṭhimantaṃ phusati,
tika-vin04t:1548_15: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1548_23: Iccetesu navasu ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako cāti dve apattā,
tika-vin04t:1548_27: tasmā evaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ samaṇasāruppena pakkaṃ ayopattaṃ vā mattikāpattaṃ vā labhitvā purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1548_28: Sace panassa mūlato kākaṇikamattampi dātabbaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1548_33: Sace pana koci apattako bhikkhu dasa patte labhitvā sabbe attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1548_34: ekaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya puna divase taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo,
tika-vin04t:1548_36: Yo panassa patto mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato paṭṭhāya yatthakatthaci kaṅgusitthanikkhamanamattena chiddena chiddo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1552_0: Dutiye ūnāni pañca bandhanāni assāti ūnapañcabandhano,
tika-vin04t:1552_4: Tattha yasmā abandhanassāpi pañca bandhanāni na pūrenti sabbaso natthitāya,
tika-vin04t:1552_5: tenassa padabhājane “ūnapañcabandhano nāma patto abandhano vā ekabandhano vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1552_6: “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti ca vuttattā yassa pañcabandhano patto hoti pañcabandhanokāso vā,
tika-vin04t:1552_9: Yasmiṃ pana patte mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā bhaṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā ekāpi rāji hoti,
tika-vin04t:1552_10: taṃ tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjukamakacirajjukādīhi vā
tika-vin04t:1552_11: tipusuttakena vā bandhitvā taṃ bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭakena vā kenaci baddhasilesādinā
tika-vin04t:1552_16: Yassa pana dve rājiyo vā ekāyeva vā caturaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1552_18: Yassa tisso vā ekāyeva vā chaḷaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1552_20: Yassa catasso vā ekāyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1552_22: Yassa pañca vā ekāyeva vā dasaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1553_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti,
tika-vin04t:1553_1: tāni ce ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti,
tika-vin04t:1553_4: Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1553_9: Yo pana evaṃ pattasaṅkhepagate vā ayopatte,
tika-vin04t:1553_10: ūnapañcabandhane vā mattikāpatte sati aññaṃ viññāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1553_16: Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāyātiettha tehi bhikkhūhi pakatiyā eva attano attano adhiṭṭhitaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā sannipatitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1553_17: tato sammatena pattaggāhāpakena pattassa vijjamānaguṇaṃ vatvā “bhante,
tika-vin04t:1553_19: Sace therassa so patto na ruccati,
tika-vin04t:1553_23: therassa pattaṃ dutiyattheraṃ gāhāpetvā eteneva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhāpetabbo,
tika-vin04t:1553_28: Sace pana taṃ jigucchanto adese vā nikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1554_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha bahū patte viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1554_10: evaṃ ekekena pattena dasadhā dasavidhaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1554_22: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1557_2: Etena sayaṃ uggahetvā nikkhittānaṃ sattāhātikkamepi anāpattiṃ dasseti,
tika-vin04t:1557_4: Bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin04t:1557_12: Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchurasaṃ upādāya pana apakkā vā avatthukapakkā vā sabbāpi ucchuvikati “phāṇita”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1557_16: tesaṃ vatthūni paṭiggahetvā katāni sappiādīni sattāhaṃ atikkāmayatopi anāpattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin04t:1557_17: Vasātelaṃ pana kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nipakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1557_18: tasmā ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ aññaṃ yaṃkañci vasaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā sāmaṃ pacitvā nibbattitatelampi sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1557_19: Anupasampannena pacitvā dinnaṃ pana tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1557_20: aññesaṃ yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ vatthuṃ pacituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1557_21: Nibbattitasappi vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1557_22: taṃ pana tadahupurebhattampi sāmisaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1557_23: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrādito anupasampannena pacitvā katasappiādīni pana tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisānipi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1557_26: Sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti sannidhiṃ katvā nidahitvā purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitāni tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenāpi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1557_28: pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitāni ca sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbānīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1557_29: “Paribhuñjitabbānī”ti ca vacanato antosattāhe abbhañjanādīnaṃ atthāya adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitesu anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:1557_30: yāvajīvikāni sāsapamadhūkaeraṇḍakaaṭṭhīni telakaraṇatthaṃ paṭiggahetvā tadaheva katatelaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1557_39: telatthāya paṭiggahitasāsapādīnaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappiādīnañca sattāhātikkame dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1557_43: taṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi aruādīni vā makkhetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1557_47: Yaṃ pana nirapekkho pariccajitvā puna labhati,
tika-vin04t:1558_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha sattāhaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1561_0: Catutthe māso seso gimhānanti catunnaṃ gimhamāsānaṃ eko pacchimamāso seso.
tika-vin04t:1561_1: Pariyesitabbanti gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1561_4: attano ñātakappavāritaṭṭhānato pana “detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara”ntiādikāya viññattiyāpi pariyesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1561_6: yathā vā tathā vā “detha me”tiādivacanena viññāpentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1561_7: Katvā nivāsetabbanti gimhānaṃ pacchimaddhamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1561_8: tāva sūcikammaniṭṭhānena sakimpi vaṇṇabhedamattarajanena kappabindukaraṇena ca katvā paridahitabbā.
tika-vin04t:1561_11: vassānassa catūsu māsesu sabbampi taṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1561_12: Yo cāyaṃ gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso anuññāto,
tika-vin04t:1561_13: ettha katapariyesitampi vassikasāṭikaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1561_14: Sace tasmiṃ māse atikkante vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyati,
tika-vin04t:1561_17: Sace satisammosena vā appahonakabhāvena vā akatā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1561_18: Te ca dve māse vassānassa catumāsanti cha māse parihāraṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1561_22: Tato parampi satiyā paccāsāya taṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapentassa ekamāsanti evaṃ ekādasa māse parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:1562_0: Orena ce māso seso gimhānanti gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa orimabhāge yāva hemantassa paṭhamadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1562_2: Pariyeseyyāti etesu sattasu piṭṭhisamayamāsesu aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato satuppādakaraṇena pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1562_6: Orenaddhamāso seso gimhānanti gimhānassa pacchimaddhamāsato orimabhāge ekasmiṃ addhamāse.
tika-vin04t:1562_7: Katvā nivāseyyāti etthantare dhammena uppannampi katvā nivāsentassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1563_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha vassikasāṭikapariyesanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1563_5: tathā satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggassa kāyaṃ ovassāpayato.
tika-vin04t:1563_6: Pokkharaṇiyādīsu pana nhāyantassa vā acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā “anivatthaṃ corā harantī”ti
tika-vin04t:1563_7: evaṃ āpadāsu vā nivāsayato ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1563_10: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1563_14: asamaye nivāsananti imāni nivāsanāpattiyā cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1566_0: Pañcame sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvāti veyyāvaccādīni paccāsisamāno sayameva datvā.
tika-vin04t:1566_1: Acchindeyyāti veyyāvaccādīni akarontaṃ disvā sakasaññāya acchindantassa vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1567_8: anupasampannassa ca yaṃkiñci acchindato vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1567_9: Tena tuṭṭhena vā kupitena vā dinnaṃ pana tassa vissāsaṃ vā gaṇhantassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1567_14: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1570_0: Chaṭṭhe suttanti chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādiṃ vā tesaṃ anulomaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1570_4: Nissaggiyanti evaṃ vāyāpentassa yo tantavāyo cīvaravāyanatthaṃ turivemasajjanādike payoge karoti,
tika-vin04t:1571_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha cīvaravāyāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1571_3: viññāpitasuttaṃ viññāpitatantavāyena vāyāpentassa dīghato vidatthimatte tiriyañca hatthamatte vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1571_6: Teneva pana aviññattiyā laddhasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1571_8: Teneva viññattañca aviññattañca vāyāpentassa sace vuttappamāṇena kedārabaddhaṃ viya cīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1571_13: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1571_16: kappiyākappiyehi tantavāyehi suttepi kappiye akappiye kappiyākappiye ca āpattibhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1571_26: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1574_0: Sattame tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra gāme vā nigame vā tantavāyā, tatra.
tika-vin04t:1574_16: Piṇḍapātamattampīti ettha ca na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattena taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1574_17: sace pana te tassa vacanena cīvarasāmikānaṃ hatthato suttaṃ gahetvā īsakampi āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karonti,
tika-vin04t:1575_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1578_6: idhāpi paṭhamapadassa anupayogatā purimanayeneva bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1578_9: sacepi tāni divasāni accantameva bhikkhuno accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1578_11: Tena pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1578_13: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1578_14: Accekacīvaranti gamikagilānagabbhiniabhinavuppannasaddhānaṃ puggalānaṃ aññatarena “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocetvā dinnaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1578_20: Yāva cīvarakālasamayanti anatthate kathine yāva vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin04t:1579_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha accekacīvarassa cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1582_0: Navame upavassaṃ kho panāti ettha upavassanti upavassa,
tika-vin04t:1582_4: Imassa ca padassa “tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”tiiminā sambandho,
tika-vin04t:1582_6: vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā ca tato paraṃ pacchimakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānakālaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni…pe…
tika-vin04t:1582_8: Tattha āraññakānīti sabbapacchimāni āropitena ācariyadhanunā gāmassa indakhīlato paṭṭhāya pañcadhanusatappamāṇe padese katasenāsanāni.
tika-vin04t:1582_11: Sace vihārassa parikkhepo vā aparikkhittassa yaṃ gāmato sabbapaṭhamaṃ senāsanaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā bodhi vā dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā yāva,
tika-vin04t:1583_0: Antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti āraññakassa senāsanassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu attanā abhirucite gocaragāme nikkhipeyya.
tika-vin04t:1583_9: Ūnappamāṇe vā gāvutato atirekappamāṇe vā na labhati,
tika-vin04t:1583_10: yatra hi piṇḍāya caritvā bhuttavelāyameva puna vihāraṃ sakkā āgantuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1583_17: Tato ce uttari vippavaseyyāti chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāti attho,
tika-vin04t:1583_18: tathā asakkontena pana gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā sabhāyaṃ vā yattha katthaci vā vasitvā cīvarappavattiṃ ñatvā pakkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1583_19: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno cīvarena vippavāsasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1583_20: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa atirekachārattaṃ vippavasato nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1584_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha cīvaravippavāsavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1587_1: So hi saṅghassa pariṇatattā hatthe anāruḷhopi ekena pariyāyena saṅghasantako hoti.
tika-vin04t:1587_3: Pariṇatanti “dassāma karissāmā”ti vacībhedena vā hatthamuddāya vā saṅghassa ninnaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1587_4: Attano pariṇāmeyyāti “idaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”tiādīni vadanto attaninnaṃ kareyya.
tika-vin04t:1587_8: Pariṇataṃ pana sahadhammikānaṃ vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi attano pariṇāmentassa payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1588_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha pariṇāmanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1588_5: saṅghacetiyapuggalesu yassa kassaci pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghādīnaṃ pariṇāmentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1588_9: tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyyā”tiādīni vadantassa,
tika-vin04t:1596_0: Pācittiyesu musāvādavaggassa paṭhame sampajānamusāvādeti pubbepi jānitvā vacanakkhaṇepi jānantasseva musāvādabhaṇane.
tika-vin04t:1596_1: Bhaṇanañca nāma idha abhūtassa vā bhūtataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1596_2: bhūtassa vā abhūtataṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā viññāpanappayogo,
tika-vin04t:1596_5: tassa taṃnimittaṃ taṃhetu tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ hotīti evamettha aññesu ca īdisesu attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1597_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha avajānitvā paṭijānanādivatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1597_7: “yo te vihāre vasī”tiādinā pariyāyena uttarimanussadhammārocanatthaṃ paṭivijānantassa musā bhaṇite thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1597_15: tassa puggalassa viññāpanapayogo cāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1600_1: jātināmagottakammasippaābādhaliṅgakilesaāpattiakkosesu bhūtena vā abhūtena vā yena kenaci pārājikaṃ āpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1600_2: vā anāpannaṃ vā yaṃkiñci bhikkhuṃ yāya kāyaci vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā anaññāpadesena akkosanavacane
tika-vin04t:1601_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha omasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1601_3: tehiyeva dasahi akkosavatthūhi “santi idhekacce caṇḍālā”tiādinā nayena aññāpadesaṃ katvā akkosantassa,
tika-vin04t:1601_5: yathā tathā vā anupasampannaṃ akkosantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1601_7: Anakkositukāmassa kevalaṃ davakamyatāya vadato sabbattha dubbhāsitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1604_1: jātiādīhi akkosavatthūhi bhikkhū akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā vacanaṃ bhikkhuno piyakamyatāya vā bhedādhippāyena vā yo akkuddho,
tika-vin04t:1604_2: tassa bhikkhussa kāyena vā vācāya vā upasaṃhaṭe tasmiṃ pesuññakaraṇavacane pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1605_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha pesuññaupasaṃharaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1605_3: vuttanayeneva aññāpadesena akkosantassa vacanūpasaṃhāre vā pāḷimuttakaakkosūpasaṃhāre vā anupasampannassa ca upasaṃhāre dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1605_8: Jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā vacanaṃ bhikkhussa upasaṃharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1608_0: Catutthe padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti saṅgītittayaṃ anāruḷhampi rājovādatikkhindriyacatuparivattananandopanandakulumpasuttamaggakathādidhammañca
tika-vin04t:1608_3: Pācittiyanti etesu padādīsu bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā yaṃkañci koṭṭhāsaṃ avasesapuggalehi saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa padādigaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1609_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha padaso dhammavācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1609_9: osārentassa ca khalitaṭṭhāne “evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti vacane ca ekato bhaṇantassāpi,
tika-vin04t:1612_0: Pañcame anupasampannenāti bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenāpi.
tika-vin04t:1612_1: Uttaridirattatirattanti dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā rattīnaṃ upari.
tika-vin04t:1612_2: Sahaseyyanti sabbacchannaparicchanne yebhuyyena channaparicchanne vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā ekakkhaṇena vā ekato nipajjanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1612_4: Tattha chadanaṃ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā paricchinnampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1612_5: tasmā iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti,
tika-vin04t:1612_7: yo tattha vā aññattha vā tādise tena vā aññena vā anupasampannena saha tisso rattiyo sayitvā catutthadivase
tika-vin04t:1612_8: atthaṅgate sūriye anupasampanne nipanne gabbhadvāraṃ pidhāya vā apidhāya vā nipajjati,
tika-vin04t:1612_9: paṭhamanipanno vā tasmiṃ nipajjante na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1612_10: tassa ubhinnaṃ uṭṭhahitvā nipajjanappayogagaṇanāya anupasampannagaṇanāya ca pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1613_0: Āḷaviyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anupasampannena sahaseyyavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1613_5: upasampanne anupasampannasaññino vematikassa vā upaddhacchannaparicchannādīsu ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1613_7: tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasantassa,
tika-vin04t:1616_1: Dissamānarūpā pana yakkhipetiyo paṇḍako methunavatthubhūtā ca tiracchānitthiyo idha dukkaṭavatthukā honti.
tika-vin04t:1617_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmena sahaseyyavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1617_1: sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ aññatra rattiparicchedā,
tika-vin04t:1620_0: Sattame uttarichappañcavācāhītiettha eko gāthāpādo ekā vācāti evaṃ sabbattha vācāpamāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1620_1: Dhammaṃ deseyyāti padasodhammasikkhāpade vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ vā aṭṭhakathādhammaṃ vā bhāseyya.
tika-vin04t:1620_2: Aññatra viññunā purisaviggahenāti vinā viññunā purisena.
tika-vin04t:1620_3: Manussaviggahaṃ gahetvā ṭhitena pana yakkhena vā petena vā tiracchānena vā saddhiṃ ṭhitāyapi dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1620_4: Pācittiyanti dutiyāniyate vuttalakkhaṇena manussena vinā viññumanussitthiyā channaṃ vācānaṃ upari padādivasena dhammaṃ desentassa padādigaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:1621_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmassa dhammadesanāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1621_5: amātugāme mātugāmasaññino vematikassa vā yakkhipetipaṇḍakamanussaviggahatiracchānitthīnaṃ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1621_10: puna nisīditvā mātugāmassa vā uṭṭhahitvā puna nisinnassa,
tika-vin04t:1621_12: “dīghanikāyo nāma bhante kimatthiyo”ti evaṃ pana puṭṭhe sabbampi dīghanikāyaṃ desentassa,
tika-vin04t:1621_15: Vuttalakkhaṇassa dhammassa channaṃ vācānaṃ upari desanā,
tika-vin04t:1624_0: Aṭṭhame uttarimanussadhammanti catutthapārājike vuttalakkhaṇaṃ uttarimanussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1624_1: Bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyanti attani jhānādidhamme sati taṃ bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā aññassa ārocayato pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1625_0: Vesāliyaṃ vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha tesaṃ bhūtārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1625_3: nippariyāyena attani vijjamānaṃ jhānādidhammaṃ ārocentassa sace yassa āroceti,
tika-vin04t:1625_4: so anantarameva “ayaṃ jhānalābhī”ti vā “ariyo”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena tamatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1625_7: Pariyāyena ārocitaṃ pana jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin04t:1625_12: jhānalābhino pana tasmiṃ sati jhānā parihāyanti,
tika-vin04t:1628_3: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho abhiṇhāpattikassa bhikkhuno āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya āpattīnañca kulānañca
tika-vin04t:1628_4: pariyantaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā tikkhattuṃ apaloketvā katikaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1628_6: ayathākatikāya “ayaṃ asuciṃ mocetvā saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena vatthunā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ ghaṭetvā ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1629_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha duṭṭhullāpattiārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1629_6: anupasampannassa purimapañcasikkhāpadavītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ vā itaraṃ aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāraṃ ārocentassāpi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1632_0: Dasame pathavinti duvidhā pathavī jātapathavī ajātapathavīti.
tika-vin04t:1632_2: tattha suddhapathavī nāma pakatiyā suddhapaṃsu vā suddhamattikā vā.
tika-vin04t:1632_3: Missapathavī nāma yattha paṃsuto vā mattikāto vā pāsāṇasakkharakathalamarumbavālukāsu aññatarassa tatiyabhāgo hoti.
tika-vin04t:1632_4: Puñjapathavī nāma “atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1632_5: vuttalakkhaṇena pana missakapuñjopi piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhitasukhumarajampi ca deve phusāyante sakiṃ tintaṃ
tika-vin04t:1632_7: Tividhāpi cesā pathavī uddhanapattapacanādivasena vā yathā tathā vā adaḍḍhā ‘jātapathavī’ti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1632_8: daḍḍhā pana vuttappamāṇato adhikatarapāsāṇādimissā vā ajātapathavī nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1632_12: Yo bhikkhu taṃ evarūpaṃ pathaviṃ sayaṃ khaṇati,
tika-vin04t:1632_17: tassa “imaṃ padesa”nti vā “imaṃ pathavi”nti vā evaṃ niyametvā “khaṇa,
tika-vin04t:1632_19: sakiṃ āṇatte divasampi khaṇante āṇāpakassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1633_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha pathavikhaṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1633_4: apathaviyā pathavisaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1633_8: ātapena sussitvā phalitakaddamaṃ vā gokaṇṭakaṃ vā heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddhaṃ bhijjitvā patitanaditaṭaṃ
tika-vin04t:1633_9: vā mahantampi naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍantievamādīni sabbañca ajātapathaviṃ vikopentassa,
tika-vin04t:1638_0: Bhūtagāmavaggassa paṭhame bhūtagāmapātabyatāyāti ettha bhavanti ahesuñcāti bhūtā,
tika-vin04t:1638_1: jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā vaḍḍhitā cāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1638_11: Tasmā yo bhikkhu pathaviudakapākārādīsu yatthakatthaci jātaṃ asukkhaṃ antamaso atisukhumatiṇampi sāsapabījakasevālampi
tika-vin04t:1638_12: uddharaṇacchedanavijjhanādīhi vikopeti vā pathavikhaṇane vuttanayena vikopāpeti vā pācittiyaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1639_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha rukkhachindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1639_4: vā bhūmiyaṃ ropitampi nikkhantamūlamattaṃ vā nikkhantaaṅkuramattaṃ vā sacepissa vidatthimattā pattavaṭṭi
tika-vin04t:1639_6: anikkhante vā mūle nikkhante vā mūle yāva aṅkuro harito na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1639_19: imaṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti bhaṇantassa ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1639_20: Evaṃ kappiyavacanena bhūtagāmato viyojitaṃ pana bījajātaṃ puna pi “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti kāretvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1640_0: Kappiyaṃ karontena pana agginā vā nakhena vā satthena vā kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1640_1: agginā karontena ca yena kenaci agginā ekadese phusantena ‘kappiya’nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1640_2: Satthena karontena yassa kassaci tikhiṇasatthassa antamaso sūcinakhacchedanādīnampi tuṇḍena vā dhārāya
tika-vin04t:1640_3: vā vedhaṃ vā chedaṃ vā dassentena tatheva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1640_4: Nakhena karontena ṭhapetvā gomahiṃsādīnaṃ khure yena kenaci apūtinā manussānaṃ vā tiracchānānaṃ vā nakhena
tika-vin04t:1640_5: antamaso chinditvā āhaṭenāpi satthe vuttanayeneva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1640_8: ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti,
tika-vin04t:1640_9: ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi vā kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1640_10: Ucchuṃ “kappiyaṃ karissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃ baddhaṃ dārukaṃ vijjhati,
tika-vin04t:1640_12: Sace pana yāya valliyā bhāro baddho,
tika-vin04t:1640_19: Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā na santiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin04t:1640_21: Kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati,
tika-vin04t:1640_25: Yaṃ pana phalaṃ taruṇaṃ hoti abījaṃ yañca nibbattabījaṃ bījaṃ apanetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1640_29: vikopanaṃ vā vikopāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1643_7: Tasmā yo bhikkhu sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno saṅghamajjhe anuyuñjiyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo aññena vacanena aññaṃ chādento tathā tathā vikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1643_9: tesaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā aññavādakakammañceva vihesakakammañca anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1643_10: tasmiṃ saṅghena kate puna tathā karontānaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1644_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1644_5: anāropite pana aññavādake vā vihesake vā tathā karontassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1644_6: Āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ vā ajānantassa “kiṃ tumhe bhaṇathā”ti pucchato,
tika-vin04t:1644_9: adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissantī”ti iminā adhippāyena na kathentassa,
tika-vin04t:1644_13: chādetukāmatāya aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvo vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1647_0: Tatiye yena vacanena ujjhāpenti “chandāya itthannāmo idaṃ nāma karotī”tiādīni vadantā upasampannaṃ saṅghena
tika-vin04t:1647_1: sammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakādibhedaṃ tassa ayasakāmā hutvā bhikkhūhi avajānāpenti,
tika-vin04t:1647_10: Tasmā yo sammatassa bhikkhuno ayasakāmatāya upasampannassa vadanto ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā,
tika-vin04t:1648_0: Rājagahe mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha ujjhāpanakhiyyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1648_7: asammatassa ca avaṇṇaṃ yassa kassaci santike bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1648_8: anupasampannassa pana sammatassa vā asammatassa vā avaṇṇaṃ yassa kassacideva santike bhaṇantassa ca dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1648_9: Pakatiyāva chandādivasena karontaṃ ujjhāpentassa vā khiyyantassa vā,
tika-vin04t:1648_17: ujjhāpanaṃ vā khiyyanaṃ vāti imānettha cha aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1651_1: Mañcādīsu yokoci mañcasaṅkhepena kato sabbopi mañcoyeva,
tika-vin04t:1651_3: Yena kenaci pana coḷena vā kappiyacammena vā chaviṃ katvā ṭhapetvā manussalomaṃ tālīsapattañca yehi kehici
tika-vin04t:1651_7: Kocchaṃ pana vākausīramuñjapabbajādīnaṃ aññataramayaṃ anto saṃvellitvā baddhaṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ
tika-vin04t:1651_11: Ajjhokāseti ettha ye avassikasaṅketā vassānamāsāti evaṃ asaññitā aṭṭha māsā,
tika-vin04t:1651_12: te ṭhapetvā itaresu catūsu māsesu sacepi devo na vassati.
tika-vin04t:1651_13: Tathāpi pakatiajjhokāse ca ovassakamaṇḍape ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1651_15: tattha aparepi cattāro māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1651_16: Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ visuddhaṃ nabhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1651_17: tasmā tadā kenacideva karaṇīyena gacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1651_18: Kākādīnaṃ nibaddhavāsarukkhamūle pana kadācipi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1651_19: Iti yattha ca yadā ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1652_0: Santharitvāti tathārūpe ṭhāne attano vā parassa vā atthāya santharitvā.
tika-vin04t:1652_1: Aññassatthāya santhatampi hi yāva so tattha na nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:1652_7: tañca kho yāva āṇāpako tattha na nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:1652_9: Yasmiñhi attanā santharāpite vā pakatisanthate vā upasampanno nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:1652_13: na uddharāpeyyāti attanā vā uddharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne na ṭhapeyya,
tika-vin04t:1652_15: Anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti,
tika-vin04t:1652_17: tathārūpaṃ anāpucchitvā taṃ senāsanaṃ tassa aniyyātetvā nirapekkho gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1652_21: Bhojanasālāya ṭhito pana “asukasmiṃ nāma divāvihāraṭṭhāne paññapetvā gacchāhī”ti pesetvā tato nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin04t:1653_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santhataṃ anuddharitvā anāpucchaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1653_5: cimilikaṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā taṭṭikaṃ vā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ vā pādapuñchanaṃ vā phalakapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1653_6: vā yaṃ vā panaññaṃ kañci dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ antamaso pattādhārakampi vuttalakkhaṇe ajjhokāse
tika-vin04t:1653_8: Āraññakena pana asati anovassake sabbaṃ rukkhe laggetvāpi yathā vā upacikāhi na khajjati,
tika-vin04t:1653_25: vuttalakkhaṇe dese santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1656_0: Pañcame vihāreti gabbhe vā aññatarasmiṃ vā sabbaparicchanne vuttasenāsane.
tika-vin04t:1656_1: Seyyanti seyyā nāma bhisī cimilikā uttarattharaṇaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ taṭṭikā cammakkhaṇḍo nisīdanaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1656_2: Tattha cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katā.
tika-vin04t:1656_3: Uttarattharaṇaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhādīnaṃ upari attharitabbayuttakaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1656_4: Bhūmattharaṇaṃ nāma cimilikāya sati tassā upari,
tika-vin04t:1656_12: Iti imāsu dasasu seyyāsu ekampi seyyaṃ attano vassaggena gahetvā vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharitvā vā
tika-vin04t:1656_13: santharāpetvā vā yo bhikkhu disaṃgamiko yathā ṭhapitaṃ upacikāhi na khajjati,
tika-vin04t:1657_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1657_5: vuttalakkhaṇassa pana vihārassa upacāre bahi āsanne upaṭṭhānasālāya vā aparicchannamaṇḍape vā paricchanne
tika-vin04t:1657_6: vāpi bahūnaṃ sannipātabhūte rukkhamūle vā santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā,
tika-vin04t:1657_7: mañcapīṭhañca vihāre vā vuttappakāre vihārūpacāre vā santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā uddharaṇādīni akatvā gacchantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1657_12: yo ca “ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmī”ti evaṃ sāpekkho nadipāraṃ vā gāmantaraṃ vā gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1657_13: tattheva ṭhito kañci pesetvā vā āpucchati,
tika-vin04t:1657_14: nadipūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibuddho na sakkoti paccāgantuṃ, tassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1657_19: vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1660_6: saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharagaṇavācakācariyānaṃ vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca
tika-vin04t:1660_7: sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā sammannitvā deti,
tika-vin04t:1660_11: Anupakhajjāti mañcapīṭhānaṃ vā tassa vā bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāraṃ anupavisitvā.
tika-vin04t:1660_12: Tattha mañcapīṭhānaṃ tāva mahallake vihāre samantā diyaḍḍho hattho upacāro,
tika-vin04t:1660_15: tassa pana pavisantassa pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1660_18: Seyyaṃ kappeyyāti tassa sambādhaṃ kattukāmatāya tasmiṃ upacāre dasasu seyyāsu ekampi santharantassa vā santharāpentassa vā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1660_19: tattha nisīdantassa vā nipajjantassa vā pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1661_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anupakhajja seyyakappanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1661_10: vissāsikassa vā santake pana vihāre santharantassa,
tika-vin04t:1661_11: yo ca gilāno vā sītuṇhapīḷito vā pavisati, tassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1661_17: upacāre nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1664_2: Nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā pācittiyanti ettha ye anekabhūmakā pāsādā,
tika-vin04t:1664_4: tādisesu senāsanesu gahetvā antarā aṭṭhapetvā ekeneva payogena atikkāmentassa ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1664_5: ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā nānāpayogehi atikkāmentassa dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:1664_6: hatthena anāmasitvā ‘nikkhamā’ti vatvā vācāya nikkaḍḍhantassāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1664_8: sakiṃ āṇatte pana tasmiṃ bahukepi dvāre nikkhamante itarassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1664_11: tāva nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti vā evaṃ niyametvā āṇatto hoti,
tika-vin04t:1665_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhikkhuṃ saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1666_6: upaṭṭhānasālādikā vihārūpacārā tassa vā tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane,
tika-vin04t:1666_7: anupasampannassa pana anupasampannaparikkhārassa vā vihārā vā vihārūpacārā vā nikkaḍḍhane nikkaḍḍhāpane ca dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1666_8: Tañca kho asambaddhesu parikkhāresu parikkhāragaṇanāya veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1666_11: sakalasaṅghārāmatopi bhaṇḍanakārakassa vā tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane nikkaḍḍhāpane vā,
tika-vin04t:1666_19: kopena nikkaḍḍhanaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1669_0: Aṭṭhame uparivehāsakuṭiyāti upari acchannatalāya dvibhūmikakuṭiyā vā tibhūmikakuṭiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:1669_1: padabhājane pana idha adhippetaṃ kuṭiṃ dassetuṃ “majjhimassa purisassa asīsaghaṭṭā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1669_5: mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdeyya vā nipajjeyya vāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1669_7: tasmā yo bhikkhu vuttalakkhaṇāya vehāsakuṭiyā sabbantimena paricchedena yāva pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa sabbaso heṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭeti,
tika-vin04t:1669_8: ettakaṃ uccāya tulānaṃ upari ṭhapite āhaccapādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā,
tika-vin04t:1670_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ sahasā abhinisīdanaabhinipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1670_9: yassa vā heṭṭhā dabbasambhārādīnaṃ nikkhittattā aparibhogaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1670_12: yo ce tasmiṃ vehāsaṭṭhepi āhaccapādake ṭhito kiñci gaṇhāti vā laggati vā,
tika-vin04t:1670_20: apaṭāṇidinne āhaccapādake nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1673_2: Yāva dvārakosātiettha dvārakoso nāma ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa sāmantā aḍḍhateyyahattho padeso.
tika-vin04t:1673_8: calitvā sithilā vā hoti patati vā,
tika-vin04t:1673_10: Tattha kiñcāpi “idaṃ nāma kattabba”nti neva mātikāyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1673_13: punappunaṃ lepāpesī”ti adhikārato yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya punappunaṃ limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:1673_15: Te vivaraṇakāle vidatthimattampi atirekampi bhittippadesaṃ paharanti,
tika-vin04t:1673_17: tasmā sabbadisāsu kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso ālokasandhiparikammatthāya limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin04t:1674_1: taṃ dassetvā idāni chadane kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ dvatticchadanassātiādimāha.
tika-vin04t:1674_4: parikkhepadvayaṃ vā parikkhepattayaṃ vā adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1674_8: Yaṃ tasmiṃ khette vuttaṃ na tāva sampajjati,
tika-vin04t:1674_11: Tasmā tasmiṃ ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhahanto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1674_13: piṭṭhivaṃsassa vā kūṭāgārathūpikāya vā passe nisinno puriso chadanamukhavaṭṭiantena olokento yasmiṃ bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
tika-vin04t:1674_14: yasmiñca ṭhito taṃ upari nisinnakaṃ tatheva ullokento passati,
tika-vin04t:1674_16: tassa anto aharitepi ṭhātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin04t:1674_17: Tato ce uttarīti maggena chādiyamāne tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1674_18: pariyāyena chādiyamāne tiṇṇaṃ pariyāyānaṃ upari iṭṭhakasilāsudhāhi chādiyamāne iṭṭhakasilāsudhāpiṇḍagaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:1674_19: tiṇapaṇṇehi chādiyamāne paṇṇagaṇanāya ceva tiṇamuṭṭhigaṇanāya ca pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1675_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha punappunaṃ chādāpanalepāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1678_0: Dasame jānaṃ sappāṇakanti “sappāṇakaṃ eta”nti disvā vā sutvā vā yena kenaci ākārena jānanto.
tika-vin04t:1678_1: Siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vāti tena udakena sayaṃ vā siñceyya,
tika-vin04t:1678_3: Tattha dhāraṃ avicchinditvā siñcantassa ekasmiṃ ghaṭe ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:1678_8: Tattha tattha bandhitvā aññato nentassa payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1678_9: Bahukampi tiṇapaṇṇasākhādiṃ ekappayogena udake pakkhipantassa ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:1678_11: Idañca yaṃ evaṃ pakkhipiyamāne pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1679_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha siñcanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1679_12: vinā vadhakacetanāya yena kenaci karaṇīyena tiṇādīnaṃ siñcananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1684_0: Ovādavaggassa paṭhame asammatoti yā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā ñatticatutthena kammena bhikkhunovādakasammuti anuññātā,
tika-vin04t:1684_2: Ovadeyyāti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vā sambahulā vā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vā “vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1684_3: bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabba”nti ādike aṭṭha garudhamme ovādavasena
tika-vin04t:1685_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1685_3: aññena vā dhammena bhikkhunīsu upasampannamattaṃ vā ovadato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1685_5: tasmiṃ adhammakamme adhammakammasaññino vagge bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1685_6: tathā vematikassa dhammakammasaññino cāti nava pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:1685_9: “dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadatī”ti idaṃ avasānapadaṃ ṭhapetvā teneva nayena sattarasa dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:1685_12: ovādañca aniyyātetvā aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1685_13: Yo pana dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati,
tika-vin04t:1685_19: sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā bhaṇati, tassa,
tika-vin04t:1688_0: Dutiye ovadeyyāti aṭṭhagarudhammehi vā aññena vā dhammena ovadantassa sammatassāpi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:1689_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha atthaṅgate sūriye ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1692_6: Sammatassa pana rattiṃ ovadantassapi dve eva honti.
tika-vin04t:1692_7: Sammatattā hi bhikkhussa garudhammovādamūlakaṃ pācittiyaṃ natthi.
tika-vin04t:1692_8: Gilānāti na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantuṃ.
tika-vin04t:1693_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1693_7: itaraṃ aññena dhammena ovadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Samaye,
tika-vin04t:1696_2: Pācittiyanti evarūpe bhikkhū avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1697_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “āmisahetu ovadantī”ti bhaṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1697_6: anupasampannañca sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vā evaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1697_7: Tattha yo bhikkhu kāle sammutiṃ labhitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ saṇṭhito,
tika-vin04t:1697_9: Pakatiyā cīvarādihetu ovadantaṃ pana evaṃ bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1697_14: avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1700_0: Pañcame sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha cīvaradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1703_1: Sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyyā vāti ettha sayaṃ sibbantassa sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇe pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1703_2: satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā sakiṃ nīharantassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1703_3: ‘Sibbā’ti vutto pana sacepi sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ niṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1703_6: sabbaṃ taṃ tava bhāro”ti vutto niṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1704_11: vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1707_8: Tattha ṭhapetvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ antarārāmaṃ āsanasālaṃ titthiyaseyyañca sesā akappiyabhūmi,
tika-vin04t:1707_10: Saṃvidahitvā pana “ajja vā sve vā”ti niyamitaṃ kālaṃ visaṅketaṃ akatvā,
tika-vin04t:1707_11: dvāravisaṅketaṃ pana maggavisaṅketaṃ vā katvāpi bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ gacchantassa yāva āsannassāpi aññassa
tika-vin04t:1707_12: gāmassa “ayaṃ imassa upacāro”ti manussehi ṭhapitaṃ upacāraṃ na okkamati,
tika-vin04t:1707_17: Addhayojanātikkame pana gāme asati addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1708_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ekaddhānamaggappaṭipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1708_6: yo ca bhikkhuniyā asaṃvidahantiyā kevalaṃ attanāva saṃvidahati,
tika-vin04t:1708_16: gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1711_2: Uddhaṃgāmininti kīḷāvasena uddhaṃ nadiyā paṭisotaṃ gacchantiṃ.
tika-vin04t:1711_4: Yaṃ pana titthappaṭipādanatthaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho vā haranti,
tika-vin04t:1711_10: agāmakatīrapassena vā yojanavitthatāya nadiyā majjhena vā gamanakāle addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1712_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha nāvābhiruhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1715_1: neva tassa nāttano ñātakappavāritānaṃ gihīnaṃ santike bhikkhussa guṇaṃ pakāsetvā “detha ayyassa,
tika-vin04t:1715_2: karotha ayyassā”ti evaṃ nipphāditaṃ laddhabbaṃ katanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1715_6: bhikkhuniyā paripācanato pubbe paṭhamataraṃyeva yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gihīnaṃ paṭiyāditabhattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1715_8: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ jānaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1719_0: Dasame sabbopi kathāmaggo dutiyaaniyate vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1719_1: Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ dutiyaaniyatena ca upari upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadena ca ekaparicchedaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1724_0: Bhojanavaggassa paṭhame agilānenāti addhayojanampi gantuṃ samatthena.
tika-vin04t:1724_2: Āvasathapiṇḍoti “imesaṃ vā ettakānaṃ vā”ti ekaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1724_3: “ettakamevā”ti evaṃ bhattaṃ vā anodissa sālādīsu yattha katthaci puññakāmehi paññattaṃ bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1724_4: Bhuñjitabboti ekakulena vā nānākulehi vā ekato hutvā ekasmiṃ vā ṭhāne,
tika-vin04t:1724_6: sve ekasmi”nti evaṃ aniyataṭṭhāne vā paññatto ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasameva bhuñjitabbo.
tika-vin04t:1724_7: Tato ce uttarīti dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ vā ṭhāne aññasmiṃ vā ṭhāne tesaṃ santakassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1725_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍabhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1725_12: gamissāmī’ti ca bhuñjitvā nikkhanto kenaci upaddavena nivattitvā khemabhāvaṃ ñatvā gacchanto puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1725_16: ṭhapetvā vā pañca bhojanāni aññaṃ bhuñjati, tassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1728_1: Idha ca gaṇoti cattāro vā tatuttari vā bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:1728_2: tesaṃ nimantanato vā viññattito vā laddhe odanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarabhojaneti attho.
tika-vin04t:1728_4: sace hi koci cattāro bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā “odanena nimantemi,
tika-vin04t:1728_6: te ce evaṃ ekato vā nānāto vā nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā gantvā ekato gaṇhanti,
tika-vin04t:1728_7: pacchā ekato vā nānāto vā bhuñjanti,
tika-vin04t:1728_10: Sace odanādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā ekato vā nānāto vā viññāpetvā ca gantvā ca ekato gaṇhanti,
tika-vin04t:1728_14: Gilānasamayādīsu yadā pādānampi phalitattā na sakkā piṇḍāya carituṃ,
tika-vin04t:1728_18: Yadā yo cīvare kariyamāne kiñcideva cīvare kattabbaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1728_20: Yadā addhayojanampi gantukāmo vā hoti gacchati vā gato vā,
tika-vin04t:1728_23: Yadā gocaragāme cattāro bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā na yāpenti,
tika-vin04t:1729_0: Rājagahe devadattaṃ ārabbha viññāpetvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1729_7: ye ca dve tayo ekato gaṇhanti,
tika-vin04t:1732_0: Tatiye paramparabhojaneti gaṇabhojane vuttanayeneva pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito,
tika-vin04t:1732_1: tassa tassa bhojanato uppaṭipāṭiyā vā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojane.
tika-vin04t:1732_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”ti vā “vikappemī”ti
tika-vin04t:1732_3: vā evaṃ sammukhā vā “itthannāmassa dammī”ti vā “vikappemī”ti vā evaṃ parammukhāvā paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā
tika-vin04t:1733_0: Vesāliyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññatra nimantitabhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1733_2: parivāre pana vikappanampi gahetvā “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1733_8: yo ca samaye vā vikappetvā vā ekasaṃsaṭṭhāni vā dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekato vā katvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1733_10: sakalena gāmena vā pūgena vā nimantito tesu yatthakatthaci bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1736_0: Catutthe pūvehīti paheṇakatthāya paṭiyattehi atirasakamodakasakkhalikādīhi yehi kehici khajjakehi.
tika-vin04t:1736_1: Manthehīti pātheyyatthāya paṭiyattehi yehi kehici sattutilataṇḍulādīhi.
tika-vin04t:1736_2: Dvattipattapūrāti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhaṃ anatikkantā dve vā tayo vā pattapūrā.
tika-vin04t:1736_3: Tato ce uttarīti sacepi tatiyaṃ pattaṃ thūpīkataṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1736_5: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvāti ettha yena dve gahitā honti,
tika-vin04t:1736_6: tena bahi bhikkhuṃ disvā “ettha mayā dve pattapūrā gahitā,
tika-vin04t:1736_8: tenāpi aññaṃ passitvā “paṭhamaṃ āgatena dve pattapūrā gahitā,
tika-vin04t:1736_14: tena aññaṃ disvā “mā kho tvaṃ ettha paṭiggaṇhīti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1736_17: Tato nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbanti laddhaṭṭhānato sabbāsannaṃ āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā yattha vā pana nibaddhaṃ paṭikkamati,
tika-vin04t:1736_18: tattha gantvā ekaṃ pattapūraṃ attano ṭhapetvā sesaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1737_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1737_6: na paheṇakatthāya na pātheyyatthāya vā paṭiyattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1740_6: paṭikkhepo paññāyatī”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttapañcaṅgavasena katappavāraṇo,
tika-vin04t:1740_8: Tattha yasmā “asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti iminā vippakatabhojano ‘pavārito’ti vutto.
tika-vin04t:1740_14: Tasmā ‘bhuttāvī’tivacanena visuṃ kiñci atthasiddhiṃ na passāma,
tika-vin04t:1740_15: “dirattatiratta”ntiādīsu pana dirattādivacanaṃ viya pavāritapadassa parivārabhāvena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1741_0: Pavāraṇaṅgesu pana asanaṃ paññāyatīti vippakatabhojanaṃ dissati,
tika-vin04t:1741_1: taṃ bhuñjamāno cesa puggalo hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1741_3: odanādīnaṃ ce aññataraṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1741_4: Hatthapāse ṭhitoti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ ce bhojanaṃ gaṇhitvā dāyako aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse ṭhito hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1741_5: Abhiharatīti so ce dāyako tassa taṃ bhojanaṃ kāyena abhisaṃharatīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1741_7: taṃ ce abhihaṭaṃ so bhikkhu kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipatīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1741_8: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena pavārito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1742_2: yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1742_3: taṃ odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti imesaṃ aññatarameva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1742_4: Tattha odano nāma sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrūsakoti imesaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule
tika-vin04t:1742_5: gahetvā “bhattaṃ pacāmā”ti vā “yāguṃ pacāmā”ti vā yaṃkiñci sandhāya pacantu,
tika-vin04t:1742_6: sace uṇhaṃ vā sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati,
tika-vin04t:1742_9: Yo pana pāyāso vā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato otāritamattā abbhuṇhā sakkā hoti āvijjhitvā pivituṃ,
tika-vin04t:1742_10: sā yassa hatthena gahitokāsepi odhi na paññāyati,
tika-vin04t:1742_12: Sace pana usumāya vigatāya ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1742_16: Sacepi bahū paṇṇaphalakaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattāpi taṇḍulā pakkhittā honti,
tika-vin04t:1742_19: Ayāguke nimantane “yāguṃ dassāmā”ti bhatte udakakañjikakhīrādīni ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti,
tika-vin04t:1742_22: Sace pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti,
tika-vin04t:1742_24: Sace yāguyāpi sāsapamattampi macchamaṃsakkhaṇḍaṃ vā nhāru vā pakkhittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1742_26: Ṭhapetvā sānulomānaṃ vuttadhaññānaṃ taṇḍule aññehi veḷutaṇḍulādīhi vā kandamūlaphalehi vā yehi kehici katabhattaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
tika-vin04t:1742_28: Aññehi pana muggādīhi katakummāso pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
tika-vin04t:1742_29: Sattu nāma satta dhaññāni bhajjitvā kato.
tika-vin04t:1742_30: Antamaso kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ taṇḍule koṭṭetvā katacuṇṇampi kuṇḍakampi sattusaṅgahameva gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1742_32: ye keci taṇḍulā vā lājā vā,
tika-vin04t:1742_34: Macchamaṃsesu sace yāguṃ pivantassa yāgusitthamattāneva dve macchakkhaṇḍāni vā maṃsakkhaṇḍāni vā ekabhājane vā nānābhājane vā denti,
tika-vin04t:1742_35: tāni ce akhādanto aññaṃ pavāraṇappahonakaṃ yaṃkiñci paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1742_38: ekaṃ hatthe vā patte vā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1742_45: aññaṃ kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā khādanto paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1743_1: yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipanto pavāraṇaṃ janeti,
tika-vin04t:1743_4: “asanaṃ bhojana”nti ettha tāva yena ekasitthampi ajjhohaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1743_5: so sace pattamukhahatthesu yatthakatthaci bhojane sati sāpekkhova aññaṃ vuttalakkhaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti.
tika-vin04t:1743_12: “Hatthapāse ṭhito”ti ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti,
tika-vin04t:1743_18: tassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1743_20: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipantasseva pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1743_23: Sace pana anantaranisinnopi bhikkhu hatthe vā ādhārake vā ṭhitaṃ pattaṃ anabhiharitvāva “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
tika-vin04t:1743_25: Bhattapacchiṃ ānetvā purato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā evaṃ vuttepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1743_26: Īsakaṃ pana uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā vā ‘gaṇhathā’ti vutte taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1743_27: Bhattapacchiṃ gahetvā parivisantassa añño “ahaṃ dhāressāmī”ti gahitamattameva karoti,
tika-vin04t:1743_30: tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1743_33: tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā na hoti.
tika-vin04t:1743_39: ‘Paṭikkhepo’ti ettha vācāya abhihaṭe paṭikkhepo na ruhati,
tika-vin04t:1743_40: kāyena abhihaṭaṃ pana aṅgulicalanādinā kāyavikārena vā “alaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1743_41: mā dehī”tiādinā vacīvikārena vā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1744_5: Maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā ‘maṃsarasa’nti vuttepi sace sāsapamattampi khaṇḍaṃ atthi,
tika-vin04t:1744_13: “Macchamaṃsaṃ byañjana”nti vā “imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā vutte pana pavāreti,
tika-vin04t:1745_2: Taṃ pana kappiyakatādīhi sattahi vinayakammākārehi akataṃ vā gilānassa anadhikaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1745_4: tattha yaṃ phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappiyehi kappiyaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1745_7: taṃ akappiyaṃ “alametaṃ sabba”nti evaṃ atirittaṃ kataṃ akappiyakatanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1745_8: Appaṭiggahitakatanti bhikkhunā appaṭiggahitaṃyeva purimanayena atirittaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1745_9: Anuccāritakatanti kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi anukkhittaṃ vā anapanāmitaṃ vā kataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1745_10: Ahatthapāse katanti kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ āgatassa hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitena kataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1745_13: Bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena katanti idaṃ uttānameva.
tika-vin04t:1745_14: “Alametaṃ sabba”nti avuttanti vacībhedaṃ katvā evaṃ avuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1745_15: Iti imehi sattahi vinayakammākārehi yaṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1746_0: Apicettha bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotīti antamaso anantaranisinnassa pattato ekampi sitthaṃ vā maṃsahīraṃ vā khāditvā katampi bhuttāvinā kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1746_1: yo pātova evaṃ bhuttāvī pavārito nisīdatiyeva,
tika-vin04t:1746_2: so upakaṭṭhepi kāle abhihaṭaṃ piṇḍaṃ bhikkhunā upanītaṃ kappiyaṃ kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1746_3: Sace pana tasmiṃ kappiye kate bhuñjantassa aññaṃ āmisaṃ ākiranti,
tika-vin04t:1746_4: taṃ so puna kātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin04t:1746_9: tasmā tasmiṃ bhājane kariyamāne paṭhamakatena saddhiṃ kataṃ hotīti taṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1746_10: Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1746_11: Evaṃ kataṃ paṭhamakatena missetvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1746_12: na kevalañca tassa yena pana kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1746_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ pavāritānampi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1746_14: Yathā pana akatena missaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1746_15: evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1746_16: Gilānātirittaṃ pana na kevalaṃ gilānassa bhuttāvasesameva,
tika-vin04t:1746_17: atha kho yaṃkiñci gilānaṃ uddissa “ajja vā sve vā yadā vā icchati,
tika-vin04t:1746_20: Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vāti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1746_21: Khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyanti ettha vuttanayena pavāritassa anatirittaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhato gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1747_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1747_7: tathā atiritte anatirittasaññino ceva vematikassa ca.
tika-vin04t:1750_1: bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti evaṃ pavāreyya.
tika-vin04t:1750_2: Jānanti sutvā vā disvā vā tassa pavāritabhāvaṃ jānanto.
tika-vin04t:1750_4: Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiyanti ettha abhihāre tāva dukkaṭaṃ,
