tika-vin04t:1750_7: tasmiṃ pana bhuñjante abhihārakassa tassa ajjhohāre ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1751_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anatirittena bhojanena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1751_13: yo ca yāmakālikādīni “sati paccaye paribhuñjāhī”ti deti, tassa,
tika-vin04t:1754_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu etasmiṃ antare yaṃkiñci vanamūlaphalaṃ upādāya āmaṃ vā pakkaṃ vā āmisasaṅkhepagataṃ
tika-vin04t:1754_3: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1755_0: Rājagahe sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha vikāle bhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1755_7: kāle kālasaññissa yāmakālikādīni sati paccaye paribhuñjantassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1755_11: na ca bhikkhave bahimukhadvārā nīharitvā ajjhoharitabba”nti anuññātanayena romaṭṭhakassāpi anāpatti. Vikālatā,
tika-vin04t:1758_0: Aṭṭhame sannidhikārakanti kāro karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1758_4: Tasmā evaṃ sannidhikataṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ‘ajjhoharissāmī’ti gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1758_8: gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin04t:1758_12: Yaṃ pana bhikkhu nirapekkho sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajitvā tehi nihitaṃ labhitvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1758_14: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase kappiyabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1758_15: Akappiyesu pana manussamaṃse thullaccayena saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1758_19: Yo pana pavārito hutvā anatirittakataṃ ajjhoharati,
tika-vin04t:1758_23: sati paccaye vikālapaccayā yāmakālikādīsu ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1759_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha sannidhikārakabhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1759_4: sattāhakālika yāvajīvikānaṃ pana āhāratthāya paṭiggahaṇe ajjhohāre ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1759_11: Tasmā sacepi taṃ taṃ tena tena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:1759_12: sace asambhinnarasaṃ vā hoti sudhotaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1760_0: Sace pana sambhinnarasaṃ vā hoti duddhotaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1760_2: Yāvakālikañhi attanā saddhiṃ sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin04t:1760_3: yāmakālikaṃ dvepi sattāhakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin04t:1760_5: Tasmā tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā pure paṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati,
tika-vin04t:1760_11: yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti avatvā “paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1760_12: Kālayāmasattāhātikkamesu cettha vikālabhojana sannidhibhesajjasikkhāpadānaṃ vasena āpattiyo veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:1760_13: imesu pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti imameva dvayaṃ antovuṭṭhañceva sannidhikārakañca,
tika-vin04t:1760_16: Akappiyakuṭiyaṃ antovuṭṭhena pana tena saddhiṃ itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitampi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1760_21: Tattha akappiyakuṭi nāma saṅghassa vā upasampannapuggalassa vā santakaṃ vasanatthāya katagehaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1760_22: tattha sahaseyyappahonake padese vuṭṭhaṃ yāvakālikañca yāmakālikañca saṅghikaṃ vā upasampannapuggalassa vā santakaṃ antovuṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1760_24: yattha katthaci pana sayaṃ pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ nāma,
tika-vin04t:1760_28: Tasmā antovuṭṭhaantopakkamocanatthaṃ bhagavatā catasso kappiyabhūmiyo anuññātā,
tika-vin04t:1760_31: tattha anupasampannassa santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1760_36: yāvakālikādīni tīṇi nidahitvā sakaṃ sakaṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā,
tika-vin04t:1763_7: Macchādīsu pana sabbopi ‘odako’ti vuttalakkhaṇo maccho macchoyeva.
tika-vin04t:1763_10: Evarūpāni paṇītabhojanānīti yāni etehi sappiādīhi saṃsaṭṭhattā ‘paṇītabhojanānī’ti vuccanti,
tika-vin04t:1763_12: Agilānoti yassa tehi vināpi phāsu hoti.
tika-vin04t:1763_13: Attano atthāya viññāpetvāti ettha pana yo agilāno suddhāni sappiādīni bhesajjatthāya viññāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1763_22: sappiñca bhattañca dehī”ti evaṃ viññāpentassa tāva viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1763_25: “Sappibhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana yasmā sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:1763_27: Sace pana “sappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte bhattaṃ datvā “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjāhī”ti navanītakhīrādīni vā
tika-vin04t:1763_28: kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vā deti “iminā sappiṃ gahetvā bhuñjāhī”ti,
tika-vin04t:1763_30: “Gosappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana gosappiṃ vā detu,
tika-vin04t:1763_34: Sace pana “gosappinā dehī”ti yācito ajikāsappiādīhi deti,
tika-vin04t:1763_36: Evañhi sati aññaṃ yācitena aññaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1763_44: Sace pana sabbehipi sappiādīhi ekaṭṭhāne vā nānāṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā paṭiladdhaṃ ekato sambhinnarasaṃ katvā tato kusaggena ekabindumpi ajjhoharati,
tika-vin04t:1764_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paṇītabhojanaviññattivatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1767_0: Dasame adinnanti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ aññatarena na dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1767_2: Appaṭiggahitakañhi bhikkhuno attano santakampi ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1767_5: Sace hi yo koci anupasampanno antamaso tiracchānopi bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā hatthapāse ṭhito kāyādīnaṃ aññatarena deti,
tika-vin04t:1767_6: tañce bhikkhunā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena vā,
tika-vin04t:1767_17: Pubbābhoge ca sati pacchā niddāyantassa patte dinnampi hatthapāse sati paṭiggahitameva hoti.
tika-vin04t:1767_21: tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ pavāraṇāsikkhāpade vuttanayeneva hatthapāso veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1768_0: Sace pana dāyakappaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti,
tika-vin04t:1768_2: bhūmaṭṭhassa sīsena ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1768_9: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā sacepi dve tayo vā sāmaṇerā yaṃ majjhimo puriso ukkhipituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin04t:1768_10: evarūpaṃ bhāraṃ pavaṭṭentā bhikkhuno bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitahatthaṃ āropenti,
tika-vin04t:1768_11: ukkhipitvā vā bhikkhuno pasāritahatthe ekadesenāpi ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:1768_13: Yaṃ pana piṇḍāya carantassa patte rajaṃ patati,
tika-vin04t:1768_17: taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1768_18: Sace “paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vutte vacanaṃ assutvā vā anādiyitvā vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva,
tika-vin04t:1768_21: Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin04t:1768_23: “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1768_24: Taṃ anupasampannassa datvā puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1768_25: Assukheḷasiṅghāṇikādīsu yaṃ ṭhānato cavitvā hatthe vā patte vā patati,
tika-vin04t:1768_31: Yaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ vā mūlaphalaṃ vā mātādīnaṃ atthāya gahetvā chāyatthāya vā phalinisākhaṃ ukkhipitvā gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1768_34: Yo pana tattha jātakaphalinisākhāya vā valliyā vā gahetvā cāleti.
tika-vin04t:1768_35: Tassa tato laddhaṃ phalaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1768_38: phalirukkhaṃ pana apassayituṃ vā ālambituṃ vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1768_39: paṭiggahetvā ṭhapite yaṃ aññaṃ aṅkurādi uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:1768_41: Yāva hi hatthato mutte nirapekkho na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1769_3: galena ajjhoharaṇīyatāya sabbampi taṃ mukhadvāraṃ pavesitameva hoti.
tika-vin04t:1769_4: Āhāranti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā sattāhakālikaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1769_6: tattha sabbampi dhaññaṃ vā dhaññānulomaṃ vā tālanāḷikerapanasalabujaalābukumbhaṇḍapussaphalatipusaphalaeḷālukasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1769_11: Ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ madhukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ sālūkapānaṃ phārusakapānanti imāni aṭṭha pānāni,
tika-vin04t:1769_13: etāni sabbāni anupasampannehi sītodakena madditvā katāni ādiccapākāni vā yāva rattiyā pacchimayāmaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato yāmakālikāni nāma.
tika-vin04t:1769_15: Sappiādīni pañca bhesajjāni sattāhaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato sattāhakālikāni nāma.
tika-vin04t:1769_16: Idaṃ pana yāvakālikādittayaṃ kālavimuttañca udakaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlaphalāphalādi yaṃ neva khādanīyatthaṃ na bhojanīyatthaṃ pharati,
tika-vin04t:1769_17: taṃ yāvajīvaṃ nidahitvā sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbato yāvajīvikaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1769_19: Aññatra udakadantaponāti idaṃ anāhārepi udake āhārasaññāya,
tika-vin04t:1769_20: dantapone ca “mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ ida”nti saññāya kukkuccāyantānaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1769_23: Ṭhapetvā pana idaṃ dvayaṃ avasesaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya gaṇhato gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1770_0: Vesāliyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha adinnaṃ āhāraṃ āharaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1770_9: cattāri mahāvikaṭāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjantassa,
tika-vin04t:1770_11: Ettha dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1770_13: tasmiñca asati alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1770_15: idaṃ pana catubbidhampi mahāvikaṭaṃ kālodissaṃ nāma sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva sāmaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1775_0: Acelakavaggassa paṭhame etesaṃ acelakādīnaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ekappayogena dentassa ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1775_1: avacchinditvā avacchinditvā dentassa payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1776_0: Vesāliyaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paribbājikāya dve pūve dānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1776_9: tesaṃ santike bhājanaṃ nikkhipitvā “idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1776_15: ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1779_0: Dutiye dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vāti yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ dāpetvā vā na dāpetvā vā.
tika-vin04t:1779_1: Uyyojeyyāti mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasanakīḷanarahonisajjādīni kattukāmo ‘gacchā’tiādīni vatvā uyyojeyya.
tika-vin04t:1779_5: yadā panassa so dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā ekena pādena vijahati,
tika-vin04t:1779_8: Ettha ca dassanūpacārassa ajjhokāse ṭhatvā dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1780_6: “ubho ekato na yāpessāmā”ti evamādīhi patirūpakāraṇehi uyyojentassa,
tika-vin04t:1780_10: evaṃ uyyojitassa upacārātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1783_9: tassa mahācatussālādīsu katassa mahallakassa piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā antosayanassa āsanne ṭhāne,
tika-vin04t:1783_10: khuddakassa vā vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdeyyāti attho,
tika-vin04t:1784_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha anupakhajja nisajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1787_0: Catutthapañcamāni sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha paṭicchannāsane ca,
tika-vin04t:1790_0: Chaṭṭhe nimantitoti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantito.
tika-vin04t:1790_1: Sabhatto samānoti teneva nimantanabhattena sabhatto samāno.
tika-vin04t:1790_2: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāti antoupacārasīmāya dassanūpacāre bhikkhuṃ disvā yaṃ sakkā hoti pakativacanena āpucchituṃ,
tika-vin04t:1790_3: tādisaṃ “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena anāpucchitvā.
tika-vin04t:1790_4: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vāti yena bhattena nimantito,

tika-vin04t:1903_2: Yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpannoti yaṃ so anācāraṃ ācaritvā aññāṇakena āpannabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo evamāha,

tika-vin04t:1926_0: Navame dhammikānaṃ kammānanti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katānaṃ apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1926_3: tatra apalokanakammaṃ nāma samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ kittetvā “ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1926_4: Samaggasseva pana saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñattikammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1926_5: Ekāya ñattiyā ceva anussāvanāya ca kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1926_6: Ekāya pana ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1927_0: Tesu apalokanakammaṃ pañca ṭhānāni gacchati osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ kammalakkhaṇanti.
tika-vin04t:1927_4: Mukharassa bhikkhuno bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭentassa “itthannāmo bhikkhu mukharo bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento viharati,
tika-vin04t:1927_10: pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā’ti,
tika-vin04t:1927_13: bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā”’ti evaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1927_14: Yaṃ pana bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ ūruṃ vivaritvā dassanādivatthūsu “avandiyo so,
tika-vin04t:1927_16: bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbo”ti evaṃ avandiyakammaṃ anuññātaṃ,

tika-vin04t:1927_27: tathārūpaṃ vā dhammikaṃ katikaṃ karontehi tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1928_0: Ñattikammaṃ pana nava ṭhānāni gacchati osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ paṭiggahaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ kammalakkhaṇanti.
tika-vin04t:1928_6: ‘āgacchāhī’ti vattabbo”ti evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa osāraṇā osāraṇā nāma.

tika-vin04t:1928_13: itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti evaṃ ubbhāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa
tika-vin04t:1928_17: uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
tika-vin04t:1928_21: saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.

tika-vin04t:1940_12: Etāni hi pañca saṅghasantakāni neva saṅghassa,

tika-vin04t:1940_20: Lohavārako pana kāḷalohatambalohakaṃsalohavaṭṭalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako bhājetabbo,
tika-vin04t:1940_21: pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti,

tika-vin04t:1941_1: ayapatto ayathālakaṃ tambalohathālakanti imāni pana bhājanīyāni,
tika-vin04t:1941_2: kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1941_4: Ṭhapetvā pana taṃ bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe añjanī añjanisalākā natthudānaṃ kaṇṇamalaharaṇī
tika-vin04t:1941_5: sūci khuddako pipphaliko khuddakaṃ ārakaṇṭakaṃ kuñcikā tāḷaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi vedhako bhindivālako yathātathāghanakatalohaṃvippakatalohabhaṇḍañca
tika-vin04t:1941_8: antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya sabbānipi lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva,
tika-vin04t:1941_9: attanā laddhāni pariharitvāpi puggalikaparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbāni,

tika-vin04t:1945_0: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā vā rakkhitagopitāva garubhaṇḍaṃ,

tika-vin04t:1945_4: vā dvivaṭṭā vā saṅghassa santakā garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1945_5: Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā ca bhājanīyā.
tika-vin04t:1945_7: te attano karaṇīyena harantā na vāretabbā.
tika-vin04t:1946_0: Yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1946_1: sopi saṅghassa kamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati.

tika-vin04t:1947_0: Muñjañca pabbajañca avasesañca chadanatiṇaṃ muṭṭhippamāṇampi chadanatiṇasaṅkhepagatesu tālapaṇṇādīsu
tika-vin04t:1947_1: yaṃkiñci ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ vā bahiārāme saṅghike tiṇavatthusmiṃ jātakaṃ vā

tika-vin04t:1948_1: ānetvā vā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ tālapakkamattaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,

tika-vin04t:1949_0: Dārubhaṇḍe yo koci veḷumhi vuttappamāṇo dārubhaṇḍako saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1949_1: api ca sabbāpi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikati dārubhaṇḍena saṅgahitā,
tika-vin04t:1949_2: tattha mañcapīṭhehi asaṅgahitāni āsandikādīni antamaso coḷena vā palālehi vā paṇṇehi vā katapīṭhaṃ upādāya sabbāni āsanāni.
tika-vin04t:1950_0: Vaṅkaphalakaṃ dīghaphalakaṃ cīvaradhovanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaro dantakaṭṭhacchedanagaṇṭhikā
tika-vin04t:1950_1: daṇḍamuggaro nāvā ambaṇaṃ rajanadoṇi udakapaṭicchako dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi
tika-vin04t:1950_2: apādakopi samuggo mañjūsā pādaggaṇhanakato atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo udakadoṇi udakakaṭāhaṃ uḷuṅko kaṭacchupānīyasarāvaṃ
tika-vin04t:1950_3: pānīyasaṅkhoti etesu yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.

tika-vin04t:2025_1: Sikkhā karaṇīyāti “evaṃ nivāsessāmī”ti ārāmepi antaragharepi sabbattha sikkhā kātabbā,

tika-vin04t:2025_5: dukkaṭa”nti evaṃ āpattināmena avatvā “sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti evaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu pāḷi āropitā,

tika-vin04t:2026_0: Idāni parimaṇḍalanti ettha nābhimaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhikato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:2026_1: aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ otāretvā nivāsentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivatthaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2026_2: evaṃ anivāsetvā anādariyena purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2026_4: ye caññe “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā gihinivatthaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2026_5: hatthisoṇḍakaṃ macchavālakaṃ catukkaṇṇakaṃ tālavaṇṭakaṃ satavalikaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2027_0: Tattha hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya.
tika-vin04t:2027_1: Macchavālakaṃ nāma ekatodasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2027_3: heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2027_4: Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2027_5: Satavalikaṃ nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhujitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2027_6: vāmadakkhiṇapassesu vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2027_7: Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2027_8: Saṃvalliyanti mallakammakārādīhi viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2027_9: Evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassāpi maggappaṭipannassāpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2027_10: Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ vā dve vā kaṇṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti,
tika-vin04t:2027_11: anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2028_0: Gilāno pana antokāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:2028_1: agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetabbāni.
tika-vin04t:2028_2: Iti imaṃ khandhake paṭikkhittañca olambakañca sabbaṃ vivajjetvā vuttalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2028_3: tathā anivāsetvā yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2029_0: “Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthu”ntiādike pana vinicchaye surusurukārakaṃ kosambiyaṃ paññattaṃ,

tika-vin04t:2029_2: sesāni sabbāneva sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha olambetvā nivāsanādivatthusmiṃ paññattāni.
