tika-vin04t:2030_1: atha kho “parimaṇḍalaṃyeva nivāsessāmī”ti virajjhitvā aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2030_5: Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā hoti mahāpiṇḍikamaṃso vā,
tika-vin04t:2030_6: tassa sāruppatthāya aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2030_7: Gilānassāti yassa jaṅghāya vā pāde vā vaṇo hoti,
tika-vin04t:2030_8: tassa ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2030_9: Āpadāsūti vāḷā vā corā vā anubandhanti,
tika-vin04t:2030_16: evaṃ sabbattha purimāni dve tattha tattha vuttappaṭipakkhakaraṇañcāti tīṇiyeva honti,
tika-vin04t:2030_17: tasmā ito paraṃ tānipi avatvā anāpattimattameva vakkhāmāti.
tika-vin04t:2032_2: gihipārutaṃ pārupitabba”nti evaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ gihipārutaṃ apārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanaṃ parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin04t:2032_3: tattha yaṃkiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutaṃ surāsoṇḍapārutaṃ antepurikapārutaṃ
tika-vin04t:2032_4: mahājeṭṭhapārutaṃ kuṭippavesakapārutaṃ brāhmaṇapārutaṃ pāḷikārakapārutanti evamādi parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato
tika-vin04t:2032_8: yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:2032_9: yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena antena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:2032_10: yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā ubho ante ure vā olambenti,
tika-vin04t:2032_12: yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhitaṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin04t:2032_13: yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva ekenantena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin04t:2032_14: yathā ca kassakā khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekenantena sarīraṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin04t:2032_15: yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antare sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā aṃsakūṭesu pakkhipanti,
tika-vin04t:2032_16: yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ vivaritvā cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭe āropeti,
tika-vin04t:2032_18: aññe ca evarūpe pārupanadose vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2032_19: Tathā apārupitvā ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2034_1: gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā paṭisaṅgharitvā yāva maṇibandhaṃ
tika-vin04t:2034_3: tathā akatvā pana jāṇuṃ vā uraṃ vā vivaritvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2035_2: piṇḍikamaṃsato paṭṭhāya pāde vivaritvā sesaṃ chādetvā nisinno suppaṭicchanno nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2037_0: Pañcame susaṃvutoti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpento suvinītoti attho. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2039_0: Sattame okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhā khittacakkhu hutvā purato yugamattaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ pekkhamāno,
tika-vin04t:2039_1: ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2041_2: ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho,
tika-vin04t:2041_3: anto indakhīlato paṭṭhāya evaṃ na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2042_0: Dasame nisinnakāle dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenāpi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2045_0: Dvādasamepi eseva nayo. Ubhayattha hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mihitamattaṃ karontassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2047_5: ante tatiyattheroti evaṃ nisinnesu yaṃ saṅghatthero dutiyattherena saddhiṃ manteti,
tika-vin04t:2049_0: Ito paresu chasu kāyappacālakanti kāyaṃ cāletvā cāletvā,
tika-vin04t:2049_2: Tasmā kāyādīni paggahetvā niccalāni ujukāni ṭhapetvā gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca,
tika-vin04t:2051_0: Ekavīsadvāvīsesu khambhakatoti kaṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho.
tika-vin04t:2055_0: Pañcavīse ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādeheva,
tika-vin04t:2055_1: aggapāde vā ukkhipitvā paṇhīhiyeva bhūmiyaṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2057_0: Chabbīse na pallatthikāyāti hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā na nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2057_2: vāsūpagatassa pana idhāpi purimesu ca dvāvīsacatuvīsesu anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2064_0: Tatiye samasūpako nāma yattha muggamāsehi vā kulatthādīhi vā kato hatthahāriyo sūpo bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo hoti,
tika-vin04t:2064_2: Ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbāpi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2064_4: ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya vā attano dhanena vā idha anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2066_0: Catutthe samatittikanti samapuṇṇaṃ samabharitaṃ adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ anatikkamitvā racitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2066_2: Anadhiṭṭhānupage pana yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikādīni ca yatthakatthaci thūpīkatānipi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:2066_3: yaṃ pana dvīsu pattesu gahetvā ekaṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ harati,
tika-vin04t:2066_4: yaṃ vā pakkhipiyamānaṃ pūvaucchukkhaṇḍaphalāphalādi heṭṭhā orohati,
tika-vin04t:2066_6: yañca paṇṇe vā thālake vā pakkhipitvā pattamatthake ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2068_0: Sattame sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin04t:2068_2: aññabhājane vā ākiranto tato tato omasati, tassa,
tika-vin04t:2070_1: Yo pana parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:2072_0: Dasame yassa bhattasāmikā māghātasamayādīsu byañjanaṃ paṭicchādetvā denti,
tika-vin04t:2074_0: Ekādasame ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya attano dhanenāti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2078_3: Mūlakhādanīyādibhede pana sabbakhajjake phalāphale ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2080_0: Cuddasame parimaṇḍalanti adīghaṃ. Idha pana khajjakaphalāphalehi saddhiṃ uttaribhaṅgepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2084_0: Sattarasame sakabaḷenāti ettha yattakena vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2084_2: Yo pana dhammaṃ kathento hariṭakādīni mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti,
tika-vin04t:2086_0: Aṭṭhārasame piṇḍukkhepakanti piṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā, idhāpi khajjakaphalāphalesu anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2090_0: Vīsatime avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā, idha phalāphalamattake anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2092_1: anāpattiyaṃ panettha “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento hatthaṃ niddhunātī”ti idaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2094_1: idhāpi “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento sitthaṃ chaḍḍayatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2098_0: Catuvīsatime capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā. Pañcavīsatimepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2100_1: Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2100_2: Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2100_6: oṭṭhamaṃsehi eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2102_0: Ekūnatiṃsatime na sāmisenāti etaṃ paṭikūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2102_1: tasmā saṅghikampi puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhopi sarāvakampi thālakampi na gahetabbameva,
tika-vin04t:2102_3: Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito na hoti,
tika-vin04t:2102_6: dhovāpessāmīti vā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2104_0: Tiṃsatime “uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍetī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2104_1: Tattha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā,
tika-vin04t:2104_2: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin04t:2104_3: Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin04t:2104_4: Paṭiggahe vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchantānaṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin04t:2107_0: Dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttesu paṭhame yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi.
tika-vin04t:2107_1: So taṃ chattaṃ yatthakatthaci sarīrāvayave ṭhapetvāpi yāva hatthena na muñcati,
tika-vin04t:2107_5: hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na hoti,
tika-vin04t:2109_0: Dutiye daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo,
tika-vin04t:2109_3: Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin04t:2111_0: Catutthe sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:2111_1: tasmā saddhiṃ vā sarena dhanuṃ gahetvā,
tika-vin04t:2111_2: suddhadhanuṃ vā suddhasaraṃ vā sajiyadhanuṃ vā nijjiyadhanuṃ vā gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2111_3: Sace panassa dhanu khandhepi paṭimukkaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2113_0: Pañcame pādukāruḷhassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantarikaṃ appavesetvā kevalaṃ akkantassa vā,
tika-vin04t:2113_3: Idha pana yvāyaṃ paṇhikabandhaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhānavasena “omukko”ti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:2115_0: Sattame sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito,
tika-vin04t:2115_2: ayutte vā vayhādike yāne visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi nisinno hoti,
tika-vin04t:2115_4: Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2115_5: Visuṃ nisinnesupi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2115_8: Pacchime pana uccatarepi nisinnena desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2117_0: Aṭṭhame sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmippadese
tika-vin04t:2117_1: vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2117_2: Sayanagatena pana sayanagatassa uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2117_3: Nipannena pana ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā,
tika-vin04t:2117_4: nisinnena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā,
tika-vin04t:2119_0: Navame hatthapallatthikādīsu yāya kāyaci nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2121_0: Dasame veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati,
tika-vin04t:2125_1: Āsaneti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
tika-vin04t:2127_0: Terasame ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnatappadese nisinnassa.
tika-vin04t:2129_0: Cuddasame na ṭhito nisinnassāti sace therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ āsane nisinno mahāthero pañhaṃ pucchati,
tika-vin04t:2129_2: Gāravena pana theraṃ “uṭṭhahitvā pucchā”ti vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin04t:2129_3: tasmā “passe ṭhitassa bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2131_0: Pannarasame sace purato gacchanto pañhaṃ pucchati,
tika-vin04t:2131_1: tassa taṃ akathetvā “pacchimassa bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2133_0: Soḷasame na uppathenāti ettha sace dvepi sakaṭamaggasmiṃ ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2135_0: Sattarasame “asañciccā”ti anāpattiyaṃ sace paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati,
tika-vin04t:2137_0: Aṭṭhārasame yampi jīvamānarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:2137_3: Khandhe nisīditvā pana appaharitaṭṭhāne pātetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2137_6: “appaharite kato haritaṃ ottharatī”ti idamettha anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2137_7: Tattha sacepi appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palalaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā kato pacchā haritaṃ ottharati,
tika-vin04t:2139_0: Ekūnavīsatime na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2139_2: Deve vassante samantato udakoghe jāte anudakaṭṭhānaṃ alabhantena udake kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2139_3: idhāpi “thale kato udakaṃ ottharatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2145_2: Uddesaṃ āgacchantīti āpattādhikaraṇasaṅkhātāsu ca avasesādhikaraṇattayapaccayāsu ca āpattīsu parisuddhabhāvaṃ pucchanatthaṃ uddisitabbataṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:2145_4: Adhikaraṇānanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2145_5: Samathāya vūpasamāyāti samanatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
tika-vin04t:2145_9: “adhammo”ti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
tika-vin04t:2145_11: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
tika-vin04t:2145_14: vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, nāma.
tika-vin04t:2145_15: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2146_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca,
tika-vin04t:2146_5: tattha saṅghena vā vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati,
tika-vin04t:2146_6: evaṃ sammamāne ca pana tasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā ayaṃ sammukhāvinayo nāma.
tika-vin04t:2146_7: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā,
tika-vin04t:2147_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti,
tika-vin04t:2147_2: tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitvā tena guḷhakavivaṭṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu
tika-vin04t:2147_3: tīsu salākaggāhesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā
tika-vin04t:2147_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:2148_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
tika-vin04t:2148_3: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi,
tika-vin04t:2148_8: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:2148_9: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2148_10: dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-vin04t:2148_11: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena gate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:2148_13: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2148_14: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti.
tika-vin04t:2148_15: Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2148_16: dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-vin04t:2149_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa
tika-vin04t:2149_4: sayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:2149_5: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2150_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
tika-vin04t:2150_3: nissaggiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
tika-vin04t:2150_4: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-vin04t:2150_5: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti,
tika-vin04t:2150_9: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati.
tika-vin04t:2151_7: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
tika-vin04t:2151_9: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷatthāya vāḷatthāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin04t:2151_10: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
tika-vin04t:2151_11: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā niddampi okkamantā honti,
tika-vin04t:2151_12: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihippaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin04t:2152_1: Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti,
tika-vin04t:2152_2: tena vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
tika-vin04t:2153_1: kaccittha parisuddhāti tesu sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:2153_2: natthi vo kiñci samathehi vūpasametabbanti pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:2154_4: Anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatīti addhamāse addhamāse uposathavasena uddisitabbataṃ āgacchati.
tika-vin04t:2154_8: Sikkhitabbanti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamantehi adhisīlasikkhā sampādetabbā.
tika-vin04t:2154_10: taṃ sabbaṃ purime purime sikkhāpade vuttattā ceva uttānatthattā cāti.
tika-vin04t:2162_0: Yaṃ nātho, tassa dāneso, sampatto vaṇṇanākkamo.
tika-vin04t:2165_0: Tattha suṇātu metiādīnaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:2165_2: ayyetiādivasena tasmiñca idha ca abhilāpamattameva liṅgabhedamattañca viseso.
tika-vin04t:2165_3: Yasmā ca bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:2165_4: tasmā bhikkhunīnaṃ “sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti avatvā yā pana
tika-vin04t:2165_5: bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2165_6: Tattha chandasoti methunarāgappaṭisaṃyuttena chandena ceva ruciyā ca.
tika-vin04t:2165_7: Chande pana asati balakkārena padhaṃsitāya anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2165_8: tasmā yā paripuṇṇūpasampadā bhikkhunī manussāmanussatiracchānajātīsu purisaubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2165_9: yassa kassaci sajīvassa vā nijjīvassa vā santhatassa vā asanthatassa vā akkhāyitassa vā yebhuyyena akkhāyitassa
tika-vin04t:2165_10: vā aṅgajātassa attano vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhesu tīsu yatthakatthaci santhate vā asanthate vā pakativātena
tika-vin04t:2165_11: asaṃphuṭṭhe allokāse antamaso tilaphalamattampi padesaṃ chandaso paveseti,
tika-vin04t:2165_12: parena vā pavesiyamānā pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu yaṃkiñci sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:2165_14: Sesamettha ito paresu ca sādhāraṇasikkhāpadesu vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2168_0: Asādhāraṇesu pana catunnaṃ tāva pārājikānaṃ paṭhame avassutāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena tintā,
tika-vin04t:2168_3: Purisapuggalassāti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjituṃ viññussa manussajātikassa purisasaṅkhātassa puggalassa.
tika-vin04t:2168_7: Āmasananti āmajjanaṃ phuṭṭhokāsaṃ anatikkamitvā tattheva saṅghaṭṭanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2168_12: Sādiyeyyāti yā bhikkhunī attano yathāparicchinne kāye purisassa etaṃ āmasanādiṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:2168_13: sayaṃ vā pana tena kāyena purisassa yaṃkiñci kāyappadesaṃ sādayamānā chupati,
tika-vin04t:2168_14: ayaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā nāma pārājikāti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-vin04t:2169_0: “Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthu”ntiādike tena vitthāravinicchaye yasmā sabbāneva asādhāraṇapaññattiyo honti,
tika-vin04t:2169_1: tasmā ito paṭṭhāya santiṃ anupaññattiṃ vatvā sādhāraṇapaññattīti vā asādhāraṇapaññattīti vā na vakkhāma,
tika-vin04t:2170_2: idaṃ tāva sikkhāpadaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ sundarīnandaṃ ārabbha kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2170_5: yathāparicchinnakāyappaṭibaddhena vā avasesakāyena vā tassa kāyaṃ āmasantiyā thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2170_6: yakkhapetapaṇḍakatiracchānagatamanussaviggahānaṃ ubhatoavassute yathāparicchinnena kāyena kāyaṃ āmasantiyāpi thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2170_15: Aṅgāni samuṭṭhānādīni ca bhikkhupātimokkhe kāyasaṃsagge vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
tika-vin04t:2173_6: Pubbevāhaṃ ayye aññāsinti idaṃ tassā vacanakāladassanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2173_7: saliṅge ṭhitāya pana pārājikabhāvaṃ ñatvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti dhure nikkhittamatteyeva ayaṃ vajjappaṭicchādikā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2174_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha nevaattanāpaṭicodanā nagaṇassa ārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2177_3: Satthusāsanenāti idhāpi codetvā sāretvā karaṇameva satthusāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:2177_6: tattha pariyāpannagaṇe vā ekapuggale vā tasmiṃ vā kamme ādaravirahitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2177_10: Akatasahāyanti ekakammādike saṃvāse saha ayanabhāvena samānasaṃvāsakā bhikkhū sahāyā nāma,
tika-vin04t:2177_11: yassa pana so saṃvāso tehi saddhiṃ natthi na tena te sahāyā katā honti,
tika-vin04t:2177_15: Tamanuvatteyyāti taṃ ukkhittakaṃ ukkhittakabhāveyeva ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ yā bhikkhunī yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti,
tika-vin04t:2177_17: Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saṅghabhedasikkhāpadādīsu vuttanayena visuṃ saṅghamajjhe ca vuccamānā taṃ vatthuṃ
tika-vin04t:2177_18: appaṭinissajjantī samanubhāsanakammapariyosāne ukkhittānuvattikā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2181_4: Purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vātiādīsu pana yaṃ purisapuggalena hatthe gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:2181_7: Hatthaggahaṇanti ettha ca yassa kassaci apārājikakkhettabhūtassa aṅgassa gahaṇaṃ hatthaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2181_8: yassa kassaci nivatthassa vā pārutassa vā gahaṇaṃ saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2181_9: Santiṭṭheyya vātiādīsu kāyasaṃsaggasaṅkhātassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse santiṭṭheyya vā,
tika-vin04t:2181_11: purisena vā “itthannāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchā”ti vuttā taṃ saṅketaṃ gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:2181_13: yena kenaci vā paṭicchannaṃ okāsaṃ paviseyya,
tika-vin04t:2181_14: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyaṃ upasaṃhareyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:2181_16: evaṃ ayampi bhikkhunī etassa kāyasaṃsaggasaṅkhātassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya etāni aṭṭha vatthūni
tika-vin04t:2181_17: paṭipāṭiyā vā uppaṭipāṭiyā vā pūretvā aṭṭhavatthukā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2182_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2182_7: Ekekasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ satakkhattumpi vītikkante tā āpattiyo desetvā muccati,
tika-vin04t:2182_9: “idāni nāpajjissāmī”ti hi dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desitā gaṇanūpikā,
tika-vin04t:2182_12: Tasmā yā ekaṃ āpannā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desetvā puna kilesavasena āpajjati,
tika-vin04t:2182_14: evaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ paripūrentīpi pārājikā na hoti.
tika-vin04t:2182_15: Yā pana āpajjitvā “punapi aññaṃ vatthuṃ āpajjissāmī”ti saussāhāva deseti,
tika-vin04t:2182_24: aṭṭhamassa vatthussa pūraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2184_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā cattāro,
tika-vin04t:2184_1: ime cattāroti evaṃ pātimokkhuddesamaggena aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā uddiṭṭhāti evamettha attho veditabbo,
tika-vin04t:2190_0: Saṅghādisesesu paṭhame ussayavādikāti mānussayavasena kodhussayavasena aḍḍakaraṇatthāya vinicchayamahāmattānaṃ santike vivadamānā.
tika-vin04t:2190_1: Gahapatinā vātiādīhi ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike avasesā gahaṭṭhapabbajitā saṅgahitā.
tika-vin04t:2190_2: Ayaṃ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikanti ādimhi paṭhamaṃ āpatti etassāti paṭhamāpattiko,
tika-vin04t:2191_2: “aḍḍaṃ karissāmī”ti yaṃkiñci dutiyikaṃ vā sakkhiṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā pariyesantiyā pariyesane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2191_3: yattha ṭhitāya “aḍḍaṃ kātuṃ gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:2191_4: tato paṭṭhāya gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2191_5: yatthakatthaci antamaso bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgatepi vohārike disvā attano kathaṃ ārocentiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2191_6: Itarena attano kathāya ārocitāya bhikkhuniyā thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2191_7: paṭhamaṃ itarena pacchā bhikkhuniyā ārocanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2191_8: Sace pana bhikkhunī taṃ vadati “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti,
tika-vin04t:2191_9: so attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu, tassā vā,
tika-vin04t:2191_12: tena evaṃ vuttāya bhikkhuniyā ārocanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2191_15: Yathā vā tathā vā hi ārociyamāne paṭhamārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2191_17: Ubhinnaṃ pana kathaṃ sutvā vohārikehi vinicchaye kate aḍḍapariyosānaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2191_18: tasmiṃ aḍḍapariyosāne bhikkhuniyā jayepi parājayepi saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:2192_0: Yā pana paccatthikamanussehi dūtaṃ vā pahiṇitvā,
tika-vin04t:2192_3: yā vā upassaye aññehi kataṃ anācāraṃ anodissa ācikkhantī rakkhaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2192_4: yāya ca kiñci avuttā vohārikā aññato sutvā sayameva aḍḍaṃ pariyosāpenti, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2195_0: Dutiye yāya pañcamāsagghanakato paṭṭhāya yaṃkiñci parasantakaṃ avaharitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2195_3: Vajjhaṃ viditanti tena kammena “vadhārahā aya”nti evaṃ viditaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2195_8: Yattha yattha hi rājāno gaṇādīnaṃ gāmanigame niyyātenti “tumheva ettha anusāsathā”ti,
tika-vin04t:2195_11: Ettha ca rājānaṃ vā gaṇādike vā apaloketvāpi bhikkhunisaṅgho apaloketabbova.
tika-vin04t:2195_12: Aññatra kappāti titthiyesu vā aññabhikkhunīsu vā pabbajitapubbā kappā nāma,
tika-vin04t:2195_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ upasampādentiyā gaṇaācarinī pattacīvarapariyesanesu sīmāsammutiyā ñattiyā ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2196_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha coriṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2196_2: tathā acoriyā corisaññāya ceva vematikāya ca.
tika-vin04t:2199_0: Tatiye gāmantarantiādīsu sakagāmato tāva nikkhamantiyā anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2199_1: nikkhamitvā pana aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2199_2: ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkante thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2199_4: tato nikkhamitvā puna sakagāmaṃ pavisantiyāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2199_5: Sace pana khaṇḍapākārena vā vaticchiddena vā bhikkhunivihārabhūmiṃyeva sakkā hoti pavisituṃ,
tika-vin04t:2199_6: evaṃ pavisamānāya kappiyabhūmiyā paviṭṭhā nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2199_8: Bahigāme ṭhatvā yaṃkiñci sakagāmaṃ vā paragāmaṃ vā akappiyabhūmiṃ padasā pavisantiyā āpattīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-vin04t:2200_0: Nadipāragamane vuttalakkhaṇāya nadiyā dutiyikaṃ vinā paratīraṃ gacchantiyā vā antarānadiyaṃ dutiyikāya
tika-vin04t:2200_1: saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā puna orimatīrameva paccuttarantiyā vā paṭhamapādaṃ uddharitvā tīre ṭhapitakkhaṇe thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2200_4: nahānādikāraṇena ca otiṇṇāya orimatīraṃ padasāpi paccuttarituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2201_0: Rattivippavāse “purearuṇeyeva dutiyikāya hatthapāsaṃ okkamissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ vinā ekagabbhepi dutiyikāya
tika-vin04t:2202_0: Ekā vā gaṇamhāti ettha pana ekā bhikkhunīpi gaṇoyeva.
tika-vin04t:2202_2: dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijaheyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2202_3: Tasmā indakhīlātikkamato paṭṭhāya bahigāme rukkhathambhasāṇipākārādiantaritabhāvenāpi dutiyikāya dassanūpacāre vijahite sacepi savanūpacāro atthi,
tika-vin04t:2202_6: tattha maggamūḷhasaddena viya dhammassavanārocanasaddena viya ca ‘ayye’ti saddāyantiyā saddassavanātikkame āpattiyeva.
tika-vin04t:2202_7: Sace pana maggaṃ gacchantī ohīyitvā “idāni pāpuṇissāmī”ti saussāhā anubandhati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2203_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha gāmantaragamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2203_2: pure aruṇe sakagāmato nikkhamitvā aruṇuggamanakāle gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāraṃ okkamanantiyā pana catassopi āpattiyo ekakkhaṇeyeva honti.
tika-vin04t:2208_2: Dutiyikāya pana pakkantāya vā vibbhantāya vā kālaṅkatāya vā pakkhasaṅkantāya vā āpadāsu vā gāmantaragamanādīni karontiyā ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2211_1: Anaññāya gaṇassa chandanti tasseva kārakasaṅghassa chandaṃ ajānitvā.
tika-vin04t:2212_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ osāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2212_9: aññatra anuññātakāraṇā osāraṇanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2215_2: Khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vāti ettha paṭiggahaṇe thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2216_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sundarīnandaṃ ārabbha avassutāya avassutassa hatthato āmisappaṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2219_3: sā evaṃ uyyojanena ca tena vacanena itarissā paṭiggahaṇena ca dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:2219_4: ajjhohāragaṇanāya thullaccayāni ca āpajjitvā bhojanapariyosāne saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:2220_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2220_2: purisassa vā yakkhādīnaṃ vā hatthato udakadantaponappaṭiggahaṇuyyojane ca tesaṃ paribhoge ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2220_3: esa nayo yakkhādīnaṃ hatthato avasesaggahaṇatthaṃ uyyojane,
tika-vin04t:2220_14: tena vacanena gahetvā itarissā bhojanapariyosānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2226_0: Dasame kiṃnumāva samaṇiyoti kiṃnu imā eva samaṇiyo.
tika-vin04t:2226_3: avasesavinicchayo ca tattheva saṅghabhedasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo,
tika-vin04t:2226_4: idaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷibhikkhuniṃ ārabbha “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmī”tiādivacanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2226_5: evaṃ vacanameva cettha catūsu aṅgesu paṭhamaṃ aṅganti ayaṃ viseso,
tika-vin04t:2229_2: Idampi sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”tiādivacanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2232_0: Dvādasame saṃsaṭṭhāti pabbajitānaṃ ananulomena gihīnaṃ koṭṭanapacanasāsanaharaṇādinā kāyikavācasikena missībhūtā.
tika-vin04t:2232_4: Bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikāti aññamaññissā kamme kariyamāne paṭikkosanena vihesikā.
tika-vin04t:2233_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha saṃsaṭṭhavihāravatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2236_0: Terasame evaṃ vadeyyāti tā samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeyya.
tika-vin04t:2236_6: Paribhavenāti “kiṃ imā karissantī”ti evaṃ paribhavitvā jānanena.
tika-vin04t:2236_12: sabbattha uññāya ca paribhavena cāti evaṃ samuccayattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:2237_2: mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2240_2: bhedāya pana parakkamati ceva anuvattati ca.
tika-vin04t:2240_3: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā satta,
tika-vin04t:2240_5: Ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbanti bhikkhuniyā hi āpattiṃ chādentiyāpi parivāso nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:2240_7: tasmā chādetvāpi achādetvāpi ekaṃ pakkhamānattameva caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2240_8: Taṃ bhikkhunīhi attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2240_9: sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi khaṇḍasīmāya vā sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggaṃ gaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2240_12: sace dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā ekavatthukā vā nānāvatthukā vā,
tika-vin04t:2240_13: tāsaṃ tāsaṃ vasena bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttavatthugottanāmaāpattibhedesu yaṃ yaṃ icchati,
tika-vin04t:2241_1: tāya āpannāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:2241_2: pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassavacanīyo “ahaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2241_3: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ ussayavādaṃ, sāhaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2241_4: saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācāmī”ti,
tika-vin04t:2241_5: evaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin04t:2242_1: ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ ussayavādaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2242_2: sā saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2242_4: saṅgho itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin04t:2243_7: Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2244_1: mānattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti samādiyitvā saṅghassa ārocetvā nikkhittavattena tāva vasitukāmāya tattheva saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin04t:2244_2: vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike “vattaṃ nikkhipāmi,
tika-vin04t:2244_4: Aññissā pana āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2244_6: tato purearuṇeyeva catūhi bhikkhunīhi taṃ bhikkhuniṃ gahetvā gāmūpacārato ca bhikkhūnaṃ vihārūpacārato
tika-vin04t:2244_7: ca dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggā okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchanne okāse nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2244_10: Atha tāya bhikkhuniyā vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ –
tika-vin04t:2245_2: sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin04t:2245_3: tassā me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin04t:2246_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ “ahaṃ, ayyā,
tika-vin04t:2246_6: dutiyikaṃ ṭhapetvā bhikkhunīsu vā pakkantāsupi ubhatosaṅghe mānattaṃ ciṇṇameva hoti.
tika-vin04t:2246_8: tāva yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2246_10: Uṭṭhite aruṇe vattaṃ nikkhipitvā upassayaṃ gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2247_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana āgantukesu asati catunnaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca devasikaṃ ārocetvā,
tika-vin04t:2247_1: āgantukesu sati sabbesampi āgantukānaṃ ārocentiyā pañcadasa divasāni pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-vin04t:2247_3: ciṇṇamānattāya bhikkhuniyāti yadā evaṃ ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī hoti,
tika-vin04t:2247_4: athassā yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅghoti vuttanayeneva abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2253_0: Nissaggiyesu ādivaggassa tāva paṭhame pattasannicayaṃ kareyyāti pattasannidhiṃ kareyya,
tika-vin04t:2253_1: ekāhaṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā vā avikappetvā vā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pattaṃ ṭhapeyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2254_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha pattasannicayavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2254_3: idha ekāhātikkameti ettakameva tassa ca imassa ca nānākaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2257_2: yaṃ vā pana kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2257_3: Ādissa dinnaṃ nāma “sampattā bhājentū”ti vatvā vā,
tika-vin04t:2257_7: Iccetaṃ akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpentiyā payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2258_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2258_2: kālacīvare akālacīvarasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2261_1: Acchindeyyāti sayaṃ acchindantiyā bandhitvā ṭhapitesu bahūsupi ekāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2261_3: Acchindāpane pana ekāya āṇattiyā bahūsu acchinnesupi ekāvāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2262_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2262_10: sakasaññāya acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2265_2: Aññaṃ viññāpeyyāti yaṃ pubbe “kinte, ayye, aphāsu,
tika-vin04t:2265_4: taṃ paṭikkhipitvā tañceva aññañca gahetukāmā tato aññaṃ viññāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:2266_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2266_5: aññenapi atthe sati tena saddhiṃ aññañca,
tika-vin04t:2266_8: imaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā suddhaṃ aññameva ca viññāpentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2269_0: Pañcame aññaṃ cetāpetvāti attano kappiyabhaṇḍena “idaṃ nāma āharā”ti aññaṃ parivattāpetvā.
tika-vin04t:2269_1: Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti “evaṃ me idaṃ datvā aññampi āharissatī”ti maññamānā “na me iminā attho,
tika-vin04t:2269_2: idaṃ nāma me āharā”ti tato aññaṃ cetāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:2269_4: paṭilābhena tena vā aññena vā mūlena āhaṭaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2272_4: Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti “idaṃ nāma paribhuñjeyyāthā”ti yaṃ uddisitvā niyametvā yo parikkhāro dinno,
tika-vin04t:2273_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha tādisena parikkhārena aññaṃ cetāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2273_6: amhākañca iminā nāma attho”ti sāmike apaloketvā upanentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2276_0: Sattame saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakenāpi. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2279_0: Aṭṭhame mahājanikenāti gaṇassa pariccattena, idamettha chaṭṭhato nānākaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2282_0: Navame saññācikenāti idaṃ aṭṭhamato atirittaṃ, sesaṃ dvīsupi chaṭṭhasikkhāpadasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2286_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha tādisena parikkhārena aññaṃ cetāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2290_3: Cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca ñātakappavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva guṇe parituṭṭhena “vadethāyye,
tika-vin04t:2290_5: Tato ce uttarīti tatuttari viññāpentiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2291_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2296_1: tatiyavagge dasāti imāni aṭṭhārasa sikkhāpadāni bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
tika-vin04t:2298_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā aṭṭhārasa,
tika-vin04t:2304_0: Pācittiyesu lasuṇavaggassa tāva paṭhame lasuṇanti magadharaṭṭhe jātaṃ āmakaṃ bhaṇḍikalasuṇameva,
tika-vin04t:2305_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha lasuṇaṃ harāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2308_2: Saṃharāpeyyāti ettha khurasaṇḍāsakattariādīsu yena kenaci saṃharāpentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2309_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2312_0: Tatiye talaghātaketi antamaso uppalakesarenāpi muttakaraṇassa talaghātane muttakaraṇamhi pahāradāne pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:2313_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ dve bhikkhuniyo ārabbha talaghātakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2313_5: Ābādhapaccayā gaṇḍaṃ vā vaṇaṃ vā paharantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2317_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha jatumaṭṭhakasādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2320_2: Dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbanti dvīsu aṅgulīsu ekekaṃ katvā dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2320_3: Taṃ atikkāmentiyāti sace dhovanakāle rāgavasena vitthārato tatiyāya aṅguliyā aggapabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2320_4: gambhīrato ekissāva aṅguliyā tatiyapabbaṃ paveseti pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2321_0: Sakkesu aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2324_0: Chaṭṭhe bhuñjantassāti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhuñjato.
tika-vin04t:2324_4: Upatiṭṭheyyāti yā etesu dvīsu aññataraṃ gahetvā hatthapāse tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:2325_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha bhuñjantassa evaṃ tiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2325_2: hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā khādanīyaṃ khādantassa upatiṭṭhantiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2325_10: pānīyassa vā vidhūpanassa vā gahaṇanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2328_2: Ettha ca viññatti ceva bhojanañca pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2328_3: tasmā sayaṃ viññatvā aññāya bhajjanādīni kārāpetvā vā,
tika-vin04t:2328_4: aññāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā paṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dantehi saṃkhādanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2329_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2329_1: sayaṃ vā aññāya vā aviññattiyā laddhaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2329_2: aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ pana sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvāpi kāretvāpi bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2329_7: Sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ aññatarassa viññāpanaṃ vā viññāpāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2329_9: bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2332_3: Tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vāti yassakassaci kuṭṭassa vā pākārassa vā parato.
tika-vin04t:2332_4: Chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vāti sabbānipetāni ekato chaḍḍentiyā ekappayoge ekāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2333_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2333_9: chaḍḍanaṃ vā chaḍḍāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2336_0: Navame hariteti khette vā nāḷikerādiārāme vā yatthakatthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne.
tika-vin04t:2336_1: Tāni vatthūni chaḍḍentiyā vā chaḍḍāpentiyā vā purimanayeneva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2336_2: tādise ṭhāne nisīditvā antamaso udakaṃ pivitvā matthakacchinnaṃ nāḷikerampi chaḍḍentiyā āpattiyeva.
tika-vin04t:2337_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha uccārādīni harite chaḍḍanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2337_4: bhikkhuniyāpi nikkhittabīje khette yāva aṅkuro na uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin04t:2340_3: Dassanāyāti etesu yaṃkiñci dassanāya gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2340_4: yattha ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vā,
tika-vin04t:2340_6: taṃ taṃ disaṃ olokentiyā payoge payoge āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2341_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha naccādīni dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2341_3: “cetiyassa upahāraṃ dethā”ti īdisena pariyāyena vā bhaṇantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2341_4: “cetiyassa upahāraṃ karomā”ti vā vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchantiyā ca pācittiyamevāti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2341_6: “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma sundara”nti īdisaṃ pariyāyaṃ bhaṇantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2341_7: ārāme ṭhatvā passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:2341_8: tathā attano ṭhitokāsaṃ āgantvā payojitaṃ paṭipathaṃ gacchantiyā sammukhībhūtaṃ salākabhattādike sati karaṇīye gantvā,
tika-vin04t:2341_9: āpadāsu vā samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvāpi passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:2341_13: dassanaṃ vā savanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2346_2: Purisenāti santiṭṭhituṃ sallapituñca viññunā manussapurisena saddhiṃ.
tika-vin04t:2346_4: Sallapeyyāti tattha ṭhatvā gehasitakathaṃ kathentiyāpi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:2347_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ santiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2347_4: yaṃkiñci viññuṃ dutiyaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2347_9: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ vā sallapanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2350_0: Dutiye paṭicchanne okāseti kuṭṭādīsu yena kenaci paṭicchanne, idamevettha nānattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2353_0: Tatiye ajjhokāseti nānaṃ, sesaṃ ubhayatthāpi paṭhamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2356_3: Nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyyāti kaṇṇamūle kiñci jappeyya.
tika-vin04t:2356_4: Uyyojeyyāti anācāraṃ caritukāmatāya “gaccha tva”nti dutiyikaṃ uyyojeyya.
tika-vin04t:2356_5: Pācittiyanti purimanayeneva tāva santiṭṭhanādīsu tīṇi pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:2356_6: uyyojentiyā pana uyyojane ca hatthapāsavijahane ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2357_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ santiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2357_3: sati karaṇīye dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ uyyojetī”ti ettakaṃ adhikanti.
tika-vin04t:2360_0: Pañcame purebhattanti aruṇuggamanaṃ upādāya yāva majjhanhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2360_2: Sāmike anāpucchāti tasmiṃ kule yaṃkiñci viññuṃ manussaṃ anāpucchā.
tika-vin04t:2360_3: Pakkameyyāti ettha channassa anto nisīditvā anovassakaṃ ajjhokāse upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2361_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha anāpucchā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2361_3: tathā āpucchite anāpucchitasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca.
tika-vin04t:2364_0: Chaṭṭhe pacchābhattanti majjhanhike vītivatte yāva sūriyassa atthaṅgamā.
tika-vin04t:2364_1: Abhinisīdeyya vāti ādimhi nisīditvā gacchantiyā ekā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2365_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āsane abhinisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2368_0: Sattame vikāleti atthaṅgate sūriye. Seyyanti antamaso paṇṇasanthārampi, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:2369_0: Idaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchitvā seyyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2372_1: tato aññathā gahitena ca upadhāritena ca.
tika-vin04t:2372_2: Paranti “ahaṃ kirayye ayyaṃ na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahāmī”tiādinā nayena upasampannaṃ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2373_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ paraṃ ujjhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2376_2: niraye upapajjatū”tievamādīni vadamānā nirayena abhisapati nāma,
tika-vin04t:2377_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha evaṃ abhisapanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2377_3: tiracchānayoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussadobhaggena vā abhisapane dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2380_0: Dasame vadhitvāti hatthādīhi paharitvā, ubhayaṃ karontiyāva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2381_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha attānaṃ vadhitvā rodanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2381_1: kevalaṃ vadhantiyā vā rodantiyā vā dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2381_2: Ñātirogabhogabyasanehi phuṭṭhāya kevalaṃ rodantiyā eva na vadhantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2386_0: Naggavaggassa paṭhame naggāti anivatthā vā apārutā vā.
tika-vin04t:2387_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evaṃ nahānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2387_2: “mahagghaṃ idaṃ disvā corāpi hareyyu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu vā nahāyantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2390_0: Dutiye sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2390_1: sesamettha sabbaṃ ratanavagge nisīdanasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2393_2: Aññatra catūhapañcāhāti visibbitadivasato pañca divase atikkāmetvā “neva sibbissāmi,
tika-vin04t:2393_3: na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2394_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraṃ visibbetvā na sibbanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2394_6: karontī vā pañcāhaṃ atikkāmeti, tassā ca,
tika-vin04t:2397_3: paribhogavasena vā otāpanavasena vā saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena ‘saṅghāṭī’ti laddhanāmaṃ ticīvaraṃ,
tika-vin04t:2397_5: saṃkaccikāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ parivattananti attho.
tika-vin04t:2397_6: Atikkāmeyya pācittiyanti chaṭṭhe aruṇuggamane ekasmiṃ cīvare vuttanayena aparivattite ekā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2398_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2398_4: pañcamaṃ divasaṃ pañca cīvarāni nivāsentiyā vā pārupantiyā vā otāpentiyā vā, gilānāya,
tika-vin04t:2398_5: “idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise corabhaye na sakkā dhāretu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2401_1: aññissā santakaṃ anāpucchā gahitaṃ puna paṭidātabbaṃ pañcannaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaranti attho.
tika-vin04t:2401_2: Dhāreyyāti sace taṃ nivāseti vā pārupati vā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2402_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ ādāya anāpucchā pārupanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2402_6: “idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise corabhaye na sakkā dhāretu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu vā dhāreti, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2405_2: Antarāyaṃ kareyyāti yathā te dātukāmā na denti,
tika-vin04t:2405_4: Pācittiyanti sace tassā vacanena te na denti,
tika-vin04t:2406_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha gaṇassa cīvaralābhantarāyakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2406_2: sambahulānaṃ pana ekabhikkhuniyā vā cīvaralābhepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2406_7: vinā ānisaṃsadassanena antarāyakaraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2409_0: Sattame dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅganti samaggena saṅghena sannipatitvā karīyamānaṃ cīvaravibhaṅga.
tika-vin04t:2410_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2410_2: adhammike dhammikasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2410_8: vinā ānisaṃsena paṭibāhananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2413_1: evarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike mātāpitaro ca yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā pariccajitvā dentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2414_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha agārikassa samaṇacīvaradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2414_6: ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca mātāpitaro ca aññesaṃ dānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2417_1: “sace sakkoma dassāmā”ti ettakamattaṃ sutvā uppāditāya āsāyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2417_2: Cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeyyāti vassaṃvuṭṭhabhikkhunīhi kālacīvare bhājiyamāne “āgameyyātha, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2417_3: atthi saṅghassa cīvarapaccāsā”ti vatvā taṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ cīvarakālaṃ atikkāmeyya,
tika-vin04t:2418_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2418_2: adubbalacīvare dubbalacīvarasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2418_7: tasmiṃ āgate addhā dassantī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2418_11: vinā ānisaṃsena nivāraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2421_0: Dasame dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāranti sabbāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmena upāsakena yattako atthāramūliko ānisaṃso,
tika-vin04t:2421_1: tato adhikaṃ vā samakaṃ vā datvā yācitena samaggena bhikkhunisaṅghena yaṃ kathinaṃ ñattidutiyakammena antarā uddharīyati,
tika-vin04t:2422_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2427_1: Tāsu pana ekāya vā nipannāya aparā nipajjatu,
tika-vin04t:2428_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha dvinnaṃ ekamañce tuvaṭṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2428_1: sace pana ekāya nipannāya ekā nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:2431_0: Dutiye ekaṃ attharaṇañceva pāvuraṇañca etāsanti ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā,
tika-vin04t:2431_1: saṃhārimānaṃ pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādīnaṃ ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tuvaṭṭentīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2431_2: Pācittiyanti taṃyeva attharitvā taṃ pārupitvā nipajjantīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2432_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evaṃ tuvaṭṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2432_2: attharaṇe vā pāvuraṇe vā ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2435_0: Tatiye aphāsunti “iminā imissā aphāsu bhavissatī”ti anāpucchā purato caṅkamanaṭṭhānanissajjādayo vā uddisauddisāpanaparipucchanasajjhāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2436_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha sañcicca aphāsukaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2439_2: Neva upaṭṭhaheyyāti tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ vā akarontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2439_3: parehi vā akārentiyā dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2440_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ anupaṭṭhānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2440_2: dasasu aññatarantarāye sati pariyesitvā alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2443_0: Pañcame upassayaṃ datvāti sakavāṭabaddhaṃ attano puggalikavihāraṃ datvā.
tika-vin04t:2443_1: Nikkaḍḍheyyāti bahūnipi dvārāni ekappayogena nikkaḍḍhentiyā ekā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2444_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha etādise vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2444_4: sakavāṭabaddhato vā akavāṭabaddhato vā ubhinnampi parikkhāranikkaḍḍhane dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin04t:2451_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vuttanayeneva desacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2457_1: pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā tassa vassassa antoyeva.
tika-vin04t:2457_2: Idha sattāhakaraṇīyena vā kenaci ubbaḷhāya vā āpadāsu vā gacchantiyā ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2460_2: Chappañcayojanānīti ettha pavāretvā pañca yojanāni gantumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2460_4: Sace pana tīṇi gantvā teneva maggena paccāgacchati,
tika-vin04t:2460_7: “Vuttappamāṇaṃ addhānaṃ na gacchissāmī”ti dhure nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2461_0: Rājagahe sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vassaṃ vasitvā cārikaṃ apakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2461_2: pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2466_5: Dassanāyāti “etesu yaṃkiñci passissāmī”ti gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2466_7: tattha padaṃ anuddharitvā pañcāpi passantiyā ekāva āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2466_8: Sace pana taṃ taṃ viloketvā passati,
tika-vin04t:2467_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2470_1: Pallaṅko nāma saṃhārimena vāḷena katoti vutto.
tika-vin04t:2470_2: Paribhuñjeyyāti ettha pana nisīdananipajjanappayogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2471_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āsandipallaṅkaparibhogavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2471_5: nisīdanaṃ nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2474_1: Kanteyyāti ettha yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2475_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha suttaṃ kantanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2475_1: kantanato pubbe kappāsavicinanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbappayogesu hatthavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2478_1: Sacepi hi mātāpitaro attano kiñci kammaṃ akārāpetvā tesaṃ yāgupacanādīni karonti,
tika-vin04t:2478_2: pubbappayogesu payogagaṇanāya dukkaṭāni āpajjitvā yāguādīsu bhājanagaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:2479_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha gihīnaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2479_1: manussehi saṅghassa yāgupāne vā bhatte vā cetiyapūjāya vā karīyamānāya tesaṃ sahāyabhāvena yāgupacanādīni,
tika-vin04t:2482_1: Pācittiyanti idha cīvarasibbane viya dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2483_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha adhikaraṇaṃ navūpasamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2486_0: Chaṭṭhe sahatthāti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā ṭhapetvā pañcasahadhammike avasesānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2486_1: aññatra udakadantaponā yaṃkiñci ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ dadantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2487_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha agārikassa khādanīyabhojanīyadānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2487_7: ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike aññassa sahatthā dānanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2490_1: Anissajjitvāti catutthe divase dhovitvā aññissā antamaso sāmaṇeriyāpi utuniyā adatvā.
tika-vin04t:2491_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2494_3: Cārikaṃ pakkameyya pācittiyanti ettha sakagāmato aññaṃ gāmaṃ ekarattivāsatthāyapi pakkamantiyā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2495_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2498_2: Pariyāpuṇeyyāti ettha yassa kassaci santike taṃ padādivasena pariyāpuṇantiyā padagaṇanāya ceva akkharagaṇanāya ca pācittiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2501_1: Ubhayampi sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā ceva sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ca ārabbha tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanavācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Lekhe,
tika-vin04t:2506_0: Ārāmavaggassa paṭhame sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmanti yattha bhikkhū rukkhamūlepi vasanti,
tika-vin04t:2507_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2507_1: “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā”ti ca “jānaṃ sabhikkhuka”nti ca imānettha dve anupaññattiyo,
tika-vin04t:2507_3: abhikkhuke sabhikkhukasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2510_0: Dutiye akkoseyyāti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena sammukhā vā parammukhā vā akkoseyya.
tika-vin04t:2511_0: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2514_3: netā jānanti kammaṃ vā kammadosaṃ vā kammasampattiṃ vā kammavipattiṃ vā”ti evaṃ yattha katthaci paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2515_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha gaṇaṃ paribhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2515_1: sambahulā vā ekaṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā paribhāsantiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2518_2: Pācittiyanti tassā purebhattaṃ ṭhapetvā yāguñceva sesāni ca tīṇi kālikāni aññaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhantiyā gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2519_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2519_1: tīṇi kālikāni āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhantiyāpi ajjhoharantiyāpi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2519_2: Yā pana nimantitā appavāritā yāguṃ pivati,
tika-vin04t:2519_4: tīṇi kālikāni sati paccaye paribhuñjati, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2519_6: Nimantitā vā pavāritā vā taṃ ubhayaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2519_10: nimantitāya anāpucchā bhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato siyā kiriyākiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2519_11: pavāritāya kappiyaṃ kāretvāpi akāretvāpi paribhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato siyā kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2522_4: Pācittiyanti tassā “yaṃ kulaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paccaye dātukāmaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2522_5: kathaṃ nāma tattha bhikkhuniyo na gaccheyyu”nti bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santike kulassa,
tika-vin04t:2522_6: “kathaṃ nāma ime tāsaṃ kiñci na dajjeyyu”nti kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2523_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kulamaccharāyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2523_4: kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santike kulassa avaṇṇabhaṇananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2526_0: Chaṭṭhe sace bhikkhunupassayato addhayojanabbhantare ovādadāyakā bhikkhū na vasanti,
tika-vin04t:2526_1: maggo vā akhemo hoti na sakkā anantarāyena gantuṃ,
tika-vin04t:2527_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2527_1: yattha pana vassūpagatā bhikkhū pakkantā vā honti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā tattha vasantiyā, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2530_0: Sattame vassaṃvuṭṭhāti purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā.
tika-vin04t:2530_3: bhikkhunīhi cātuddaseyeva sannipatitvā “suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:2530_10: samānavassikaṃ pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ dvevācikādiñattiṃ vā ṭhapetvā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti ce ṭhapitā, “saṅghaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2530_11: pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2530_18: paṭikarissāmī”ti evaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ vā vatvā paṭipāṭiyā pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2530_22: Evaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghe pavāretvā tattheva ekā bhikkhunī bhikkhunikkhandhake vuttena ñattidutiyakammena
tika-vin04t:2530_24: Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā pannarase bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin04t:2530_25: karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāreti diṭṭhena vā
tika-vin04t:2531_1: catūhi vā tīhi vā gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin04t:2532_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2532_4: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2532_7: passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2533_2: ayye pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2533_6: ayyaṃ pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2533_8: passanto paṭikarissatī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2534_1: ayye pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2534_5: ayyaṃ pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2534_8: ayye pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā…pe…
tika-vin04t:2534_12: ayyaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā…pe…
tika-vin04t:2534_15: passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2534_16: Sabbāheva hi iminā nayena ubhatosaṅghe pavāritā hoti,
tika-vin04t:2534_17: yā pana vassaṃvuṭṭhā “ubhatosaṅghe evaṃ na pavāressāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:2535_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vassaṃ vasitvā na pavāraṇāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2538_2: Pācittiyanti “etesaṃ atthāya na gacchāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2539_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha ovādāya agamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2542_3: Taṃ atikkāmentiyāti ettha bhikkhunīhi terase vā cātuddase vā ārāmaṃ gantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso pannaraso”ti pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2542_5: Yā bhikkhunī vuttappakāre kāle tadubhayaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin04t:2542_8: ovādampi na yācissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2543_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha uposathaovādānaṃ apucchanaayācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2546_0: Dasame pasākheti nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ uparipadese.
tika-vin04t:2546_1: Tato hi yasmā rukkhassa sākhā viya ubho ūrū pabhijjitvā gatā,
tika-vin04t:2546_6: Bhedāpeyya vātiādīsu sace “bhinda phālehī”ti sabbāni āṇāpeti,
tika-vin04t:2546_12: ekavācāya cha dukkaṭāni cha ca pācittiyāni.
tika-vin04t:2546_13: Sace pana bhedanādīsu ekaṃyeva “idaṃ nāma karohī”ti āṇāpeti,
tika-vin04t:2547_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena bhedāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2547_1: apaloketvā vā viññuṃ vā yaṃkañci dutiyikaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2547_6: purisena bhedādīnaṃ kārāpananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2552_0: Gabbhinivaggassa paṭhame “gabbhinī”ti jānitvā upajjhāyāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā gaṇapariyesanādīsu ca ñattikammavācādvaye ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2553_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2553_1: gabbhiniyā vematikāya agabbhiniyā gabbhinisaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2559_0: Tatiye dve vassānīti pavāraṇāvasena dve saṃvaccharāni.
tika-vin04t:2559_1: Chasu dhammesūti pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu vikālabhojanāveramaṇipariyosānesu chasu sikkhāpadesu.
tika-vin04t:2559_2: Asikkhitasikkhanti padabhājane vuttanayeneva adinnasikkhaṃ vā kupitasikkhaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:2559_3: Sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyyāti tesu chasu dhammesu sikkhanato,
tika-vin04t:2559_4: te vā sikkhāsaṅkhāte dhamme mānanato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ anupasampannaṃ upasampādeyya.
tika-vin04t:2560_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evarūpaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2560_3: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2563_0: Catutthe saṅghena asammatanti yassā saṅghena antamaso upasampadāmāḷakepi padabhājane vuttā upasampadāsammuti na dinnā hoti,
tika-vin04t:2569_0: Chaṭṭhe sabbaṃ tatiye vuttanayena. Sattamepi sabbaṃ catutthe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2572_3: uddesādīni dehī”ti evaṃ na aññāya anuggaṇhāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:2573_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evarūpe vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2576_0: Navame vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattininti vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ yāya upasampāditā,
tika-vin04t:2576_2: Nānubandheyyāti cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakenāti evaṃ tena tena karaṇīyena na upaṭṭhaheyya.
tika-vin04t:2577_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha nānubandhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2577_1: Bālaṃ pana alajjiniṃ vā ananubandhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2580_0: Dasame neva vūpakāseyyāti na gahetvā gaccheyya.
tika-vin04t:2581_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha sahajīviniyā avūpakāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2586_1: Yā pana tā sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānā,
tika-vin04t:2586_7: Gihigatāya dasavassakāle sikkhāsammutiṃ datvā dvādasavassakāle upasampadā kātabbā,
tika-vin04t:2586_10: Aṭṭhārasavassakālato paṭṭhāya ca panāyaṃ “gihigatā”tipi “kumāribhūtā”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2589_1: Pācittiyanti upajjhāyā hutvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva dukkaṭāni antarā,
tika-vin04t:2592_0: Pañcame saṅghena asammatāti yassā saṅghena padabhājane vuttā vuṭṭhāpanasammuti na dinnā.
tika-vin04t:2595_0: Chaṭṭhe alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenāti vuccamānāti vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā yācitāya saṅghena upaparikkhipitvā “yasmā bālā abyattā ca alajjinī ca hoti,
tika-vin04t:2595_1: tasmā alaṃ tāva tuyhaṃ upasampāditenā”ti evaṃ nivārīyamānā.
tika-vin04t:2595_2: Pacchā khīyanadhammanti pacchā aññāsaṃ byattānaṃ lajjinīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ diyyamānaṃ disvā “ahameva
tika-vin04t:2595_3: nūna bālā”tiādīni bhaṇamānā yattha katthaci khīyeyya.
tika-vin04t:2596_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha evaṃ khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2599_0: Sattame sā pacchāti sikkhamānāya upasampadāya yāciyamānāya sā bhikkhunī evaṃ vatvā laddhe cīvare pacchā asati antarāye “neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi,
tika-vin04t:2599_1: na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipeyya,
tika-vin04t:2600_0: Ubhayampi sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha etesu vatthūsu paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2603_0: Navame sokāvāsanti saṅketaṃ katvā āgacchamānā purisānaṃ antosokaṃ pavesetīti sokāvāsā,
tika-vin04t:2603_2: Atha vā gharaṃ viya gharasāmikā ayampi purisasamāgamaṃ alabhamānā sokaṃ āvisati,
tika-vin04t:2603_5: Tenevassa padabhājane “sokāvāsā nāma paresaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin04t:2603_7: Pācittiyanti evarūpaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2604_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evarūpaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2607_0: Dasame mātāpitūhīti vijātamātarā ca janakapitarā ca.
tika-vin04t:2611_1: Tattha catubbidhaṃ pārivāsiyaṃ parisapārivāsiyaṃ rattipārivāsiyaṃ chandapārivāsiyaṃ ajjhāsayapārivāsiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2612_0: Tattha parisapārivāsiyaṃ nāma bhikkhū kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitā honti,
tika-vin04t:2612_8: chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2613_0: Puna bhikkhū “uposathādīni karissāmā”ti rattiṃ sannipatitvā “yāva sabbe sannipatanti,
tika-vin04t:2613_6: pāṭipade anuposathe uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2614_0: Puna bhikkhū “kiñcideva abbhānādisaṅghakammaṃ karissāmā”ti sannisinnā honti,
tika-vin04t:2614_1: tatreko nakkhattapāṭhako bhikkhu evaṃ vadati “ajja nakkhattaṃ dāruṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2614_3: Te tassa vacanena chandaṃ vissajjetvā tattheva nisinnā honti,
tika-vin04t:2614_8: Etasmiṃ pārivāsiye puna chandapārisuddhiṃ anāharitvā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2614_10: Pācittiyanti evaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2615_0: Rājagahe thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2618_0: Dvādasame anuvassanti anusaṃvaccharaṃ. Evaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyāpi vuttanayeneva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2619_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2622_0: Terasame ekantarikaṃ ekaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ dvādasamena sadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2627_0: Chattavaggassa paṭhame chattupāhananti padabhājane vuttalakkhaṇaṃ chattañca upāhanāyo ca.
tika-vin04t:2627_1: Dhāreyyāti paribhogavasena maggagamane ekappayogeneva divasampi dhārentiyā ekā āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2627_2: Sace pana tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā chattampi apanāmetvā upāhanāpi omuñcitvā punappunaṃ dhāreti,
tika-vin04t:2628_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha chattupāhanadhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2631_1: Etthāpi orohitvā punappunaṃ abhiruhantiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2634_2: Etthāpi omuñcitvā omuñcitvā dhārentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2635_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha saṅghāṇiṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2638_0: Catutthe itthālaṅkāranti sīsūpagādīsu aññataraṃ yaṃkiñci piḷandhanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2638_1: Idha tassa tassa vasena vatthugaṇanāya āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:2639_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2642_0: Pañcame gandhavaṇṇakenāti yenakenaci gandhena ca vaṇṇakena ca.
tika-vin04t:2645_0: Chaṭṭhe vāsitakenāti gandhavāsitakena. Piññākenāti tilapiṭṭhena. Sesaṃ pañcamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2648_2: Ettha ca hatthaṃ amuñcitvā ubbaṭṭane ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2649_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpanaparimaddāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2652_0: Aṭṭhamanavamadasamesupi sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyā gihiniyāti ettakameva nānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2655_0: Ekādasame bhikkhussa puratoti na abhimukhamevāti attho,
tika-vin04t:2655_1: idaṃ pana upacāraṃ sandhāya kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2656_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anāpucchā nisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2659_0: Dvādasame anokāsakatanti “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmī”ti evaṃ akataokāsaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2659_1: tasmā suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2660_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2660_2: anodissa okāsaṃ kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2663_0: Terasame asaṃkaccikāti adhakkhakaubbhanābhimaṇḍalasaṅkhātassa sarīrassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ anuññātasaṃkaccikavirahitā.
tika-vin04t:2663_1: Gāmaṃ paviseyyāti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2663_2: aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā vā okkamantiyā vā paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2664_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha asaṃkaccikāya gāmaṃ pavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2664_1: Yassā pana saṃkaccikacīvaraṃ acchinnaṃ vā naṭṭhaṃ vā, tassā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2669_0: Ito paresu musāvādavaggādīsu sattasu vaggesu bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabboti.
tika-vin04t:2671_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā sattati,
tika-vin04t:2675_1: giraggasamajjā cittāgārasikkhāpadaṃ saṅghāṇī itthālaṅkāro gandhavaṇṇako vāsitakapiññāko bhikkhuniādīhi
tika-vin04t:2675_2: ummaddanaparimaddanāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusalacittāni.
tika-vin04t:2675_5: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti.
tika-vin04t:2675_7: Corivuṭṭhāpanaṃ gāmantaraṃ ārāmasikkhāpadaṃ gabbhinivagge ādito paṭṭhāya satta,
tika-vin04t:2675_8: kumāribhūtavagge ādito paṭṭhāya pañca purisādisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ pārivāsikachandadānaṃ anuvassavuṭṭhāpanaṃ ekantarikavuṭṭhāpananti
tika-vin04t:2678_0: Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame sappinti pubbe vuttavinicchayaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ gosappiādimeva.
tika-vin04t:2678_1: Viññāpetvā bhuñjeyyāti ettha “viññattiyā paṭiladdhaṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2679_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2679_5: gilānakāle vā viññāpetvā pacchā agilānā hutvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:2679_9: attano vā dhanena gahitaṃ bhuñjati, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2682_0: Dutiyādīsupi telādīni pubbe vuttavinicchayāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva,
tika-vin04t:2688_0: Ito paraṃ pana sekhiyāni ceva adhikaraṇasamathā ca sabbapakārato bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.
tika-vin04t:2697_0: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
tika-vin04t:2699_0: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
tika-vin04t:2701_0: Yasmā tasmā akatvāva, ettha kaṅkhaṃ hitesinā;
tika-vin04t:2703_0: Yathā ca niṭṭhaṃ sampattā, kaṅkhāvitaraṇī ayaṃ;
tika-vin04t:2707_4: theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti
tika-vin04t:2707_5: garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇī nāma pātimokkhavaṇṇanā –
